zh: 运动能够直接造成能量负平衡，或者通过加强食物的热量生成、加速安静代谢率和（或）减少食物摄取达到能量负平衡。
en: Exercise induces negative energy balance either directly or by enhancing meal thermogenesis, increasing resting metabolic rate, and/or decreasing food intake.

zh: 然而，运动本身的能量消耗很小，食物的热效应也可忽略不计。
en: However, energy cost of exercise per se is minimal, and thermic effect of food is negligible.

zh: 因此，运动训练结合低卡路里饮食可能有益，因为这种结合有助于保持较高的安静代谢率和去脂肪体重（Calles-Escandon & Horton,1992）。
en: Exercise training may be advantageous in conjunction with a low calorie diet because it helps to maintain resting metabolic rate and fat-free mass (Calles-Escandon & Horton, 1992).

zh: 测试安静能量消耗（REE)通常是在晨起后进行，测试前必须没有进行中等或大强度的活动。
en: Resting energy expenditure is normally measured in the morning after waking up without moderate or intense physical activity before the measurement is taken.

zh: 测试必须在测试前夜间不进食的条件下，在室温适度的环境中卧位完成。
en: The measurement has to be done after an overnight fast, in a thermoneutral environment in the supine position.

zh: 如果没有合适的测试仪器，可以使用按不同年龄范围校正的各种预测公式来计算安静能量消耗（FA0/WH0/UNU, 1985)。
en: If appropriate equipment is not available the REE can be calculated with the use of prediction formulae which are adjusted for the different age ranges (FAO/WHO/UNU, 1985).

zh: 奥林匹克理想的三根支柱是体育、文化和尊重。
en: The three pillars of Ihe Olympic ideal are sport, culture and respect.

zh: 奥林匹克的五大价值观则是:体育道德、教育、超越自我、团结、和平和快乐。
en: The five Olympic values are: sportsmanship; education; exceeding one’s expectations; solidarity; and peace and happiness.

zh: 为奥林匹克理想服务的人们，肩负着将这些理想不断推向前进的使命，这是奥运会特许经营组织赖以存在的永恒不变的根基。
en: Those who serve it are charged with advancing that agenda.These values are the foundations upon which the Olympic franchise is based.They are immutable.

zh: 运动员们付出自己生命中宝贵的时间来追随奥林匹克理想，原因也正在于此。
en: They are the reason why athletes are prepared to dedicate years of their lives to pursuing the Olympic dream.

zh: 运动员们达到奥林匹克理想的努力成为一种精彩，而我们其他人也和他们一样，在此过程中得到提升。
en: And we, like them, are elevated by the spectacle of their endeavour as they strive to live up to the Olympic ideals.

zh: 这一点永远不能改变。
en: That must never change.

zh: 这位领导人的讲话，延续了奥运会发展历史上的一个传统。在过去100年里，美国总统罗纳德·里根、比尔·克林顿、乔治·W·布什；大不列颠王国国王乔治六世、女王伊丽莎白二世；西班牙国王胡安·卡洛斯；法国总统密特朗；前苏联主席勃列日涅夫；还有日本裕仁和明仁天皇，都曾经宣布过这一全世界最大规模体育盛会的开幕。
en: Jintao's speech follows in a tradition.Over the last century, American Presidents Reagan, Clinton, and George W Bush; along with King George VI and Oueen Elizabeth II of Great Britain; King Juan Carlos of Spain; President Mitterand of France; President Brezhnev of the Soviet Union; and Emperors Hirohito and Akihito of Japan have all opened the world’s greatest sporting festival.As the speech concludes, the Olympic cauldron is ignited.

zh: 奥运火炬被点燃了，对于中国来说，这个光彩夺目的盛会将牢固地奠定自己在世界舞台上的地位，现在它正式开始了。
en: China’s spectacular party, firmly establishing its position on the world stage, can officially begin.

zh: 虽然白内障并不会真正造成视力的完全丧失，却能恶化到使你成为法定意义上的盲人。（法定意义上的目盲是指你无法在6米远的距离内看清视力表上的大号字母。
en: Though cataracts don't really cause a total loss of vision, they can worsen to the point of making you legally blind (you've legally blind if you can't read the big letters on a vision chart from a distance of twenty feet).

zh: ）这种障翳可以被摘除，同时植入一种人工合成晶体就能解决这一问题。
en: They can be removed and a synthetic lens implanted to correct the problem.

zh: 做出反应的白细胞紧贴着巨噬细胞以获取更多关于入侵细菌的信息,并生成一种特殊的防御机制——把T细胞和B细胞召集到被感染区。
en: Responding white cells attach to the macrophage so they can learn more about the incaders and develop specialized defense mechanisms—in the form of calling T cells and B cells to the area.

zh: T细胞直接杀死入侵细菌或者帮助调整免疫系统的反应。
en: The T cells directly kill the invader or help coordinate the immuse system response.

zh: B细胞制造抗体像子弹一样摧毁入侵细菌。
en: The B cells create antibodies that act like bullets to destroy the invaders.

zh: 当他们完成任务，多余的白细胞将会杀死它们自己 (细胞自杀机制），以使它们不会误杀我们自身健康的细胞，造成自体免疫疾病。
en: When done, the excess white blood cells kill themselves (apoptosis) so that they won't kill our own healthy cells by mistake and cause an autoimmune disease.

zh: 半俯卧撑非常重要，要熟练掌握。
en: The half pushup is an important exercise to master properly.

zh: 很多人做俯卧撑的方法都不正确——撅屁股或者塌腰，这是因为他们的腰部肌肉和脊椎肌肉不发达。
en: You see a lot of guys doing pushups incorrectly, with their butt moving up as they bend at the hips.They do this because their waist and spinal muscles are weak.

zh: 这个动作可以锻炼你的腰部肌肉和脊椎肌肉，从而能够锁定臀部，使身体成一条直线。
en: This exercise trains the waist and spine to keep the hips locked and aligned.

zh: 常见的瓣膜问题是二尖脱垂。
en: The most common valve problem is matral valve prolapse (the name "mitral", by the way, comes from miter, the two-leaved hat worn by popes), in which the valve between the left atrium and left ventricle doesn't slam closed fully, just like in Figure

zh: 补充一句，“二尖瓣”这个词源自“主教冠”,它是主教戴的帽子，有两个尖。
如图2.3所示，位于左心房和左心室之间的瓣膜不能正常闭合。
棒球击球手能用他们的眼睛盯住球吗？
en: Can baseball batters keep their eye on the ball?

zh: 或者，更关键的问题是，他们的眼睛能跟 上球直到球到达球棒的接触点吗？
en: Or, more to the point, can they follow the ball with their eyes to the point of its contact with the bat?

zh: Robert Watts (罗伯特•瓦特）和Terry Bahill (特里•拜希尔）尝试着解决这个问题。
en: Robert Watts and Terry Bahill set out to find out.

zh: 他们在实验室里，采用测量眼动的装备，模拟球场环境（一个串在鱼线上的白色塑料球，用滑轮驱动）对击球手进行测量。
en: In the laboratory, they rigged batters with devices that measured eye movements as they swung at a simulated pitch (a white plastic ball threaded on a fishing line and propelled by a pulley).

zh: 他们有大量有趣的发现。
en: They had a number of interesting findings.

zh: 首先是，专业的球员可以在他的视野范围内视觉追踪到角速度达到130rad/s的球。
en: First, a professional player was able to visually track the ball at an angular velocity in his vision up to 130 degrees per second.

zh: 如前所述，这样的速度已经远远超过了非运动员。
en: As noted previously, that’s a lot faster than has been described in non-athletes.

zh: 这说明，专业球员对飞向本垒的球有相当惊人的视觉追踪能力。
en: It would seem, at least based on this one subject, that the professional ball player has rather an astounding ability to visually track a pitched baseball as it nears the plate.

zh: 运动员可以在本垒5.5ft之内接到球。
en: That athlete could follow the ball to within 5.5 feet of home plate, but not after.

zh: 重量训练与暴饮暴食紧密相连。
en: Weight-training and the psychology of overeating go hand in hand.

zh: 专业的举重运动员都认为，如果在锻炼前吃得多一点儿，举得就会好一点儿，肌肉就能多长一点儿。
en: Before a hard session, an athlete convinces himself that if he eats more, he’ll lift better and put on beef.

zh: 锻炼之后，运动员的体力被人为地耗尽，他们吃得也自然多一点儿。
en: After a hard session, an athlete is artificially depleted and his appetite increases accordingly.

zh: 它如何决定要做哪个，单位时间内更快还是更长。
en: How does it decide which to do?More strides or longer strides per time?

zh: 乍一看，似乎可以假设它能在体能限制内利用任意一种机制来调整比赛速度。
en: At first glance, it would seem hypothetically possible, at least within physical constraints, to utilize either mechanism to adjust race velocity.

zh: 但是，正如下一节所示，这是不正确的。
en: But, as the next section shows, that isn’t true.

zh: 屈臂撑锻炼的肌肉与俯卧撑类似，因此我将其归为俯卧撑的变式。
en: To give a couple of examples, dips work similar muscles to pushups, and are therefore seen as a variant.

zh: 以前，倒立臂屈伸与倒立撑是相关联的练习动作，因此我将其归为倒立撑的变式。
en: Tiger bends are a famous old-time exercise related to handstand pushups, and are seen as a variant.

zh: 深蹲跳与跳箱子都属于爆发力式深蹲，因而我将其归为深蹲的变式。
en: Jumping squats and box jumps are explosive versions of squats, and are considered to bevariants.

zh: 通过实习，可以完全达到无意识、快速和精确地进行标记的程度。
en: With practice, landmarking can be completed unconsciously, very rapidly and accurately.

zh: 放弃、再定位和核查是一种机械的动作，确保皮肤表面记号没有偏离骨骼的骨性标志。
en: The releasing, relocating and checking is automatic assuring the surface of the skin does not distort the location of the landmark.

zh: 在定标过程中，都要使用双手。
en: Both hands are used in the process.

zh: 在标定某些不典型人群时，我们概括了一些细微的差别。
en: We have included some nuances in how to locate landmarks on atypical subjects.

zh: 标准倒立撑是标准的“囚徒”倒立撑，它可以强化肩部、肱三头肌、肘部、斜方肌、胸肌及双手——其实整个上半身的力量都会得到发展。
en: The handstand pushup is the full Convict Conditioning handstand pushup, which develops and strengthens the shoulders, triceps, elbows, trapezius, pectorals and hands—in fact it has a power-building effect on the entire upper body.

zh: 很多训练者都认为，倒立撑应该是“自由”的，即离开墙做。
en: A lot of athletes feel the handstand pushup should be free—that is, clear of the wall.

zh: 但这对平衡能力的要求极高。
en: But this is a test of balance as much as strength.

zh: 所有老派倒立练习者都相信，要想拥有超凡的平衡能力，首先应该培养力量。
en: All the old school hand-balancers believed that if you want balance, you should build strength first.

zh: 标准深蹲是经典的自身体重练习动作。数千年来该动作始终流行于世，是有一定原因的。
en: Full squats are the classic bodyweight leg exercise, used productively the world over for many thousands of years.

zh: 标准深蹲能够强化膝关节，并增强大腿肌肉、臀部肌肉、脊椎肌肉和髋部肌肉的力量和运动能力。
en: And not without reason; full squats strengthen the knees, and add power and athleticism to every muscle in the thighs, as well as the glutes, spinal muscles and hips.

zh: 另外，这个动作也能使小腿部的胫骨前肌、脚踝，甚至包括脚掌得到相应的锻炼。
en: The entire lower leg is conditioned, including the calves, anterior tibialis (shin muscles), ankles and even the soles of the feet.

zh: 标准深蹲有助于让双腿保持年轻活力。
en: Full squats help legs retain their youthful vigor.

zh: 标准引体向上是锻炼上背部与肱二头肌的经典练习。
en: The  full pullup is the classic muscle and power exercise for the upper back and biceps.

zh: 掌握这个动作后，你将具有出众的行动能力与运动力量。
en: The master of this exercise will possess superior functional mobility and athletic strength.

zh: 人类天生就善于把自己拉起来，一个男人要是连引体向上都做不了，那就称不上真的强壮。
en: The human body evolved to pull itself up well—a man who cannot do pullups cannot be considered to be truly strong.

zh: 病毒需要借助你的身体逬行复制。
一种病毒通过侵入你的细胞并劫持你的细胞来起作用——基本上通过截取遗传密码。
en: A virus works by invading one of your cells and hijacking it —essentially taking over its genetic code.

zh: 当病毒利用好细胞的自身复制工具时，它就像去了速递公司那里做了几万份的拷贝，然后通过你的血液全部传输出去。
en: When the virus uses the good cell's replication machinery, it's like the virus had gone to kinko's and made millions of copies to send all throughout your bloodstream.

zh: 勃起功能障碍像皱纹一样，伴随着衰老而生。
en: Erectile dysfunction, like wrinkles and parfaking in early-bird dinner specials, increases as you age.

zh: 它影响了5%的40-50岁的男性和高达25%的65岁男性。
en: It affects 5 percent of men in their forties, up to 25 percent of men by the age of sixty-five, and over 50 percent of men who have reached eighty.

zh: 80岁的男性半数有勃起问题，但这不说明你一定也会有同样的烦恼——特别是只要你能遵守本书第2章中提出的动脉健康行为准则，就会避免勃起问题。
en: And while half of men experience some kind of erectile problem between the ages of forty and seventy, it doesn't mean you have to be one of them, even after eighty—especially if you follow our guidelines for optimum arterial health in Chapter 2.

zh: 事实上，超过60%的70岁以上的男性都声称，自己的性健康状况良好。
en: In fact, more than 60 percent of men in their seventies report that they're swinging the clubs just fine.

zh: 还有一个脑部锻炼途径是人人都喜欢的——度假。
en: Here's one of our favorite ways to stretch your mind: vacations.

zh: 度假对缓解压力和提高性生活质量都有很大帮助，而且度假还有助于提高认知能力。
en: Sure, vacations are great for both your stress levels and your sex life.But they can also help improve your cognitive skills.

zh: 是怎样提高的？
en: How?

zh: 通过阅读地图。
en: Maps.

zh: 当我们驾车、步行，或研究一座陌生城市的地铁系统时，就需要同时用到人脑的许多不同部分。
en: When you're driving, walking, or studying the subway system of a new city, you're using many different parts of your brain at once.

zh: 我们用空间想象能力读地图，然后再把获得的信息转换为语言符号，传达给驾车人。
en: You're using visual-spatial skills to read a map, and then you need to translate it into verbal code to whoever s driving.

zh: 客观性（测试者间信度）可以藉由以一位以上的测试者来收集资料而建立。
en: The degree of objectivity (intertester reliability) can be established by having more than one tester gather data.

zh: 将此分数以组内相关方法分析，可以取得测试者间信度系数 。
en: Then the scores are analyzed with intraclass correlation techniques to obtain an intertester reliability coefficient.

zh: 在一次分析中就可以评估许多不同来源变异量，这些变异量可以是来自测试者、测试、不同日期、参与者、以及误差所造成的变异量( 这些计算的讨论参见Safrit，1976)。
en: It is possible to assess a number of sources of variance in one analysis, such as variance caused by testers, trials, days, participants, and error (for a discussion of the calculations involved, see Safrit, 1976).

zh: 附录中的表2显示了常态曲线的常态分布单位（z）。
en: Table 2 in the appendix shows a unit normal distribution (z) for a normal curve.

zh: 字段z代表了平均数的位置。
en: The column z shows the location of the mean.

zh: 当平均数在数据分布的正中间时，它的z等于.00；因此，.50 (50%）的分布高于平均数（在平均数右方），剩下.50 ( 50% )的分布则是余数(平均数左边）。
en: When the mean is in the center of the distribution, its z is equal to .00; thus, .50 (50%) of the distribution is beyond (to the right of) the mean, leaving .50 (50%) of the distribution as a remainder (to the left of the mean).

zh: 当数据分布的平均值往常态曲线的右侧移动时（例如移到z为+ ls )，.8413 ( 84%)的分布在平均数左侧(余数），.1587则在平均数右侧（大于平均数）。
en: As the mean of the distribution moves to the right in a normal curve (say, to a z of +ls), .8413 (84%) of the distribution is to the left of the mean (remainder) and .1587 is to the right of (beyond) the mean.

zh: 这个表格能让你计算平均数加上任何标准偏差后，所包含的常态分布百分比。
en: This table allows you to determine the percentage of the normal distribution included by the mean plus any fraction of a standard deviation.

zh: 有时候，研究生或教职员无意中也可能牵连抄袭。
en: On occasion, a graduate student or faculty member can inadvertently be involved in plagiarism.

zh: 这种情况通常发生在合著的研究。
en: This situation generally occurs on work that is coauthored.

zh: 如果其中一位作者抄袭他人资料，其他作者也须承担同样罚责，即使他或她并不知道有抄袭。
en: If one author plagiarizes material, the other could be equally punished even though he or she is unaware of the plagiarism.

zh: 说“太胖的人不适合运动”就和说“太瘦的人不适合吃饭”一样没道理。
en: Saying you're too overweight to exercise is like saying you're too skinny to eat.

zh: 我们的身体就像需要食物一样需要运动。
en: Your body needs exercise just the way your body needs food.

zh: 不论你的体重多么超重，都可以做运动减肥，强筋健骨，给承担体重的关节减负。
en: No matter how overweight you are, you can do something to start the process of losing fat, strengthening your bones, and relieving your joints of the load that they're carrying.

zh: 费尔斯（Fels)法基于与TW法相同的20块骨骼并加上豌豆骨和内收肌籽骨。
en: The Fels method is based on the same 20 bones as the TW method plus the pisiform and adductor sesamoid.

zh: 作者对每一块骨骼的成熟指标和特殊标准加以定义。
en: The authors defined their own maturity indicators and specific criteria for each.

zh: 它是依据手和腕部一系列骨骼 形态变化以及长骨骼线性测量数据之间的比值建立的。
en: They are based on a variety of shape changes and several ratios between linear measurements of the long bones of the hand and wrist.

zh: 通过与附有文字描述的标准X线片对照，对每块骨骼的标志进行定级。
en: Grades are assigned to the indicators for each bone by matching the film being assessed to the described criteria.

zh: 评定的等级与比值输入计算机，计算出骨龄和标准误（SE)。
en: The assigned grades and ratios are then entered into a microcom puter which calculates an SA and an SE.

zh: 在结束这个话题之前，我们应该把这点也加上去，即除了出生日期，出生地似乎也很重要。
en: Before leaving this point, it should be added that in addition to birth date, location of birth also seems to be important.

zh: 如果你想成为一个明星运动员，那你需要在Austin (奥斯汀）长大，而不是在纽约或者Miller’s Comers (米勒斯•康勒斯）。
en: If you want to be a star athlete, grow up in Austin, not New York City or Miller’s Corners.

zh: 好吧，这是有一点夸张的成分，但是关键点是，研究显示了一个不成比例的专业运动员的数量，他们都出生在 拥有少于500000而多于10000人口的城市。
en: Well, that’s a bit of hyperbole, but the point is that studies indicate a disproportionate number of professional athletes grow up in cities with populations less than 500,000 but greater than 10,000.

zh: 如果你还达不到该练习的初级标准，那就试着使用比篮球高的物体，椅子或矮咖啡桌都是不错的选择。
en: If you can’t reach the beginner standard of this exercise, continue your unilateral training but try pressing off an object higher than the basketball.A chair seat or a low coffee table could be good choices.

zh: 相比于使用篮球，这些物体可以在更大的运动范围内为你的手臂提供支撑。
en: This will free your arms to provide more support over a longer range of motion than is possible when you use a basketball.

zh: 一旦你借助更高物体能完成该动作，就可以换用矮一些的物体，就这样循序渐进地练习，直到你准备好再次尝试用篮球做该动作。
en: Once you master the exercise with a higher object, work with progressively smaller objects until you are ready to try the basketball again.

zh: 垂直引体是动作非常轻微的引体向上动作。
en: Vertical pulls are a very gentle exercise.

zh: 对那些背部和手臂力量正处于恢复阶段的训练者来说，这是非常理想的练习。此外，这个动作对肩部、肱二头肌或肘部受过伤的训练者而言更适合，因为它可以增加血液流动，并让他们的身体找回“拉力”的感觉。
en: They are ideal for athletes rebuilding their back and arm strength, particularly following on from a shoulder, biceps or elbow injury.They increase blood flow and re-train the pulling “groove”.

zh: 对初学者来说，这也是上好的练习。
en: This is also an excellent exercise for any beginner.

zh: 由于该动作强度较小，可以使初尝拉力训练的人，在进入难度更大的动作之前真切地感受肩部和上背部肌肉的“发力” 。
en: Its low intensity allows athletes new to pulling to really feel the muscles at work in the shoulders and upper back, before things get too heavy.

zh: 自从能够正确追踪有生物学活性激素的较 新的第三代LH检测法得到应用以来，人们发现在青春发育期的所有阶段都有促黄体生成激素的脉冲释放。
en: Pulsatile release of luteinizing horm one (LH) is found at all stages of pubertal development, especially since the newer, third generation LH assays that faithfully track biologically active horm one have been used.

zh: 应用这些测定技术，真正的脉冲性LH(和FSH)的释放能够在青春期前(阶段I)和青春期早期的儿童中测试到。
en: With these assays truly pulsatile LH (and FSH) release can be detected in prepubertal (stage I) as well as early pubertal children.

zh: 这样，可以将激素分泌正常与患永久性低促性腺激素性腺机能低下症的儿童加以区别。

en: Such secretion could be distinguished from that in children with permanent hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism.

zh: 使用0.15-0.3 mg的小剂量共轭雌激素的替代疗法应该尽可能延后进行，因为即使小剂量的雌激素也有可能加速骨骼的发育。
en: Low dose replacement therapy with 0 .15 —0.3 mg of conjugated oestrogens should be delayed as long as possible since even small doses of oestrogen may rapidly accelerate skeletal development.

zh: 在 6~12个月后，在每月的12~25天添加醋酸甲孕酮（5~10 mg)来引导月经周期。
en: After 6—12 months medroxyprogesterone acetate ( 5 - 1 0 mg) is added on days 1 2 —25 of the month to induce menstrual cycles.

zh: 随后，在每月的1~25天雌激素的剂量增加到 0.6~1.25mg。
en: Subsequently, the oestrogen dose is increased to 0.6—1.2 5 m gon days 1 —25 of the month.

zh: 作为进化树顶端的优势之一，动物逐渐表现出更髙级的大脑结构，特别是大脑皮层。
en: As one examines ascendancy of the evolutionary tree, animals progressively exhibit extensive development of higher brain structures, particularly the cerebral cortex.

zh: 因此，可以预测，大脑内更高的控制点将作为CPGs发挥作用。
en: It might be expected, then, that higher controlling sites within the brain would begin to play a role as CPGs.

zh: 猴子和其他非人类灵长类动物在这一点上提供了一些信息。
en: Monkeys and other nonhuman primates provide some information on this point.

zh: 大腿中点（mid-thigh)。
en: Mid-thigh.

zh: 可以用几种方法来定位大腿中点。
en: There are several methods for locating the mid-thigh.

zh: 一种是在受试者取坐位时，取从腹股沟线到髌骨前缘之间距离的一半。
en: One is to use half the measured distance in a seated subject from the inguinal line at mid-thigh to the anterior margin of the patella.

zh: 这是与测量大腿中点皮褶的估计技术是一致的。
en: This is consistent with the technique for estimating the site for obtaining mid-thigh skinfolds.

zh: 对于围度测量，我们喜欢采用受试者在站立时，从大转子最高点 (前面提到的）起到胫骨茎突最远端之间的测量距离的一半来确定大腿的中点。
en: For girth measurement we prefer defining the mid-thigh as half the measured distance from the previously located trochanerion to the tibiale laterale when the subject stands erect.

zh: 单臂半俯卧撑是俯卧撑系列的第八式。
en: Half one-arm pushups are Step 8 of the pushup series of movements.

zh: 通过这个练习，训练者可以逐步从双侧练习转为单侧练习。
en: With this technique, the athlete finally moves from bilateral (two-sided) exercises to unilateral (one-sided) work.

zh: 该动作可以提高你的平衡能力，而这对做单臂俯卧撑极其重要。
en: This is an important stage in the series.Working on half one-arm pushups will teach the athlete the balance and positioning necessary to master full one-arm pushups.

zh: 在引体向上系列中，这是第一个用单臂拉起全部体重的动作。
en: This is the first step in the series where the student pulls his total bodyweight with one hand.

zh: 该动作可以帮助训练者高平衡能力，熟悉标准单臂引体向上所要求的发力方法。单臂半引体向上还会发展肱二头肌和背部的力量，练就粗壮的手臂。
en: As well as teaching the balance and technical groove required for full one-arm pullups, 1/2 one-arm pullup develops huge biceps and back power and builds big arms.

zh: 但由于运动幅度只有一半，所以练习该动作之后，你需要补充一些完整幅度的动作，比如偏重引体向上或窄距引体向上。
en: It doesn’t train the muscles in the stretched position though, so add a full-range motion such as uneven pullups or close pullups afterwards.

zh: 单臂倒立撑是锻炼肩部和手臂的终极动作。
en: The  one-arm handstand pushup is the ultimate shoulder and arm exercise.

zh: 忘掉卧推吧——它只能给你带来伤痛和不幸。
en: Forget bench presses—all they cause is injury and grief.

zh: 谨慎练习整个倒立撑系列，直至掌握最终式，你的力量会比你碰到的所有练卧推的都大——这里说的是纯粹、有用、能把人抓起来扔出去的力量。
en: Work your way carefully through the handstand pushup series right up to this Master Step and you will be stronger—in terms of pure, functional, pick someone up and throw them power—than any bench presser you meet.

zh: 姿势正确的单臂俯卧撑是检验胸部与肘部力量的黄金标准，而且能够让人一见难忘。
en: The one-arm pushup when performed with pure form, is the gold standard of chest and elbow power, and it’s an impressive sight to see.

zh: 许多健身者都声称自己能做单臂俯卧撑，但你千万不要被他们蒙骗。
en: Many athletes claim to be able to do this exercise without any problems, but don’t be fooled.

zh: 当你让他们动真格的时候，你就会发现，他们所谓的单臂俯卧撑就是个笑话：双腿朝两边分开，上身丑陋地扭曲——这是为了更容易做动作，然后他们会用摇摇摆摆、虚弱无力的胳膊猛地将自己推起，而且他们只能完成少数几次反复。
en: When you ask them to put their money where their mouth is, their pushups are a joke—they splay out their legs, twist their torsos into ugly shapes to make the exercise easier, and violently strain for shallow reps on wobbly, weak arms.

zh: 不靠“蹬腿”的完整幅度的单臂引体向上，可能是最伟大的背部与手臂练习，它可以赋予你强悍的力量与块头。
en: One-arm pullups, performed deeply and without “kipping” are the greatest back and arm exercise possible.They confer mighty strength and size.

zh: 掌握单臂引体向上后，你的背阔肌就会像一对翅膀一般，上背部也会发展出如蟒蛇盘绕交错般的肌肉。
en: The master of this exercise will earn lats that look like wings and his upper back will be sprouting muscles like coiled pythons.

zh: 此外，你的抓握力、上臂及前臂力量会比健身房里的那些寻常鼠辈不知强多少倍——你很可能在摔跤比赛中把那些所谓健美人士的手臂扯下来。
en: Plus, he’ll own a grip, arms and forearms vastly more powerful than the average gym rat—in fact he could probably rip a bodybuilder’s arm off in an arm wrestling match.

zh: 第一式肩倒立深蹲最容易，第十式单腿深蹲最难。
en: Step 1, the shoulderstand squat, is the easiest version of the movement; Step 10, the full one-leg squat, is the hardest variation.

zh: 几乎人人都能做肩倒立深蹲，即使他的身体很弱。相反，几乎没人能够第一次就完成单腿深蹲，不管他多么健康、多么强壮。
en: Almost everybody will be able to do shoulderstand squats straight away, no matter how weak or infirm they are; hardly anybody will be able to do one-leg squats on the first time of asking, no matter how fit or strong they are.

zh: 我之所以构建这样的体系，就是为了让健身者做自己的教练，从而在没有器械辅助的情况下，慢慢到达能够做上20-50次单腿深蹲。
en: The purpose of this structure is to allow the individual trainee—training alone as his own coach, and with no special equipment—to work his way up gradually to be able to do one-leg squats for sets of twenty to fifty reps.

zh: 食道与胃部的相接角度很小，以减轻反胃现象，但是一旦相接处被打开（交角增大），我们就会由于胃食道反流而产生胃部灼热和消化不良。
en: The esophagus makes a sharp angle as it enters the stomach to reduce this regurgitation, but if the junction is opened (the angle is reduced), we get burning and indigestion from GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disorder).

zh: 胆囊储存着胆汁，当食物团通过胃部的时候，胆汁就会分泌到小肠里。
en: The gallbladder stores bile, which can be secreted into the small bowel once the food bolus has passed through the stomach.

zh: 有时，储存的胆汁会硬化，形成胆结石，人会感觉很疼。
en: The stored bile can harden and form painful gallstones.

zh: 食物经过胃部后，就来到了小肠，与绿色的胆汁混合在一起。胆汁是由肝脏产生的液态物质，能够包裹乳化脂肪。
en: After the stomach, food moves into the small intestine and mixes with green bile --the liquid material made by the liver that surrounds and emulsifies the fat you gobbled down at last night's movie.

zh: 胆汁工作的情况像肥皂分解油溃一样，这种绿色的液体令脂肪溶解在水中，便于人体更有效地消化食物。
en: Bile works the way soap dissolves grease; this green fluid makes fat soluble in water so you can digest food more efficiently.

zh: 胆囊储存着人体的胆汁，当食物从胃里涌到小肠处时，胆囊就喷出胆汁。
en: The gallbladder stores your bodys bile so it can be squirted as a bolus when food comes gushing around the corner from the stomach.

zh: 高脂饮食会导致胆囊收缩，更增加了结石带来的痛苦。
en: Fatty meals, which cause your gallbladder to contract, can increase the pain from your existing stones.

zh: 这里有一个方法可以检验自己的腹痛是否是由胆结石引起的。
en: So there's a way that you can actually test yourself to see if your belly pain is caused by gallstones.

zh: 去快餐店吃少量高脂饮食，比如一两块肯德基原味炸鸡（不错，这是惟一一次医生向你推荐这种食品）。
en: Go out and eat a small amount of a highly fatty fast-food meal, like a piece or two of original Kentucky Fried Chicken (yes, this is the only time you hear us recommend that).

zh: 如果你吃起来不觉得腹痛，可能没有胆结石；如果吃的时候感觉腹痛，这就可能是胆结石的信号，你就得去看看消化科大夫怎么说了。
en: If you can eat it without pain, you likely don't have gallbladder disease.If you have pain when you're eating it, that's a probable sign of gallbladder disease, and you'll need to see a gallbladder surgeon.

zh: 此外，大的动作幅度会使肱骨扭转，并刺激肩袖，但练习倒立撑时不会这样。
en: In addition, very deep motions—which would twist the humerus and irritate the rotator cuff—are impossible during handstand pushups.

zh: 倒立撑就如同反过来的肩部推举，但是在头部接触地板后身体就不能再下降了。
en: You can’t lower yourself until the floor is on your shoulders—the inverted equivalent of a shoulder press—for the simple reason that the head gets in the way.

zh: 此外，倒立撑中手掌平放的姿势比杠铃抓握的姿势更安全，平放的手掌可以均匀分布压力，从而以健康和谐的方式强化前臂（对俯卧撑也是如此）。
en: Plus, the flat hand position is safer than the barbell grip; the flat hands distribute pressure evenly, allowing the forearms to strengthen in a healthy, harmonious way.

zh: 推举时抓握杠铃，会引起前臂和肘部出现类似网球肘的问题。
en: Gripping the bar during presses is what causes forearm and elbow problems like tennis elbow.(This is as true for the standard pushup as it is for the handstand variety.)

zh: 只要方式正确，倒立撑相当安全。
en: Handstand pushups—done properly—are incredibly safe.

zh: 蹬腿会给关节带来不必要的压力，造成一种很有力量的错觉，动作也容易走形。
en: Kipping puts unnecessary stress on the joints, gives a false sense of strength and encourages sloppy form.

zh: 因此，初学者在做引体向上时千万不要蹬腿，应该坚持标准的姿势——经2秒钟拉起身体，暂停1秒钟，再经2秒钟放低身体，再暂停1秒钟。
en: For that reason, it should never be used by beginners, who should stick with perfect form—two seconds up, a one second pause then two seconds down, followed by another one second pause.

zh: 记住，千万不要用惯性。
en: No momentum should be used.

zh: 如果需要治疗，通常是用促性腺性类固醇激素治疗，每天5~20μg,治疗几个月。最常用的是每天0.3~0.6 mg复合雌性激素或乙基雌二醇。
en: If therapy is needed, it is usually with gonadal steroid horm ones, often 0 .3—o.6mg daily conjugated equine oestrogens or ethinyl oestradiol,5 —20 μg daily for several months.

zh: 如果治疗需要延长，可以慎重使用醋酸甲孕丽（medroxyprogesterone acetate),每月 10~14天，每天10mg,来诱导月经周期。
en: If prolonged therapy is necessary, the addition of medroxyprogesterone acetate 10 mg daily for 10 —14 days of each month to induce menstrual periods is prudent.

zh: 后者极少用于体质性的发育延迟的女孩，但是必须用于低促性腺激素性功能低下症（hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism)的女孩（见后)。
en: The latter is rarely necessary for girls with constitutional delay, but is required for those with hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism (see below).

zh: 我们也以较哲学性的讨论科学与求知的方法 ，提出从事研究的另类方式。
en: We also present alternative approaches for doing research relative to a more philosophical discussion of science and ways of knowing.

zh: 尤其是 ，我们探讨使用质性研究、实地研究，与以内省的方法做为回答研究问题的策略。而非依赖传统的科学典范架构做为研究问题探讨的唯一方法。
en: In particular, we address qualitative research, the use of field studies, and methods of introspection as strategies for answering research questions instead of relying on the traditional scientific paradigm as the only approach to research problems.

zh: 但是接下来发生的事情我并没有预料到。
en: But what happened to me next was unexpected.

zh: 在麦肯齐的CFE讲座视 频中，他否定了长久以来训练长距离跑步的定律，例如，保持高跑量、 注重长距离训练和配合周期训练。
en: I continued watching MacKenzie’s CFE lecture videos as he ticked through the long-held tenets of distance running, such as doing high mileage, focusing on long runs, and incorporating periodization.

zh: 他彻底否定了以上定律，取而代之的训练重点变成如技巧训练、力量训练和体能训练，肌肉耐力的重要 性取代了心血管耐力。
en: He systematically rejected them all, supplanting them with priorities such as skill work, strength and conditioning, and replacing cardiovascular endurance with muscular stamina.

zh: 虽然我仍然持保留意见，但是在继续听讲座的过程中，我发现自己很难反驳他的观点。
en: I flinched with each swap, but I kept listening, and in each case, I found I had a hard time refuting his argument.

zh: 由于人体在跑动过程中要应对重心平衡和冲击力的问题，越来越多的教练开始注重训练正确的跑步姿势。
en: More and more coaches are looking closely at the mechanics of proper running form as the body deals with gravity, balance, and impact force during the running movement.

zh: 这种新观点的拥护者们相信，优秀跑者是创造出来的，而不是天生的。
en: Advocates of this newer approach believe that good runners are made, not born.

zh: 想要拥有正确的跑步姿势和避免受伤，跑者应该有规律地进行动作训练和练习，以提高臀部和腘绳肌的力量、加强腿部的灵活性和增加动作的幅度。
en: To obtain proper form and avoid injury, runners should routinely perform movement drills as well as exercises to develop hip and hamstring strength, elasticity in the legs, and range of motion.

zh: 冷损伤可以是表浅的（冻疮）和全身的（体温过低）。
en: Cold injuries may be superficial (frostbite) or systemic (hypothermia).

zh: 冻疮的早期体征和症状包括局部疼痛和皮肤发红，随着严重程度的增加皮肤可以由红变白。
en: Early signs and symptoms of frostbite include local pain and red skin which may become white with an increase in severity.

zh: 根据作者的了解，还没有报告过儿童在寒冷中运动时有体温过低（直肠体温<35°C）的体征。
en: To the author's know ledge, there are no reports of hypothermia (rectal temperature < 35°C) among children during exercise in the cold.

zh: 这是由于大多数体育活动都可引起代谢率的上升，足以代偿身体热量在外周的丢失。
en: This is due to the fact that the elevated metabolic rate, which characterizes most athletic activities, compensates for the body heat lost to the periphery.

zh: 用下肢来推动整个身体，这是开始脊柱训练最温和的方式。因为在日常生活中，我们通常都是通过腿部带动脊柱活动的，比如散步、弯腰等。
en: Pushing through the lower limbs, and are the gentlest way to begin spinal training because in everyday life we usually activate the spinal muscles via the legs.We do this simply by moving around, bending down, etc.

zh: 在短桥的最高处保持躯干伸直的动作，会刺激脊椎和髋部的肌肉，同时几乎不会给脊椎骨造成任何压力。
en: The act of keeping the trunk straight at the top of the short bridging movement stimulates the spine and hip muscles with hardly any pressure running through the vertebrae.

zh: 所以，对椎间盘有伤的人来说，这是极好的治疗动作。
en: As a result this exercise is wonderful therapy for those who have suffered disc injuries.

zh: 如果儿童运动生理学研究的领域要发展，至关重要的是要熟悉和应用定标的原理。
en: If research in the area of paediatric physiology of exercise is to develop, it is vital that the principles of scaling are embraced and applied.

zh: 这可能牵涉到：放弃比值标准的优先使用，比值标准只有在坦纳（1949)所指出的特殊情况被找到和证实的时候才能使用。
en: This will probably involve: Abandoning a priori use of ratio standards and restricting their use solely to when Tanner's (1949) special circumstance has been sought and verified.

zh: 限制线性建模，通过ANCOVA处理对数转换数据基础上进行组群间比较。
en: Restricting linear modelling via ANCOVA to comparisons of groups based on logarithmic transformations.

zh: 优先使用异速生长模型来建立标 准对个体进行比较，并作为组群间比较的基础。
en: Preferential use of allometric modelling to construct standards against which individuals can be compared and as a basis for comparisons between groups.

zh: 在纵向的、反复测试的设计中应用多级模型。
en: The application of multilevel modelling to longitudinal repeated measures designs.

zh: 评估多元回归（模式）的基本方法跟仅有两个变项的回归模式相同：相关性的大小。
en: The basic procedure to evaluate multiple regression is the same as that used in regression with only two variables: the size of the correlation.

zh: 相关系数越高，则预测越准确。
en: The higher the correlation, the more accurate the prediction.

zh: 但也应该提到其它的因素。
en: But some other factors should be mentioned.

zh: 需要纵向研究数据来说明训练对生长、发育的作用。
en: Longitudinal data are needed to address the effects of training on growth and maturation.

zh: 两项针对男孩的纵向研究表明，虽然不活动的男孩体重偏大，但是参加活动和不参加活动男孩在身高（图 1.8)、PHV出现的年龄和PHV本身没有任何区别。
en: Data from two longitudinal studies of boys indicate no differences in the statures (Fig. 1.8 ), ages at PHV and PHVs of active and inactive boys,, although inactive boys tend io be slightly heavier.

zh: 比利时男孩中参加活动和不参加活动者在骨龄上也没有差别（Beimen et al.，1992b)。
en: SAs of active and inactive Belgian boys also do not differ (Beunen et al., 1992b).

zh: 相反，波兰和捷克正规参加运动的男孩普遍比他们各自国家的不活动的男孩身材高，并且PHV的年龄出现早 (图1.8)。
en: Conversely, Polish and Czech boys regularly active in sport are consistently taller than respective reference data for each country, and also attain PHV at an earlier age (Fig. 1.8).

zh: 只在色拉里加几片西红柿是不能产生抗癌效果的，西红柿需要煮熟以提供最多的营养。意大利面条里的番茄酱其实是提供番茄红累的最佳食品。首先，它是煮熟的；其次，为了能很好地吸收番茄红素，你同时需要摄入少量脂肪，而意大利面条里的番茄酱正好也含有脂肪。
en: But you can't just slice a few tomatoes into your salad to reap the effect; the tomato needs to be cooked in order to provide the most nutrients, Spaghetti sauce is actually the optimal food for lycopene; first of all, it’s cooked，and second, for good absorption you need toconsume a little fat with the lycopene, and tomato sauce contains that as well.

zh: 研究还发现，在体育竞赛的参与者中，男孩和女孩的学习成绩不同。
en: Differences were found in the academic achievement of boy and girl participants in competitive sports.

zh: 比尔曼指出，男孩运动员的学习成绩通常比女孩运动员高。
en: Buhrmann (1972) reported that boy athletes are usually higher in academic achievement than girl athletes.

zh: 邓克尔曼在 1981年对运动参与者和非参与者的比较研究中发现，不参加体育运动的学生中，女孩的学习成绩比男孩高，而在学生运动员里，则是男孩比女孩高。
en: Dunkelman (1981) who compared groups of participants and non-participants in sport, found that nonparticipant girls are higher in academic achievement than boys, while among the student athletes boys have higher academic achievement than girls.

zh: 她认为这一发现与男孩比女孩更加积极参加运动这一现象存在着必然联系。
en: She related this finding with the fact that boys participate in sports more actively than girls.

zh: 引发心血管胸痛的另外的重要原因是由未被发现的肥厚性心肌病引起的心肌缺血或冠状动脉供血不全。
en: Another important cardiovascular cause of chest pain is unrecognized hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with its resultant ischaemia and coronary insufficiency.

zh: 这些人通常需要靠心脏病科医生的帮助来作出正确的诊断。
en: These individuals often require the help of a cardiologist to make the proper diagnosis.

zh: 主动脉狭窄（瓣膜下的，瓣膜的和瓣膜上的）也能够引起胸痛，胸痛可以在用力时发生，也可以在安静时发生。
en: Aortic stenosis (subvalvular, valvular and supravalvular) also may cause chest pain, with or without exertion.

zh: 对这些患者进行听诊时常常会发现相应的杂音。
en: Appropriate murmurs are often present.

zh: 开放式的题目有时是为了拟订封闭式题目而设计的。
en: Sometimes open-ended questions are used to construct closed questions.

zh: 例如用来评量教学品质的项目，常常是从学生们对于课程喜欢和不喜欢的事项中整理出来的。
en: Student course evaluations are often developed by having students list all the things they like and dislike about a course.

zh: 学生们所提出的答案，经过归纳的过程，才形成各项封闭式的题目。
en: From such lists, closed questions are constructed by categorizing the open-ended responses.

zh: 对利迪亚德训练方案的挑战并不是从麦肯齐开始的。
en: Challenges to the Lydiard method did not start with MacKenzie.

zh: 最早的挑战之一起源于20世纪80年代，来自教练彼得•科埃。他为儿子——中长跑运动员塞巴斯蒂安•科埃，制定了一套高强度间歇训练方案（HIIT）。
en: One of the first came in the 1980s from coach Peter Coe, who adopted a type of high-intensity interval training (HIIT) for his son, middle-distance runner Sebastian Coe.

zh: 这套方案保证塞巴斯蒂安•科埃的周跑量在80千米以内，并结合200米一组、间歇为30秒的速度跑训练。
en: Their plan kept Seb’s total mileage under 50 miles per week and included fast 200-meter repeats with 30 seconds of recovery between the fast segments.

zh: 整套训练方案中还包括负重训练和增强式训练，和今天我们在训练馆里看到的传统CrossFit训练组合类似。
en: They also included weight training movements and plyometric exercises in a routine that looked similar to the typical CrossFit workouts one might see in a gym today.

zh: 辛格显然没有“内心不甘”，他必须“承受暴力再保持沉默”。
en: Harbhajan has clearly not "seethed within," having to "listen to abuses and keep quiet."

zh: 后殖民主义复仇叙事从来不被允许在这之中采用，尤其考虑到殖民统治者“分而治之”的策略。
en: The postcolonial revenge narrative can never be permitted to be directed within, especially given the divide-and-conquer strategies of colonial powers.

zh: 这内外的二元结构清晰地勾勒了辛格对与斯里山特发生肢体冲突后的反应。
en: This outsider-insider binary structure is clearly delineated in Harbhajan's reflection on the physical confrontation with Sreesanth.

zh: 另外，复合维生素能够推迟这一变性，或在某些情况下防止有些人的早期湿性黄斑变性转变成失明。
en: We also know that multivitamins can delay or in some cases prevent early wet macular degeneration from becoming ''eye blinding' in some people.

zh: 我们知道黄斑变性是由基因引起的，但更是由生活方式所造成。
en: We know that macular degeneration isn't as much of a genetic condition as it is one of lifestyle.

zh: 所以，选择正确的生活方式，保持血管年轻，你将会减少这两种形式的黄斑变性的发生几率。
en: So making lifestyle choices that keep your arteries young will reduce your chances of developing both forms of macular degeneration.

zh: 加强腹肌力量以支撑背部的最简单的方法之一就是保持良好的姿势。
en: One of the easiest ways to strengthen your abdominal muscles and support your back—is through good posture.

zh: 你自己可能觉得已经站得很直了，但实际上，我们大多数人的站姿都像比萨斜塔。
en: You may feel like you’re standing straight, but in reality, most of us stand like the Leaning Tower of Pisa.

zh: 要训练良好的体姿，就要让头和脖子往后靠。
en: Practice good posture by bringing your head and neck back.

zh: 高敏C反应蛋白衡量的是人体发炎的程度，包括了慢性瘘管炎 、尿道感染或牙龈发炎等各种情况。
en: HsCRP (hs stands for high sensitivity) measures the level of inflammation in your body, including anything from a chronic sinus infection to urinary-tract infections or gum inflammation.

zh: 这种蛋白质的含量越高，人体患上心脏病的几率也越高。因为体内发生的明显炎症都会增大血管发炎的可能。
en: If it is high, your risk of heart disease is higher, because any significant inflammation in your body increases inflammation in your blood vessels.

zh: 干细胞研究是最近几年最热门的。
en: One of the hottest political issues of the last few years has revolved around stem cell research.

zh: 干细胞是原始细胞，所有其他细胞的生成都是来自原始细胞。这些细胞的生成有多种可能，一个干细胞可以变成心脏细胞或血细胞。
en: Stem cells are the initial cells from which all other cells can be made—they have multiple potentials: A stem cell can turn into a heart cell or a brain cell or a blood cell.

zh: 在任何一所健身馆的举重间里，只有一件事比更衣室的气味更让人难以忍受，那就是炫耀男性气概。
en: In the weight room at any coed gytn, there's only one thing that smells worse than the locker room—the machismo.

zh: 小伙子们像烦躁的公牛一样嘟嘟囔囔，掀起衬衫比比看谁的腹肌更像车轮印。
en: Guys grunt like agitated bulls, and lift their shirts to see how closely their abs resemble tire treads.

zh: 不是每个健身馆都是这样，但是只要把一群充满男性激素的小伙子与杠铃摆到一起，就总有引人入胜的戏码上演。
en: Not every gym is like that, but there's always a fair share of one-upsmanship when you mix together a bunch of testosterone-filled guys with barbells.

zh: 高低桥是桥系列中第一个标准的“头手并列”姿势的练习。

en: Angled bridges are the first exercise in the bridging series to utilize the full “hands alongside head” position used in advanced bridging.

zh: 这种姿势会强化训练者的腕部，打开其肩部与胸部，为之后的动作打下基础。
en: This position will strengthen the wrists and open up the shoulders and chest in preparation for later exercises.

zh: 相比于之前的几式，此动作要求脊椎上部有更高的柔韧性和收缩力。
en: This motion also requires greater flexibility and contractile strength in the upper spine than the earlier steps.

zh: 如果父母一方或其他近亲在年轻时就患有心脏病或动脉硬化，你患病的几率就会比一般人大得多。
en: If a parent or other close family member developed heart disease or hardening of the arteries relatively early in life, your chances are significantly higher than the average person of developing it also.

zh: 类脂分泌异常的问题也可能遗传，也就是说，有含量过高或HDL含量过低的趋势。
en: Abnormalities in lipid production can be inherited—that is, a tendency to have higher HDL or lower HDL levels.

zh: 其他危险因素如高血压或高半胱氨酸含量高也会遗传。
en: Other risk factors like high blood pressure or high homocysteine levels can be inherited as well.

zh: 进行工作分析的方法步骤也不太一致,换句话说,差异很大。
en: The procedures in conducting a job analysis vary.

zh: 但是不管如何,工作分析的目的就是为了尽量去获取与工作相关的一些资讯,以及成功担任此工作所必须具备的一些条件。
en: The objective is to obtain as much relevant information as possible about the job and the job requirements.

zh: 一个办法就是对从事某职业的某人进行观察。
en: One method is to observe someone in the occupation.

zh: 年龄还会影响到代谢和生物力学指标，而这又会对运动时的能量消耗、做功量和工作效率发生作用。
en: Metabolic and biomechanical performance parameters are also influenced by age.These factors, in turn, contribute to the differences in energy cost, work and efficiency during exercise.

zh: 与成年人比较，儿童个子矮、腿短，致使在走步或跑步时的步幅较小、步频快。
en: Children are typically smaller, have shorter legs, causing their stride frequency during walking or running to be greater and their stride length to be shorter than in adults.

zh: 然而，在任何特定年龄，步幅与腿长的比值却很相近。
en: However, the ratio of stride length to leg length may be similar at any given age.

zh: 如果你真的在某个动作上碰到了问题，根本做不了几次，可以尝试巩固训练。
en: If you are really having a problem getting just a handful of reps on a particular exercise, try consolidation training.

zh: 这是我从一位狱友那里学来的。
en: Consolidation training is a handy little trick I learnt from a fellow prison athlete.

zh: 大多数时候，我们的训练应该集中于大约 10~25 次反复的范围内，这对关节、肌肉以及力量的发展都有好处。
en: Most of the time, you should focus on moderate to high repetitions, somewhere in the ten to twenty-five range.This is good for building strength, muscle, and joint integrity.

zh: 此外，能做更多次反复也意味着当你升级到更难的动作时，感觉会更轻松。
en: Higher reps also mean that when you move to harder exercises, they will seem easier by contrast.

zh: 巩固训练是处理这种状况的好办法。
en: Consolidation training is an excellent way of coping with this situation.

zh: 不是一周锻炼一两次，每次都努力增加次数，而是尝试每天都练习这个新动作，有时甚至是一天练习两三回。
en: Instead of working the new exercise once or twice a week and struggling to improve your reps every time, try working the new exercise every day—sometimes even twice or three times a day.

zh: 放松，然后每回不是尽可能做更多次，而是最多只做一两次。
en: Loosen up, then instead of doing as many reps as possible, only do one—two at the very most.

zh: 实验设计的方式有时也可用来证明构念效度。
en: An experimental approach is occasionally used in demonstrating construct validity.

zh: 例如，一个心肺适能的测验如果能反映体能训练后的适能进步，就会被认为是具有构念效度。
en: For example, a test of cardiorespiratory fitness might be assumed to have construct validity if it reflected gains in fitness following a conditioning program.

zh: 相同的，动作技能测验的编制者，可借由其测验得分能有效区别有接受教导与无接受教导的学童团体，因而证明此测验具有构念效度。
en: Similarly, the originator of a motor skills test could demonstrate construct validity through its sensitivity in differentiating between groups of instructed and noninstructed children.

zh: 骨豁宽度测量夹子（bone clipers)。
en: Bone calipers.

zh: 用于测量肱骨和股骨宽度的Mitutoyo骨骼夹子最先是由卡特（1980)接受和推荐的。
en: Adapted Mitutoyo bone calipers first described by Carter (1980) are recommended for humerus and femur widths.

zh: 这类夹子的夹臂较长，有15mrn直径的压力金属板。
en: These calipers have extended branches with round pressure plates of 15 mm diameter.

zh: Mitutoyo夹子的两臂间距较大，连动装置牢固，容易操作。
en: The inside diameter branches of the Mitutoyo caliper are removed and the locking device is fixed to permit easy manipulation.

zh: 罗斯等 (1993)详细说明过类似性质的电子装置，在非专业的机械商店里出售，但是，这种承接定做的夹子的价格令人望而却步。
en: An electronic version based on similar design features for replication in non-specialized machine shops has been specified by Ross et al. (1993), however, cost for such custom calipers may be prohibitive.

zh: 沃尔夫氏定律也同样适用于骨骼的密 度。
en: Wolff's law also applies to the density of bone.

zh: 大量的研究证实，运动员的骨骼矿物质密度（BMD)大于非运动员（Nilsson & Westlin, 1971; Bailey et al.，1986)。
en: Numerous studies have observed higher BMD values in athletes compared to nonathletes (Nilsson & Westlin, 19 71; Bailey et al., 1986).

zh: 长期 从事网球训练的运动员用力侧手臂的骨骼 矿物质含量高于非用力侧手臂（Huddleston et al.，1980; Pimay et al., 1987)。
en: Lifetime tennis players have significantly greater bone mineral content in the dominant arm in contrast to the non-dominant arm (Huddleston et al., 1980; Pirnay et al., 1987).

zh: 对有活 动和没有活动人群的横向比较研究显示， 骨骼矿物质密度与体力活动之间存在着正相关的关系（Snow-Harter & Marcus, 1991)。
en: Cross-sectional studies examining active and sedentary populations indicate a positive relationship between physical activity and BMD (Snow-Harter & Marcus, 1991).

zh: 通常情况下，人体可以循环利用陈旧的骨元素来更新骨骼。在更新过程中，人体新近吸收的钙和镁等物质也会存储在骨头里，令骨质坚硬紧密。
en: Normally, your body recycles old bone components to make new ones, and it also deposits new calcium and other minerals into your bones to make them hard and dense.

zh: 不过，人一过35岁，骨骼生长就停顿下来，骨密度逐渐降低，这就意味着骨头的硬性物质减薄，而那些小孔则会增大，骨骼会因此变得越来越空洞，越来越脆弱，更易于受到外部伤害而发生骨折。
en: But after you turn thirty-five, your bones stop growing and you gradually lose bone density, which means that those holes get larger while the hard substance gets thinner.So your bones become more porous, weaker, and more susceptible to injury and fractures if you don't do things to protect them from aging.

zh: 骨软骨炎导致骨骺异常骨化区域的分离。
en: Osteochondritis causes separation of abnormal ossification areas within the epiphysis.

zh: 骨软骨病是一种发育紊乱并与软骨骨化有关。
en: Osteochondroses are developmental disorders associated with anatomical sites undergoing transition from cartilage to bone.

zh: 此种紊乱的发生形式各异，帕帕斯（1989）指出生物力学因素在其中起重要作用。
en: These disorders occur in different forms, but biomechanical factors can play a role in the course of the disorder as described by Pappas (1989).

zh: 但并不是所有的癌症都是肿瘤或肿块，这使得它们更难诊断。
en: But not all cancers are tumors or lumps—making them even more difficult to diagnose.

zh: 血液类癌症，比如白血病就不是通常意义上的肿瘤，而是在骨髓中所积累的不正常的白细胞。它们聚集在一起，使得健康的白细胞和红细胞濒临饿死，即使你的身体无法保证不被感染，也不能输送你所需要的氧。
en: Blood-borne cancers such as leukemia are not like tumors in the usual sense.Instead, abnormal white blood cells accumulate in bone marrow and crowd or starve out healthy white and red blood cells—making your body unable to protect itself against infection and unable to deliver as much oxygen as you need.

zh: 骨的再成型虽然多见于青年人，但也是变更成人骨骼形态和重量的主要过程。
en: Remodelling, although present in young individuals, is the predominant bone process modifying shape and mass in adults.

zh: 与骨成型不同，骨再成型对骨质的储存库（bone bank)没有作用。
en: Unlike modelling, remodelling does not make a contribution to the 'bone bank'.

zh: 骨再成型的主要功能是修复日常的正常应力造成的骨豁微细的骨折（micro-fractures) (Prost, 1989b)。
en: The primary function of remodelling is to repair micro-fractures that occur with normal everyday stress (Frost, 1989b).

zh: 在正常的骨再成型过程中，骨豁再吸收成骨细胞（osteoblasts)和形成骨髂的破骨（osteoclasts)的作用同时发生，因此，随着再吸收就出现骨骼的形成作用。
en: In normal remodelling, the bone resorbing osteoclast cells and the bone-forming osteoblast cells are coupled so that formation follows resorption.

zh: 骨质疏松与其他疾病的根本不同之处在于病人根本不知道自己患上了骨质疏松。
en: What makes osteoporosis different from so many other conditions is that you may have no idea you even have it.

zh: 大多数情况下，骨质疏松没有任何症状出现，病人等到发生骨折时才会发觉。
en: In most cases, there aren't any symptoms until you break a bone.

zh: 在冰上滑了一跤，手臂骨折，你根本不会往得病那方面想，因为这样的意外造成骨折，是完全可以理解的；但是当你撞在门框上就会折了胳膊，这就是向你敲响警钟了：你骨骼已经很脆弱，可能是得了骨质梳松。
en: Break an arm when you slip on the ice, and you think nothing of the way it happened—you know that the trauma was significant enough to cause a break.But break an arm when you bump into the doorway, and it s a tip-off that your bones are much weaker than normal and that you may have osteoporosis.

zh: 慢性的病痛需要由医生诊断，而髋部疼痛并不意味着你患了关节炎。
en: Any chronic pain needs to be addressed by a doctor, but hip pain does not automatically mean you have arthritis.

zh: 如果疼痛来自髋部的前面——腹股沟区域，那可能就是某种关节炎的信号了。
en: If the pain is coming from the front of the hips, in the groin area, it's probably a sign of some form of arthritis.

zh: 但如果是体侧感觉疼痛，那很可能就是肌腱炎或滑囊炎。治疗的方法有很多种，主要是消炎药和物理疗法。
en: But if you’re experiencing some tenderness along the sides, your pain more likely stems from tendonitis or bursitis, which can be treated in a number of different ways, including anti-inflammatory medication and physical therapy.

zh: 对人施测取得的测验分数称为观察分数。
en: A test score obtained by a person is the observed score.

zh: 此分数不确定是否为此人能力或表现的真实评价 。
en: It is not known whether this is a true assessment of this person’s ability or performance.

zh: 测量误差可能会因测验指示、测量工具 、评分 、或是受测者情绪或生理状态而发生。
en: Measurement error may occur because of the test directions, the instrumentation, the scoring, or the person’s emotional or physical state.

zh: 因此 ，观察分数理论上是由受测者的真实分数以及误差分数组成。
en: Thus, an observed score theoretically consists of the person’s true score and error score.

zh: 关于过度训练的情况。
en: Overtraining concerns.

zh: 这是损伤的外因。
en: These constitute extrinsic factors for injury.

zh: 运动残疾常过度使用主要肢体或非假肢肢体，或截肢者使用替代假肢行走造成过度使用损伤。
en: Motor disabilities often result in either excessive use of a dominant or nonprosthetic limb or the use of alternative limbs for ambulation.

zh: 影响残疾儿童全面的身体素质水平的各种因素包括：1.残疾的性质。2.
en: A variety of factors affect the overall fitness levels of children with a disability including: 1 The nature of the disability.2

zh: 残疾的严重程度。3.
en: The severity of the disability.3

zh: 与社会文化因素有关的过分保护和运动机能的减退。
en: Overprotection  and hypokinesis  associated with sociocultural factors.

zh: 更为灵敏的影像技术，包括软组织X线照相技术，超声波技术，CT和核磁共振影像技术都曾经用于研究儿童力量训练对肌肉大小的影响（Vrijens，1978; Mersch & Stoboy, 1989; Kamsay et al., 1990; Fukunaga et al., 1992)。
en: More sensitive im aging techniques, including soft tissue roentgenography, ultrasound, computerized tomography and magnetic resonance imaging have also been used to investigate the effects of strength training on muscle size in children.

zh: 在两项研究中 (Vrijens, 1978; Blimkie et al，1990)，只 有前者发现发育期前的男孩的力量有显著的增强，但无肌肉肥大的证据。
en: Two of these studies, of which only the former resulted in a significant increase in strength, found no evidence of muscle hypertrophy in preadolescent boys.

zh: 但是，另外两项最新的研究报告发现抗阻训练引起发育期前的儿童的肌肉肥大。
en: Two other recent studies, however, have reported resistance traininginduced muscle hypertrophy in preadolescents.

zh: 默施和施托博伊（Mersch & Stoboy, 1989)报告说，在两名双胞胎男孩中力量训练引起双膝等长伸展力量明显增长以及通过核磁共振确定的股四头肌横截面积加大。
en: Mersch and Stoboy (1989) reported significant strength training-induced increases in both knee extension isometric strength and quadriceps muscle cross-sectional area determined by magnetic resonance im aging in two preadolescent twin boys.

zh: 后手翻动作快如闪电，需要亲身体验才能真正领会，所以动口不如动手，但我至少可以给你一些指点。
en: Back handsprings are a lightning fast move that need to be experienced to really be understood, so describing how to do them is kind of artificial, but I can at least give you a few pointers.

zh: 用力跳起，但不单单向上跳，而是既向上又向后跳。
en: Jump hard, but don’t jump up; jump up and back.

zh: 手臂随之尽快上摆，越过头顶向后摆。
en: Coordinate your arms with the movement, swinging up, overhead and back as fast as you can.

zh: 后背收紧成弓形，头部始终处于两臂之间，在地面上找个点放置双手。
en: Arch your back tight and keep your head back between your arms, looking for a place to plant your hands.

zh: 在发现这个点的同时，双腿也顺势上摆，惯性会完成其余的工作。
en: When you find one, continue swinging your legs as momentum carries you over.

zh: 前面引用的化石证据表明，我们人类祖先大约是在一百五十万至三百万年前，首次具备了长跑能力。
en: The fossil evidence cited previously suggests that our human ancestors first became equipped for distance running between 1.5 and 3.0 million years ago.

zh: 原始人类进化分支与其他灵长类分离出来是在五百万到八百万年前。
en: Now, the hominid evolutionary branch diverged from that of other primates 5 to 8 million ago.

zh: 重点是，进化的力量，使得现代人类成了可以长跑的动物，也在我们最近的祖先进化中扮演了重要角色（相对而言）。
en: The point is, then, that whatever Darwinian forces acted to make modern-day humans into distance running animals must have acted specifically on our closest ancestors (relatively speaking).

zh: 如果参考其他有氧耐力动物，这是显而易见的。
en: When thinking about other aerobic endurance animals, this is evident, too.

zh: 就女性而言，最重要的内部结构是子宫颈——向下开口，与阴道相通的子宫的颈部。宫颈在杯孕中发挥着重要作用。人体伸长宫颈让胚胎留在子宫里，然后宫颈缩短扩张，便于分娩生产。
en: On the female side, one of the most important internal structures to think about is the cervix—the neck of the uterus that opens downward to the vagina-The cervix plays an important role in pregnancy; it lengthens to hold the fetus in the uterus and then shortens and dilates to allow laborand delivery.

zh: 为了更好地预防损伤的发生，我们必须要知道，有相当部分的受伤儿童（32%)在过去一年曾在同一部位发生过损伤 。
en: With a view to prevention, it is very important to realize that a substantial number of the injured children (32%) had experienced the injury before at the same site within the past year (Nielsen & Yde, 1988).

zh: 女孩更容易发生再损伤。
en: Girls had the highest risk of reinjury.

zh: 踝关节扭伤与髌骨软化病是最容易复发的损伤。
en: Ankle sprain and chondromalacia of the patella reoccurred most frequently (DeHaven & Lintner, 1986; Backx, 1991).

zh: 它带来的问题是能抑制瘦素分泌，因此人的大脑就无法收到已吃饱的信息。
en: The problem is that HFCS inhibits leptin secretion, so you never get the message that you’re full.

zh: 与此同时，饥饿激素的分泌则会源源不绝，所以，尽管胃里已有食物，大脑还是不断地收到饥饿的信息。
en: And it never shuts off ghrelin, so, even though you have food in your stomach, you constantly get the message that you're hungry.

zh: 这两种人体激素出现的反常现象产生了巨大影响，很大程度上造成了美国全民普遍身形壮大。
en: The double whammy on our hormones has contributed enormously to our collective enormity.

zh: 许多美国女性每日摄入的热量，有多达50%来自色拉调料（其中含有高果糖玉米糖浆），原因显而易见。
en: When you consider that many American women often obtain as much of 50 percent of their daily calories from salad dressing (which contains HFCS), you can see the problem.

zh: 目前，通常将应力性骨折分为两类：(1) 机能不全骨折；（2)疲劳性骨折。
en: At the present time, stress fractures can be appropriately divided into two general categories:(i) insufficiency fractures; and(ii) fatigue fractures of bone.

zh: 此种分类方法最早由彭特科斯特等人提出 (Pentecost et al.，1994)。他指出：正常或生理性应力作用于结构缺陷的骨骼上时引起的是机能不全骨折；而过多的循环性应力作用于结构正常的骨骼上引起的是疲劳性骨折。
en: This division, first suggested by Pentecost et al. (1964), describes an insufficiency fracture as being produced by normal or physiological stresses applied to bone with deficient structural characteristics, while a fatigue fracture occurs when excessive cyclical stress is applied to bone of normal structure.

zh: 基于相同有氧功率水平，儿童要比成人在相同情况下付出更大的努力。
en: Based on similar levels of aerobic power children should be able to match adults in events that demand extended effort.

zh: 可是，儿童有氧能力比预期的髙要低。
en: However, the child is less of an aerobic performer than might be expected from the high V o 2max.

zh: 能力的差异与儿童的机械效率低有关，特别是行走和跑步是如此。
en: Differences in performance have been attributed to the mechanical inefficiency of children, especially in walking and running activities.

zh: 但是，至今还没有开展两性之间以及青少年与成年人之间对同样训练计划引起肌肥大的比较研究。
en: There are no studies to date, however, which permit a valid comparison between sexes of the relative hypertrophy responses to identical training programmes during adolescence, or between adolescents and adults.

zh: 肌肥大现象的共性是，肌肉力量的增幅往往要大于相应的肌肉形态的增幅。

en: Whatever the hypertrophy response, the magnitude of this morphological adaptation is small in comparison to the reported strength gains.

zh: 除了肌肉体积变化之外，一定还有其他因素参与了力量的增长过程。
en: Other factors besides changes in muscle size must also contribute to the strength gains.

zh: 最后，有两个想法突然浮现在脑海中，关于为什么自行车运动在节奏与经济性这个问题上是反常的。
en: And, finally, a couple of other ideas spring to mind as to why cycling may be an anomaly in this question of cadence and economy.

zh: 首先，因为自行车是台机器，也许它以递增负荷运转时，影响到人类的肌肉功能。
en: First, because the bicycle is a machine, maybe it operates outside of evolutionary forces that have influenced human muscle function.

zh: 其次，或许这解释在某种程度上是事实，即自行车不允许你增加步幅，只有节奏。
en: And, second, perhaps the explanation is somewhere in the fact that a bicycle does not permit you to increase stride length, only cadence.

zh: 在过去的十几年里，类似迪查理的说法开启了新一轮关于灵活性——脚部的、腿部的和臀部的——的讨论。
en: Over the past decade, voices like Dicharry’s have opened up a new discussion regarding the power of mobility—in the feet, legs, and hips.

zh: 人们指出，为了恢复灵活性和弹性，跑者需要对脚部、腓肠肌、腿绳肌、股四头肌和臀部肌肉进行按摩，然后训练使用臀部和下脊椎保持良好的姿势。
en: To restore mobility and elasticity, they say, runners need to spend time massaging their feet, calf muscles, hamstrings, quads, and hips, and then do exercises to develop and sustain good positions with the hips and lower spine.

zh: 我们在这里所讨论的灵活性训练课程是包含在CFE计划中的，目的是通过功能性力量练习训练良好的肌肉控制方式，更好地使用腿部的弹性机能。
en: A mobility program, like the one outlined here within the CFE model, trains good muscle recruitment patterns through functional strength exercises to make better use of the spring like elasticity that we can tap from our legs.

zh: 然而，CPGs不应该与大脑运动中枢混淆，后者的功能是发出肌肉收缩的信号并有目的地控制肌肉活动。
en: However, CPGs should not be confused with brain motor centers, which signal muscle contraction and control purposeful motor activity.

zh: 它们有不同的任务。
en: Theirs is a different task.

zh: CPGs被分配给潜意识的特殊作用，是控制活动的节律和节奏。
en: CPGs are assigned the specific role of subconsciously controlling the rhythmicity and tempo of that activity.

zh: 它们与来自大脑皮层的运动控制区域不同，我们可以随意指挥它们的活动。
en: They are distinct from motor control areas in the cerebral cortex that we can willfully command.

zh: 在某种程度上，应用性研究的优势为基础性研究的弱势，反之亦然。
en: To some extent, the strengths of applied research are the weaknesses of basic research, and vice versa.Considerable controversy exists in the literature on social science (e.g.

zh: 有关到底研究应该要更基础性一点还是应用性一点，在社会科学(与身体活动心理学里一直都有争议。
en: , Creswell, 2009; Jewczyn, 2013) and physical activity (e.g., Christina, 1989) about whether research should be more basic or more applied.

zh: 而生态效度旨在处理下列二个问题，研究参与者所知觉的研究环境是否和实验者原先的想法一致？
en: This issue, labeled ecological validity, deals with two concerns: Is the research setting perceived by the research participant in the way intended by the experimenter?

zh: 研究的情境是否和真实情境有足够的相似度而能将研究的结果类推到真实的环境中？
en: Does the setting have enough of the real-world characteristics to allow generalizing to reality?

zh: 我采用了一个衍生训练计划，包括基础训练阶段、坡度跑训 练阶段和速度训练阶段。
en: I used a derivative plan that included a base-building phase, a hill phase, and a speed phase.

zh: 训练计划规定每隔一周进行一次长距离慢跑训练，每次逐渐增加距离到32干米以上。
en: The plan prescribed a long run every other week, which slowly increased to more than 20 miles.

zh: 速度训练阶段包括一系列 1.6千米等距离间歇跑，每次训练最多为10组。
en: The speed phase included a session of mile repeats, peaking with a total of more than 10×1 mile for a single workout.

zh: 人类可以推动自己在l00m直线跑道上最快到多少？
en: What’s the very fastest that humans can propel themselves down a  100-meter straightaway?

zh: 为了解决这一问题，研究人员绘制了不同比赛日期的短跑世界纪录，将点连接起来，推断未来，并试图得出结论。
en: So, investigators plot world-record sprinting  times against race competition dates, connect the dots, extrapolate to the future, and attempt to draw conclusions.

zh: 这个问题并不是微不足道的。
en: The issue is far from trivial.

zh: 事实上，它可以从许多角度观察，数学、生理学、 社会学，甚至是哲学。
en: Indeed, it can be viewed from a variety  of mathematical, physiological, sociological, and even philosophical perspectives.

zh: 它直接关系着一些重大问题，像性别平等，基因工程伦理学， 以及人类的本质是什么。
en: It has bearing on such weighty questions as sexual equality, ethics of genetic engineering, and the essence of what it means to be human.

zh: 肌腱与韧带一同支撑着整个脊柱，每块椎骨有个孔，这些孔连成一线，形成了长长的管道，管道内含脊髓，由大脑基部向下一直延伸至脊柱末端。
en: Tendons and ligaments hold the entire spine together, and an opening in each vertebra line up form a long hollow canal that houses the spinal cord from the base of the brain down the spine.

zh: 脊髓中的小神经元通过椎骨间的间隙伸出脊柱。一旦脊柱受到过大扭力，椎间盘就会被挤出，这就造成了椎间盘突出，就好比用力压面圈，果冻会被挤出一样。
en: Small nerves from the spinal cord jet out the spine through the space between the vertebrae.A bulging or herniated disc happens when too much torque is put on the spine and the disc bulges out, like pinching the doughnut so the jelly oozes out.

zh: 就绦虫而言，它们生活在你的肠道中，能长到6米多长（大约两层楼高）。
en: In the case of tapeworm, it lives in your intestine—and can grow up to twenty-two feet long (about the height of a two-story building).

zh: 寄生虫常见子不卫生的食物和水 源，并在全世界每年造成四百万例的痢 疾。这对每个人都不是个好消息（但这对 卫生纸厂来说也许是个好消息）。
en: Parasites are most common in unsanitary food and poor water supplies and are responsible for 4 billion cases of diarrhea around the world every year—bad news for everyone (except maybe Charmin).

zh: 最早的加速度测量仪是在自动手表的基础上改良的，在加速度测量仪上转子是直接与手连接的。
en: The first accelerometers were based on a modified automatic wrist watch in which the rotor was directly connected to the hands.

zh: 动作强度越大，转子旋转也就越快。
en: The stronger the movement the faster the turning of the rotor.

zh: 在儿童中，佩戴在踝部的加速度测量仪在步行和 跑步时，其读数确实能够反映能量消耗量的差别，精度合适（Saris & Binkhorst，1977) 。
en: For accelerometers worn on the ankle, readings do reflect the differences in energy turnover during walking and running in children with reasonable accuracy (Saris & Binkhorst, 1977).

zh: 甲状腺位于脖子后面的两侧基部 (见图11.2)。它呈蝴蝶状，接收到从脑垂体总部那里发出的信号之后，就会分泌甲状腺素。
en: Located at the base of the neck on both sides (Figure 11.2), the butterfly- shaped thyroid gland produces, tada, thyroid hormone after receiving chemical signals from General Pituitary.

zh: 甲状腺素的主要功用是调节你的细胞的新陈代谢,也就是造成细胞生存、生长和死亡的化学变化。
en: The main function of the thyroid hormone is to regulate the metabolism of your cells, that is, the chemical changes in your cells that cause them to live, grow, and die.

en: Located at the base of the neck on both sides (Figure 11.2), the butterfly- shaped thyroid gland produces, tada, thyroid hormone after receiving chemical signals from General Pituitary.

zh: 第一式肩倒立深蹲最容易，第十式单腿深蹲最难。
en: Step 1, the shoulderstand squat, is the easiest version of the movement; Step 10, the full one-leg squat, is the hardest variation.

zh: 几乎人人都能做肩倒立深蹲，即使他的身体很弱。相反，几乎没人能够第一次就完成单腿深蹲，不管他多么健康、多么强壮。
en: Almost everybody will be able to do shoulderstand squats straight away, no matter how weak or infirm they are; hardly anybody will be able to do one-leg squats on the first time of asking, no matter how fit or strong they are.

zh: 我之所以构建这样的体系，就是为了让健身者做自己的教练，从而在没有器械辅助的情况下，慢慢到达能够做上20-50次单腿深蹲。
en: The purpose of this structure is to allow the individual trainee—training alone as his own coach, and with no special equipment—to work his way up gradually to be able to do one-leg squats for sets of twenty to fifty reps.

zh: 已知髙度的盒子配合分段人体测量器可以用于测量延伸身高。
en: A box of known height is part of the protocol for measuring some of the projected heights in conjunction with the segmometer.

zh: 有提手口的长方形盒子能够让测试者依据受试者的不同身材随意转动。
en: The oblong box with slotted handholds enable the anthropometrist to turn the box to accommodate subjects of different size.

zh: 此外，它可以当做座位或者让受试者站在上面，便于测量。盒子还可以让检测者站在上面测量身材高大受试者的伸展身高和肩峰间距。
en: In addition to providing a place for seating or elevating standing subjects for convenience of measurement, the box also serves as a step for the anthropometrists who may stand on it to obtain stretch stature or biacromial breadth in tall subjects.

zh: 戴维斯并未对此差别进行解释。
en: The discrepancy is not discussed by Davies.

en: Ikai and Fukunuga measured strength in the arm flexors and Davies the triceps surae muscle.

zh: 差异可能就是由此产生的，还可能是测量最大自主收缩力量和肌肉横截面积的方法上的差异引起的。
en: The discrepancy may be due to this, and/or to methodological differences in the assessment of either maximal voluntary force or CSA of the muscles involved.

en: In exercising muscle, Po2 and pH are low and lactate concentrations are high.

en: Similar conditions can be found in the interior milieu of wounds.

zh: 正在愈合的伤口特征是形成新毛细血管和胶原蛋白。大量研究人员对pH值和呼吸气体浓度的变化可能对促生长作用进行了研究。
en: The healing wound is characterized by new capillary and collagen formation, and a number of investigators have focused on possible growth-promoting effects of the changes in pH and respiratory gas concentrations.

zh: 在组织水平上，伤口愈合和运动引起的合成代谢之间是否存在着共同的机制？
en: Might there be common mechanisms at the tissue level linking wound healing with exercise-induced anabolism?

zh: 肥胖的少年利用运动来减肥能够增强自尊和社交的自信心。
en: The obese adolescent who uses exercise to lose weight may improve in self-esteem and social confidence.

zh: 依据成年人的模式，很可能体力活动可以缓解压力、焦虑和抑郁，这些都是青少年人群的主要问题。
en: It is possible, based on adult models, that physical activity can help relieve feelings of stress, anxiety and depression, major problems for the teenage population.

zh: 参加体育活动能够不同程度提高自我观念 (self-concept)，提高教学的协作效果 (teaching cooperation)和自我约束的能力 (self-discipline),可以预防青少年的不良行为（delinquency)和提高学习成绩（Segrave， 1983; Sonsstroem, 1984; Kirkendall, 1986) 。
en: Participation in sports has been variously promoted as a means of improving self-concept, teaching cooperation and self-discipline, preventing juvenile delinquency, and improving academic performance (Segrave, 1983; Sonstroem, 1984; Kirkendall, 1986).

zh: 我们的目标是要评估经过挑选的有关波特兰和查特曼教练生涯的新闻报道，来了解在故事情节中，异性恋主义和新自由主义意识形态是如何展现 的。
en: Our goal was to evaluate selected news coverage from the coaching careers of Portland and Chatman to understand how heterosexual and neoliberalist ideology manifested in storylines.

zh: 我们不会试图分析所有有关这些教练的报道，而是会选择性地分析一些主流新闻媒体的报道，如ESPN、《纽约时报》和其他有影响力的或者流传度比较高的信源，以及来自他们执教过的大学的信息。
en: We did not seek to analyze all coverage of these coaches but instead chose for analysis coverage from major news outlets, such as ESPN, The ~Ne<w York Times, and other influential or high-circulation sources, and from the universities at which they coached.

zh: 我们总共阅读了45 篇有关查特曼和5 0篇有关波特兰的故事，因为波特兰的职业生涯比查特曼更长。
en: In total, we read 45 stories about Chatman and 50 about Portland, whose career lasted far longer than Chatman's.

zh: 儿童下肢损伤的常见部位之一是股骨远端骨骺（Grana，1990)。
en: One of the most common locations of lower extremity injury in children is the distal femoral epiphysis (Grana, 1990).

en: This injury is often the result of a severe torsional stress that may be produced in a cutting movement observed in such sports as basketball and soccer or a valgus force directed at the flexed knee often seen in contact sports.

zh: 此种力量或撞击在青少年中常导致骨骺骨折，而非成年人中常见的内侧副韧带损伤，则是因为青少年靭带的强度比邻近的骺板和关节软骨大。
en: The force or impact usually results in a fracture through the epiphyseal plate instead of a sprained medial collateral ligament more commonly seen in adults.As opposed to the adult sprain, an epiphyseal fracture is seen in children because the knee ligament of the child is stronger than the adjac­ ent femoral physeal plate and articular cartilage.

en: The different rhythmical stereotypies appear and peak at different ages.

en: The number of patterns increases while the actual frequency of expression declines toward the end of the first year.

en: It has been proposed that these rhythmical stereotypies are manifestations of immature sensorimotor integration of inherent motor patterns and that they provide the temporal substrata for coordinated movements.

en: Disease outcomes should have a case definition that the authors use to guide the researchers in the classification of the outcome status.

zh: 茎突间线（mid-stylion line)。
en: Mid-stylion line.

zh: 受试者右侧肘关节屈曲，手掌向上。
en: The subject flexes at the elbow and presents the right wrist, palmar surface upward.

zh: 1.在掌侧，用左拇指和食指将软尺围绕手腕，将尺子的近端边缘固定在尺骨和桡骨茎突最末端。
en: 1 Wrap the tape around the wrist pinning it distal to the stylion ulnare and stylion radiale on the dorsal surface with your left thumb and second digit.

zh: 2.在腕部掌侧中部尺子的近端边缘画一条短线。
en: 2 Draw a small line on the palmar surface at the proximal border of the tape in the midportion of the wrist.

zh: 3.放开尺子，估计受试者手腕的中部并在上面与前面的线画一个十字交叉。
en: 3 Release the tape and estimate the mid-portion of the subject's wrist and make a cross on the previous line.

zh: 4.核查该十字交叉是否位于手腕中部，并同指尖在一条线上，指尖是指在手 和手指同时伸展时第三指骨的最远端。
en: 4 Check that the cross is in the mid-portion and in line with the dactylion, the most distal point on the terminal phalanx III when the hand is extended with the fingers together.

zh: 角膜是有弹性的，能保护晶状体不受擦伤。
en: The resilient cornea protects the lens from getting scratched.

zh: 晶状体会把我们看到的影像翻转投射到视网膜。晶状体接触过阳光，就会产生白内障。
en: The lens, which is prone to cataracts from sun exposure, projects a lipped version of what we really see onto our retina.

zh: 而如是青光眼，一种负责排干眼内液体的小梁就会关闭，造成液体堆积和液体压力增大，从而损坏视神经。
en: In glaucoma, the trabecula that usually drains fluid from the eye can dose, causing a buildup of fluid and pressure of that fluid that then damages the optic nerve.

zh: 在眼睛后面的膨胀突出的脂肪会使眼睛更突出。
en: Fat bulging behind the eyes makes them seem more prominent and attractive.

zh: FFB是从密度、水分和骨骼矿物质的测量进行计算的（公式33.2)。
en: FFB was computed from density, water and bone mineral measurements (eqn 33.2).

zh: 将H2/R、体重和性别作为独立变量进行分析。
en: The analysis was carried out utilizing H2/R, body weight and gender as independent variables.

zh: 正如预料的那样，两种仪器估测FFB的精度是一样的,只是在所使用的公式方面有一点的不同。
en: As expected, the precision of estimating FFB was similar for both instruments, with slight variation noted in the actual prediction equations as indicated below.

zh: 颈前深蹲将杠铃放置在肩膀上方。
en: Front SquatPlace the barbell on the front of your shoulders and across your chest.

zh: 保持重心在身体的前部，这项练习会比空蹲调动更多的股四头肌力量。
en: With the weight racked in front of your body, you’ll engage more of the quads than you do in an air squat.

zh: 在整个颈前深蹲的练习中，重点使用臀部力量，向上起运动员时钟：生物学和时间因素如何影响运动表现注意肘部发力。
en: Throughout the front squat, concentrate on driving with the hips and powering upward with your elbows.

zh: 同时，巨噬细胞从外来细胞那里获取信息，以便免疫系统能够认识它。
en: At the same time, the macrophage takes down information about the foreign cells so that the immune system can recognize it.

zh: 这一信息其实就是把这种细菌列在你身体里的“通缉要犯”的名单上。巨噬细胞由此让别的细胞知道该攻击什么。
en: Essentially, that information is what puts the bacteria on your body’s Most Wanted List, as the macrophages let other cells know what to attack.

zh: 所有这些信息被传递给免疫细胞之后，后援免疫细胞开始到达感染现场，他们会寻找信号——嫌疑犯照片——来确认并除去有害细菌。
en: As all of this information is being relayed, the backup immune cells are starting to arrive on the scene of the infection.They'll look for the code—the mug shot—to identify and obliterate harmful bacteria.

zh: 使用决定系数诠释相关系数时，亩以明显了解相当程度的相关是达到大量共同变异量的前提 。
en: When we use the coefficient of determination to interpret correlation coefficients, it becomes apparent that a rather substantial relationship is needed to account for a great amount of common variance.

zh: 若要说明另一项测验中一半的变异量，相关系数为.7 1有其必要性；而相关系数.90 只能够解释另一项测验中81%的变异量。
en: A correlation of .71 is required to account for just half the variance in the other test, and a correlation of .90 accounts for only 81%.

zh: 在一些预测学业成就的标准化测验中，相关系数经常是相当低的，通常落在.40。
en: In some of the standardized tests used to predict academic success, correlations are generally quite low, often around .40.

zh: 从决定系数可以看出在相关系数为.40时，只能够解释16%影响学业成就的因素；因此，仍有大量未解释的变异量 。
en: You can see by the coefficient of determination that a correlation of .40 accounts for only 16% of the factors contributing to academic success; therefore, unexplained variance is substantial.

zh: 当女性乳房发现肿块时，常常会产生最大的健康问题。
en: The primary health concern —cancer—usually starts when a woman (or her partner) finds a lump in her breast.

zh: 这种肿块约有80%是囊肿，不会癌变。
en: About 80 percent of these lumps are cysts—benign lumps that do not become cancerous.

zh: 但是在囊肿被初次发现时，很难区分它与癌症之间的差别（直到做了活体组织检査后才能判断确定）。
en: But they're hard to differentiate from cancers when they're first found (until a biopsy is performed).

zh: 在月经来潮前，囊肿会变大变软，绝经后就停止生长。
en: Cysts, which stop with menopause, are larger and more tender just before periods.

zh: 激素含童失衡是一种可能的原因。为了防治囊肿，应避免食用含中基黄嘌呤的食品，比如咖啡、红茶和可乐。
en: A hormonal imbalance is the likely cause; to help prevent cysts, avoid methylxanthines, which are found in coffee, black tea, and colas.

zh: （第11章将对乳腺癌作进一步讨论。）
en: (See more on breast cancer in Chapter 12.)

zh: 来自呼吸仓研究的结果说明，相关系数甚至更高 (r= 0.92) (Schutz et al，1988)。
en: Results from a respiration chamber study showed even better results (r = 0.92) (Schütz et al., 1988).

zh: 在 25 项以上的研究中，采用不同技术（从心率记录到问卷调查）来验证Caltrac加速度测量仪的有效 性，结果表明Caltrac的仪器间的变异性很低，在有控制的实验室条件下其有效性很好。
en: In over 25 studies using different techniques ranging from H R recording to questionnaire to validate the Caltrac, that the interinstrument variability of the instrument was low and its validity was good under controlled laboratory conditions.

zh: 用三轴向加速度测量仪取代单一平 面的加速度测量仪的初步结果表明，能够 稍稍提高对每天能量消耗量的评估。
en: Initial results with the use of triaxial accelerometer instead of the single-plane instruments suggest a little better estimate of daily energy turnover.

zh: 抗胆减能药物（anticholinergic agents) 由于迷走兴奋能增加安静时支气管活动张力，所以抗胆碱能药物像阿托品一样能使一些人的支气管扩张。
en: Anticholinergic agents.Since vagal input increases resting bronchomotor tone, anti­cholinergic agents like atropine may cause bronchodilatation in some people.

zh: 溴化异丙托品 (ipratropium bromide) (Atrovent)是阿托品的一种季铵衍生物，当用定量-剂量吸入器吸入时，吸收量很少，因此阿托品样副作用（口干，视觉问题等）减少了。
en: Ipratropium bromide (Atrovent) is a quartemary ammonium derivative of atropine, and when taken by metered-dose inhaler, is absorbed only poorly, thus reducing atropine-like side-effects (dry mouth, visual problems, etc.).

zh: 溴化异丙托品对某些患者有用，但预防运动性哮喘的作用稍差（Lemanske & Henke，1988）。
en: Ipratropium bromide has become a useful agent for some patients, but has only moderate effectiveness in preventing EIA (Lemanske & Henke, 1989).

zh: 体内的入侵者被巨噬细胞吞下并处理掉，巨噬细胞送出的化学信息（细胞活类素）吸引着别的白血球。
en: An invader into the body is ingested and processed by macrophages that send chemical messages (cytokines) that attract other white blood cells.

zh: （这种细胞分裂素有的时候会引起发烧、头疼和肌肉疼。
en: (The cytokines can sometimes also cause fever, headache; and muscle pain.)

zh: ）做出反应的白细胞紧贴着巨噬细胞以获取更多关于入侵细菌的信息，并生成一种特殊的防御机制——把T细胞和B细胞召集到被感染区。
en: Responding white cells attach to the macrophage so they can learn more about the invaders and develop specialized defense mechanisms—in the form of calling T cells and B cells to the area.

zh: T细胞直接杀死入侵细菌或者帮助调整免疫系统的反应。
en: The T cells directly kill the invader or help coordinate the immune response.

zh: B细胞制造抗体像子弹一样摧毁入侵细菌。
en: The B cells create antibodies that act like bullets to destroy the invaders.

zh: 当他们完成任务，多余的白细胞将会杀死它们自己(细胞自杀机制），以使它们不会误杀我们自身健康的细胞，造成自体免疫性疾病。
en: When done, the excess white blood cells kill themselves (apoptosis) so that they won't kill our own healthy cells by mistake and cause an autoimmune disease.

zh: 在第7章中你会看到，适当的统计分析需要具备统计考验力(power)。
en: As you will see in chapter 7, appropriate statistical analysis demands statistical power.

zh: 考验力受到样本大小的影响;较大的样本大致上会具有较强的考验力，来辨别关联性或差异性。
en: Power is influenced by sample size; larger samples generally have more power to detect relationships or differences.

zh: 当研究者所计画的研究是将原有单位（前一个例子中的班级或学校）分派到不同处置时，就必须提早考虑适当的分析单位对于考验力的影响。
en: In planning studies in which intact units (classes or schools in the previous example) are assigned to a treatment, the effect of the appropriate unit of analysis on power should be considered early.

zh: 我们也以较哲学性的讨论科学与求知的方法，提出从事研究的另类方式。
en: We also present alternative approaches for doing research relative to a more philosophical discussion of science and ways of knowing.

zh: 尤其是，我们探讨使用质性研究、实地研究，与以内省的方法作为回答研究问题的策略。而非依赖传统的科学典范架构作为研究问题探讨的唯一方法。
en: In particular, we address qualitative research, the use of field studies, and methods of introspection as strategies for answering research questions instead of relying on the traditional scientific paradigm as the only approach to research problems.

zh: 可信性被用来决定研究是否具一定水准。
en: Trustworthiness is used to determine whether the study was competent.

zh: 伦理问题，也就是研究如何进行的相关议题(例如确实性、可转换性、可靠性、可确认性)，在决定可信性时扮演重要的角色。
en: Ethical issues are important in determining trustworthiness, as are issues related to how the study was conducted (i.e., credibility, transferability, dependability, confirmability).

zh: 资料搜集与分析的过程中，我们会运用许多方法来提升资料与结论的品质，包括延长相处时间、回首来时路、丰富、深度描绘、研究偏见的厘清、三角检证、负面案例检证、成员检证与对同侪简报,在单一研究中并非所有方法都会用到，但提升读者对于结论的信心而使用大部分方法是很常见的，也可提升将研究结果移转到其他情境的信心。
en: Many techniques are used during data collection and analysis to enhance the quality of the data and the conclusions.Among these are prolonged engagement, keeping an audit trail, providing a thick and rich description, clarifying researcher bias, triangulation, negative case checking, member checking, and peer debriefing.Not all of these can be used in one study, but using most or many is common to enhance the faith that readers can place in the conclusions and the transferability to other settings.

zh: 然而值得一提的是，若不是因为Muhammad Ah在拳击上的成就，他也不会有如此大的影响。
en: It is important to note that Muhammad Ah would not have had such an impact were it not for his boxing ability.

zh: 因此，“拆解”跟“组合”对于历史学家而言，是同等重要的。
en: Thus, it is critical for historians to be aware of both splitting and lumping.

zh: 体育运动史学家需要能够获得证据、具批判性地确定其可信性，并了解这证据是如何影响我们对现象的理解。
en: A sport historian needs to be able to obtain evidence, critically ascertain its trustworthiness, and then understand how it adds to our greater understanding of the phenomenon being investigated.

zh: 这一部份揭露的是：历史学家所追求去获得更多了解的方式，与研究人员所采取何种理论观点，有着直接的关系。
en: As this section will reveal, the way historians have sought to gain a greater understanding is directly related to the theoretical perspectives taken by researchers.

zh: 荷尔蒙和生殖疾病影响10%的女性。
en: The hormonal and reproductive disease affects 10 percent of women.

zh: 它会导致肥胖、经期不规律、痤疮，需要打蜡剃胡须，和/或导致血糖升高，不良胆固醇（和低健康胆固醇）升高，或血压（代谢综合征）升高。
en: It causes obesity, irregular periods, acne, the need to wax your mustache, and/or ele¬vations in blood sugar, lousy cholesterol (and low healthy cholesterol), or blood pressure (metabolic syndrome).

zh: 口服避孕药可以有效治疗这些症状，但如果你想怀孕，药物二甲双胍和克罗米特（克罗米芬）可以有所帮助。
en: Oral contraceptives are very effective at treating symptoms, but if youVe trying to get pregnant, the medications metformin and Clo- mid (clomiphene) can help.

zh: 每天睡大约7个小时可以对大脑和心脏产生深远影响，能让你年轻3岁。
en: Getting about 7 hours of sleep a night can make a profound difference on your brain and your heart and make you up to three years younger.

zh: 相反，缺乏睡眠会让你大脑注意力不集中，令你更加疲倦，让你吃得更多，发生意外的危险增高。
en: Lack of sleep makes you less mentally aware and more fatigued, causes you to eat more, and places you at a higher risk of accidents.

zh: 如果你患有睡眠呼吸暂停综合征，这说明你无法经历快速动眼期睡眠和慢波睡眠，不能通过睡眠完全恢复精力。
en: But if you have sleep apnea, it means you're simply not getting enough of the rejuvenating REM and slow-wave sleep.

zh: 大范围伸展的夹子。
en: Wide spreading caliper.

zh: 大范围伸展的夹子是用于测量胸廓的厚度的，但是，人体测量器或者宽范围的滑动夹子带有内弯的双臂可以作为替代之用。
en: The large wide spreading caliper (Siber-Hegner, GPM) is the instrument of choice for anteroposterior chest depth.However, anthropometers or wide sliding calipers with recurved branches may be used as a substitute.

zh: 新型的Campbell 10型夹子有备用的橄榄枝样的指示器，用于测量胸廓的宽度。
en: The new Campbell Caliper 10 has optional olive-tipped pointers that attach for this purpose.

zh: 第二部分的案例研究从一个广泛的维度考察了个人体育项目中英雄的坠落以及团队体育项目中当个人成为焦点而团队被忽略的情形。
en: Case studies in the second section consider a wide range of offenses that have brought down heroes in individual sports where the athlete becomes a brand and where responsibilities to team are not featured.

zh: 安德鲁•比林斯考察了高尔夫巨星泰戈尔• 伍兹在他的婚姻和性关系中是如何“粗鲁着地”，并且由于辩解书策略的错误行为导致问题复杂化的概要。
en: Andrew Billings examines the headline case of how golf great Tiger Woods landed "in the rough" with his marriage and sexual relations and compounded this by mishandling strategies of apologia.

zh: 李•哈林顿和金•施梅尔通过安德鲁• 阿加西对形象、重构与忏悔的协商来图解“网球名流的潮涨潮落”。
en: Lee Harrington and Kim Schimmel chart the "tides of tennis celebrity" in Andre Agassi's negotiations of image, reconstruction, and confession.

zh: 林茜•米恩对径赛明星玛丽安•琼斯的研究展示了传媒对于人们理解她首先作为“黄金女孩”，然后通过个人关系中的欺骗行为和服用有助于提高成绩的药物的框架演变史中性别和种族等问题所起到的作用。
en: Lindsey Mean's study of track star Marion Jones shows the role that gender and race played in the evolution of media framing her first as "Golden Girl" and then as flawed and fraud in her personal relations and drug-aided performance.

zh: ★老年斑:能够漂白的退色素乳霜可以淡化色斑的颜色。
en: ★ Liver spots: Fading creams that bleach can soften their color.

zh: ★眼袋：眼袋是遗传性的，是由眼睹周围的脂肪堆积造成。
en: ★ Eye bags: They're hereditary and caused by a collection of fat around your eyes.

zh: 缺乏睡眠和酒精摄人过量会加剧这一现象。
en: Lack of sleep and too much alcohol exaggerate the problem.

zh: 每天应该至少吃一把坚果。
en: Eat at least one handful of nuts a day.

zh: 坚果是健康脂肪和健康蛋白质的理想来源。坚果还富含类黄酮化合物，这是一种解毒剂。
en: Nuts are an excellent source of both healthful fats and healthful protein; they also can be concentrated sources of flavonoids, an antioxidant (see below).

zh: “爱荷华州保健调查”和三次其他调查表明，每日食用28克坚果，会使心脏病发生的几率减少20%至60%。
en: In the Iowa Nurses Study and three other studies, one ounce of nuts a day decreased the incidence of heart disease between 20 and 60 percent.

zh: HDL的含量是越高越好，因此一名55岁女性的HDL含量60mg/dl与39mg/dl相比，能年轻4岁。实际上，你应该确保在每日摄入的热量中，健康脂肪要占到大约25%。
en: When it comes to HDL, higher is better—so an HDL level of 60 versus one of 39 will make the average fifty-five-year-old woman four years younger In fact, you should make sure that healthy fat makes up about 25 percent of your daily calories.

zh: 植物和类黄酮化合物，还有刚才告诉你的窍门都已被证实能提升HDL含量。
en: Vegetables and flavonoids, in addition to the tricks we told you above, have also been shown to raise HDL.

zh: 通常 ，若效果量无法服从一样的形态，也许可以考虑加入其他的特征到模型里（例如：发表或未发表的研究）。
en: Often, the ESs that do not follow the same pattern may suggest other characteristics that can be added to the model (e.g., published vs. unpublished studies).

zh: 除此之外，某些效果量也许是离群值（非代表性的分数）。
en: Moreover, some ESs may represent outliers (unrepresentative scores).

zh: 在这两个情况下，离群值技术的使用对于确认这些效果量就有帮助。
en: In either case, the use of outlier techniques is helpful in identifying these ESs.

zh: 李克特氏类型的量表最大的好处是意见反馈选择范围更大，而不是像总是或从不、是或否这种回应。
en: A principal advantage of scaled responses such as the Likert type is that they permit a wider choice of expression than responses such as always or never, or yes or no.

zh: 使用五点、七点、或更多间隔有助于增加工具的信度。
en: The five, seven, or more intervals may help increase the reliability of the instrument.

zh: （对李克特氏量表、语意差异量表、以及其他量表更全面的信息请参见Edwards,1957, Nunnaly, 1978.)
en: (For more comprehensive information concerning the Likert-type scale, semantic differential scale, and other scales, see Edwards, 1957, and Nunnaly, 1978.)

zh: “虽然许多过程可以在历史中辨别出来，但将历史本身视作一个过程来讨论，又是另一回事。《从仪式到纪录——现代运动的本质》发表在理论尚于形成阶段的时期中，在当时，受到现在后现代学者所鄙视的发展叙说，还处于一个模糊的阶段”(2001, p. 13)。Booth虽然曾高度赞扬《从仪式到纪录——现代运动的本质》这本书，不过也指出Guttmann的研究仅提供了一个“现代化的进程和现代化本质的有限概念，且缺乏足够的政治和辩证分析”（2001，p.22)。
en: “While many processes are identifiable in history,” wrote Howell, “it is another thing altogether to understand history itself as a process.
