From Ritual to Record was written at a time of grand theorizing, when the grand narratives of development that postmodernist scholars now disdain were clearly in vogue” (2001, p. 13), Booth generally had high praise for the book, but claimed that Guttmann’s work provides a “limited conceptualization of the process of modernization and the nature of modernity” and “lacks adequate political and dialectical analyses” (2001, p. 22).

zh: 图3.1中显示了我在2013年 10月 24 日进行CrossFit “ met-con” 训练时的心率数据。
en: Figure 3.1 shows the heart rate profile of a CrossFit “met-con” workout that I did on October 24, 2013.

zh: “ met-con” 是 “ metabolic conditioning” 的缩写，意味着在这个测试过程中持久力和耐力会达到最大值》这是 一组高重复性训练，包括4 组立卧撑跳和哑铃抓举，重复次数按照 24— 12—6— 24安排。
en: “Met-con” is short for “metabolic conditioning,” a term indicating that stamina and endurance are pushed hard in the session.It was a high-repetition workout consisting of 4 sets of burpees and dumbbell snatches, in this repetition pattern: 24-12-6-24.

zh: 这组训练中不包含跑步。
en: There was no running involved.

zh: 例证总是与坠落的体育名流这一主题相关联。在有限的事实中，这些个体能被放置到任意数量的戏剧性的事件里。
en: Exemplification relates to the subject of fallen sports celebrities in that individuals can be situated within any number of dramatic occurrences given a limited set of facts.

zh: 相反，尽管它们在故事中有很多相同的属性，那些不适合叙事的事件仍然可能被排除在外。
en: Conversely, those who do not fit a narrative may be left out even when they share as many similar attributes as those included in the story.

zh: 随机试验的焦点在于个人层次的健康改变，又称为临床试验 (clinical trials)。
en: Randomized trials that are focused on changing health at the individual level are referred to as clinical trials.

zh: 由于拒绝提供能获致健康效益的介入处方是不合法的。因此，与身体活动有关的随机试验通常会提供对照组某种形式的身体活动。但该活动与介入的活动不同，无法提供相同的生理效果。或借此比较不同种类处方的效果。
en: Because denying treatment that is known to cause health benefits is illegal, randomized trials for physical activity often provide a form of physical activity to the comparison group that does not have the same biological effect as the intervention treatment provided to the intervention group, or that compares different types of treatment.

zh: 灵活性训练包括改善动作范围和建立新的、理想的运动模式。
en: Mobility practice involves improving range of motion and establishing new, ideal motor patterns.

zh: 这项训练可帮助跑者克服那些制约良好体态的限制因素和问题，如紧张的臀部或受限的脚踝运动范围。
en: It does this by overcoming the restrictions and problems—like tight hips or compromised ankle range of motion—that may prevent good body position.

zh: 训练内容包括改善日常习惯，而且更关注非跑步时的动作和一天的日常姿势，如怎么站立、走路和坐。
en: Pursuing these targets may include changing daily habits, requiring that closer attention be paid to non-running movements and positions throughout the day, such as how you stand, walk, and sit.

zh: 运动员群体的流行数据是有限的。
en: Prevalence figures in athletic populations are limited.

zh: 首先，有关进食障碍问题的研究是非常少的。
en: First, very few studies have addressed the issue of eating disorder prevalence in athletes.

zh: 其次，有关该问题研究的样本非常小并且有限。
en: Second, of those studies that have attempted to address this issue, most have had very small and restricted sample sizes.

zh: 最后，大多数的研究没有采用严格的DSM-III-R标准。
en: Finally, most of these studies have failed to use the strict DSM-III-R criteria.

zh: 最后一点是最重要的，因为很多运动员有易饿症的行为，但并不符合DSM神经性易饿症的诊断标准。
en: This final point is an important one, for there may be many athletes who demonstrate bulimic behaviour, yet who do not meet the DSM criteria for bulimia nervosa.

zh: 不同的测量有不同的目的,因此也有不同的效度。
en: There are different purposes for different measures.Consequently, there are different kinds of validity.

zh: 我们将讨论四种基本的效度类型:逻辑效度(logical validity)、内容效度、 效标效度 , 以及构念效度 。
en: We consider four basic types of validity: logical, content, criterion, and construct.

zh: 虽然我们将逻辑效度列为一个独立的效度类型,但美国心理学会与美国教育研究学会认为逻辑效度是内容效度的特例。
en: Although we list logical validity as a separate type of validity, the American Psychological Association and the American Educational Research Association consider logical validity a special case of content validity.

zh: 20世纪90年代，细井获得了大量的媒体报道，在小众杂志的照片和短标题中出现频率最高。
en: Hosoi received a lot of media coverage in the 1980s in niche magazines, most frequently in photographs and short captions.

zh: 当他在接受采访时，例如在1 9 8 5 年4 月发行的《脱粒机》中，谈论的焦点主要是滑板，话题通常是他最爱的技巧、有影响力的滑手、他使用何种设备等。
en: When he was interviewed, as in the April 1985 issue of Thrasher, the focus was primarily on skateboarding, with such topics as Hosoi's favorite tricks, influential skaters, and what type of equipment he used.

zh: 大多数话题明显是用来促进滑板行业发展的。
en: Most topics were clearly used to promote skateboarding.

zh: 简而言之，在从体育名流的英雄到恶棍的转变中，数十年来关于阿加西的生活故事的媒体建构最好被描述为：从英雄到恶棍到英雄再生到… …什么呢？
en: In short, in a volume on the hero-to-villain arc in sports celebrity, the decades-long media construction of Agassi's life story might best be described as hero-to-villain-to-reborn-hero-to ... what?

zh: 承认吸毒似乎把他重塑成一个恶棍，事实上确实有一些同僚运动员是这样谴责他的，但这不是关于《开放》占主导地位的媒体回应（戴假发和服用冰毒一样被提到），在撰写本章时他的政客地位似乎完好无损。
en: The admission of drug use would seem to recast him as a villain, and indeed some fellow players condemned him as such, but this has not been the dominant media response to Open's revelations (again, the hairpiece was as remarked upon as was the meth use), and as of this writing his statesman status appears intact.

zh: 《开放》自身的暗示既没有引起英雄的比喻，也没有引起恶棍的比喻— 相反，安德鲁把他的人生旅程讲述为从没有人到某个人。
en: Open's own suggestion invokes neither the villain nor hero trope—rather, Andre has storied his life journey as from no one-to-someone.

zh: 这确实是一个不同的叙事模式。
en: A different narrative arc indeed.

zh: 儿童和青少年的磷酸果糖激酶（PFK）活性低于成年人这一事实也支持上面的研究结果（Eriksson etal., 1973; Eriksson, 1980）。PFK是调节糖醇解的一个主要的酶。
en: Consistent with these observations is thefact that the activity of the enzyme PFK, a major regulator of glycolysis, is lower in children and adolescents than in adults (Eriksson et al., 1973; Eriksson, 1980).

zh: 除此之外，儿童和青少年根本无法产生或承受文献所报道的成年人那样高的酸中毒（acidosis）水平（血液PH值增高或碱基减少）（Kindermann et al., 1975; Metejkova et al., 1980; Bar-Or, 1985）。
en: In addition, children and adolescents are not able to generate or sustain levels of acidosis (as indicated by blood pH or base excess) as high as those reported in adults (Kindermann et al., 1975; Metejkova et al., 1980; Bar-Or, 1985).

zh: 我们不得不成天与有毒物质生活在一起，这正是当今现代化社会高速发展的一个特点。有毒物质包括污染、一氧化碳和早上飞驰而过的带音响的摩托车。
en: It’s just part of today’s society that we’ll be exposed to such toxic substances as pollution, carbon monoxide, and some morning-drive DJs.

zh: 然而，我们是有办法完全避免接触许多室内污染物的，例如氡、石棉和霉菌。
en: But you can take steps to avoid being exposed to many indoor pollutants like radon, asbestos, and mold.

zh: 把我们所有的防护细胞储存在一个区域是不明智的，所以骨髓（包在骨头里面），会产生新的免疫细胞加入战斗。
en: It would be unwise to house ail of our protector cells in one area, so the bone marrow—the inner portion of the bone throughout the body一 produces the young generations of immune cells that go to battle.

zh: 尤其是B细胞 ，它能够通过产生一种从细菌和被病毒感染的细胞的侧面挤进去的小分子抗体，对感染做出反应。
en: In particular, the B cells respond to infections by creating antibodies—the small molecules that ram themselves into the side of bacteria and virus-infected cells.

zh: 一旦病菌的保护罩被攻破，这些细胞就像吹起来的气球一样会爆裂，一种叫免疫球蛋白的蛋白质就会在白血球的引导下钩住被感染细胞并杀死它们。
en: Once their protective shields are broken, these cells burst like swollen balloons.Small protein bullets called immunoglobulins work under the direction of white blood cells to hook up to infected cells and kill them.

zh: 我们此处提到的抑郁，可不是指你在全美棒球联赛彩票中输了20美元后产生的情绪。
en: When we say depression, we're not talking about how you feel after losing twenty bucks in the office Super Bowl pool.

zh: 抑郁是指更为被动的长期负面情感状态，与心脏病联系很密切。
en: A more passive negative emotional state over the long term is strongly associated with heart disease.

zh: 事实上有统计表明，抑郁症患者得心脏病的可能性是正常人的4倍。一种无助感似乎能击垮免疫系统。
en: In fact, people with depression are statistically four times more likely to have a heart attack than people who are not depressed, A feeling of helplessness appears to weaken the immune system.

zh: 参与者样本可能是从较大的群体或母群体 (population) 中随机选择出来的。
en: The sample of participants might be randomly selected from some larger group, or a population.

zh: 举例来说，如果你所在的学院或大学有10000位学生，你 可以随机地选取200位来进行研究。
en: For example, if your college or university has 10,000 students, you could randomly select 200 for a study.

zh: 你指派给这10000位学生每个人一个数字编号，第一个数字编号是0000，第二位是0001、第三位是0002，直到最后一位(第10000位)的编号是9999。
en: You would assign each of the 10,000 students a numeric ID.The first numeric ID would be 0000, the second 0001, the third 0002, up through the last (the 10,000th), who would be 9999.

zh: 反思这些教练的命运动员时钟：生物学和时间因素如何影响运动表现，体育记者埃里克• 布雷迪（Brady，2 0 1 0 ) 叹息道，“很久以前，教练们都是受人尊重的，他们被视为社群的支柱。他们最佳的体育形象就是被视为永不退缩的船长一一透着坚毅的眼神，虽然严厉 但却公平。你可以信任你的孩子们跟他们在一起”（第1 段）。
en: Reflecting on the fates of these coaches, sportswriter Erik Brady (2010) lamented, "Once upon a time, coaches were respected and revered as pillars of their communities. The best of them sported images as never-flinching captains of their ships—flinty-eyed eminences who were tough but fair. You could trust your kids with them" (para. 1).

zh: 布雷迪的感悟被体育媒体广'泛共享，很多媒体都惊讶地发现身为美德和领袖名流典范的教练们显然滥用了权威职.
en: Brady's sentiments were shared widely across the sports media, many of which were surprised to see that their celebrated paragons of virtue and leadership were evidently abusing their authority as coaches.

zh: 权。然而，正如我在本章中所探讨的，曼吉诺、里奇和莱维特并不应被视为异象；相反，他们是已经建立起来的大学橄榄球文化的逻辑产物，他们将继续制定出白人男性气概领导权的神话标准。
en: As I argue in this chapter, however, Mangino, Leach, and Leavitt should not be viewed as unusual; rather, they are the logical products of a college football culture that has been built upon, and continues to valorize, a mythology of white masculine leadership.

zh: 外表可能具有欺骗性。
en: And appearances can be deceiving.

zh: 轻度脑外伤的表象可能会对长期失忆产生重大影响。
en: What might seem to be minor head trauma can actually play a major role in long-term memory loss.

zh: 尽管我们所说的脑外伤通常是指110万患脑震荡等严重损伤的人所遇到的健康问题，但是，头部受伤导致眼冒金星这种轻度问题也可能会在之后引发失忆。
en: Though we usually associate brain trauma with the 1.1 million people who suffer concussions or worse, even seeing stars after a minor head injury can lead to later memory loss.

zh: 使用组内相关R来表示信度系数而不探用相关系数r的原因，以及如何计算组内相关R的方式都有说明。
en: The rationale for using intraclass R instead of r for reliability and the computational procedures for intraclass R were presented.

zh: 描述了估计信度的各种方式，例如稳定性、复本、以及内部一致性。
en: Various methods of estimating reliability were mentioned, such as stability, alternate forms, and internal consistency.

zh: 了解测量标准误的概念是重要的。
en: An understanding of the concept of standard error of measurement is vital.

zh: 任何测验分数应该仅被视为一个人真实分数可能落入的分数区间的估计值。
en: Any test score should be viewed as only an estimate of a person’s true score that probably falls within a range of scores.

zh: 骨的生长是在内分泌系统的控制下按照遗传程序发生的整个骨架变大的过程。
en: Growth is the expression of the genetically programmed process of enlargement of the entire skeleton under the control of the endocrine system.

zh: 生长时，不会发生有选择性的某些骨骼的增大或某个骨骼特殊区域的增粗。
en: There is no selective enlargement of individual bones or specific regions within a single bone.

zh: 骨骼生长会涉及到整个的骨架。随着长骨骨骺的愈合，纵向的生长就终止了。
en: Growth involves the entire skeleton and longitudinal growth ceases with the closure of the epiphyses of the long bones.

zh: 内在效度与外在效度，和研究设计与所采用的研究控制有所关联。
en: Internal validity and external validity relate to the research design and controls that are used.

zh: 内在效度指的是结果能归因于研究处理的程度。
en: Internal validity refers to the extent to which the results can be attributed to the treatments used in the study.

zh: 换句话说，研究者必须尽其所能去控制会影响结果的所有其他变数。
en: In other words, the researcher must try to control all other variables that could influence the results.

zh: 成瘾是最严重的脑部失调问题之一，与脑内化学物质机能失常有关。
en: One of the more serious brain-related disorders that’s attributed to chemical malfunctions in the brain is addiction.

zh: 某些物质能在人脑内释放或增加某类化学物质，引发我们上瘾的感觉。
en: We become addicted to substances that in­crease or release certain chemicals in our brain.

zh: 特定的一些物质，如尼古丁，会释放多巴胺，那是一种引起愉悦感的化学物质，让人体想要更多的尼古了。由此引发的习惯性行为会让多巴胺源源不断地注入人体系统中。
en: Certain substances like nicotine re­lease dopamine, the pleasure chemical, and your body craves more of it—which leads to a habitual behavior to keep pumping dopamine into your system.

zh: 人体感知到有异己物质进入，就将免疫细胞派往该区域。
en: In response to the foreign matter, your body sends immune cells to the area.

zh: 免疫细胞接触到花粉，就像手榴弹一样爆炸了，发出信号叫来更多的白血球细胞逬行侦察。
en: When they attach to the pollen, they explode like a grenade and call in more white blood cells to investigate.

zh: 白血球细胞大批向该区域移动，导致局部发炎，将黏液转移到肺内，化学物质转移到发炎区域，包括靠近肌肉的部位。
en: That migration of white blood cells to the area causes the area to inflame and move mucus into the lung and chemicals into the immediate area, including near the muscles.

zh: 如果你经常乘飞机，就应该每隔两小时起身四处走动一下，或坐在座位上活动腿部。
en: If you fly a lot, you should gef up and walk around every two hours, or move your feet with exercises at your seat.

zh: 这样能够避免产生深静脉血栓（或腿部静脉阻塞）。
en: Doing so will help you prevent a condition called deep vein thrombosis (or clotted leg vein) that occurs when you're sitting in the same position for a long time.

zh: 在固定位置上久坐会出现这种健康问题：腿部不活动，凝血累积就会形成。
en: The danger is that without movement, a blood clot can form in the leg.

zh: 这种凝块还有时能进入肺部，阻住血液输往肺部（那就糟糕了）。
en: That clot can then slip up into the lungs ond block off their blood supply (that's a bad thing).

zh: 我们可以说，这一事件发生在联盟成立的第12个年头，WNBA大体上是通过促进联盟成为女权和好女孩的堡垒来反驳黑人女性不守纪律和道德上有缺陷的挥之不去的刻板印象。
en: Suffice it to say that at the time of this incident in the league's 12th year of existence, the WNBA had generally countered lingering stereotypes of Black women as undisciplined and morally deficient by promoting the league as a bastion of both girl power and good girls.

zh: 也就是说，WNBA联盟中充斥着才华横溢、大概道德高尚以及和蔼可亲的运动员，她们都是因为对篮球的热爱才在场上拼搏，她们都可以作为正确的角色模板。例如参与诸如“WNBA关怀”(WNBA CARES) 一类的活动来加人社区服务。
en: That is, the WNBA appeared to be stocked with talented, presumably morally superior, and gracious athletes who all played for the love of the game and served as appropriate role models, for example, by engaging in community service via such vehicles as WNBA CARES.

zh: 呕吐本身能够成为愉快和成瘾的行为。
en: Vomiting itself can become a pleasurable and addictive behaviour.

zh: 易饿症患者把他们的呕吐称为“一种快感”或“一种真正的快感”。
en: Bulimics have referred to their vomiting episodes as 'a rush' or 'a real high'.

zh: 呕吐可以每天发生20次或更多，但是易饿症患者的牙釉质不一定会受到呕吐物的破坏而经常去看牙医。
en: Vomiting can occur as frequently as 20 or more episodes a day, and it is not unusual for bulimics to have excessive disruption of tooth enamel from the acid in the vomitus, requiring extensive dental repair.

zh: 易饿症很少会致死，但是，排泄行为会引起电解质的紊乱，特别是低钾血症，从而导致致命的心率紊乱。
en: Bulimia seldom results in death, however, severe electrolyte disturbances from purging behaviours, particularly hypokalaemia, can lead to lethal cardiac arrythmias.

zh: 即使努力尝试保证公平竞争，在青少年运动参与者中，体型、力量与技术的不匹配也在所难免。
en: Size, strength and skill mismatches are rather common in many youth sports in spite of efforts to equate participants for competition.

zh: 此种对抗不匹配所造成的不公平竞争，以及由此导致的损伤发生率升高，在接触性或冲撞性运动中表现得非常突出。
en: The potential competitive inequity and increased risk of injury associated with such mismatches are especially evident in contact and collision sports.

zh: 许多学者建议：青少年在体型与生物学成熟度上与对抗匹配能有效减少由于体型、(Gallagher, 1969; Seefeldt, 1981; Caine & 力量与技术上不匹配所造成的影响Broekhoff， 1987)。
en: Matching participants by body size and biological maturity status is often indicated as an important means of reducing size, strength and skill mismatches in youth sports (e.g.Gallagher, 1969; Seefeldt, 1981; Caine & Broekhoff, 1987).

zh: 当紧张达到极大值肘，对身体就很危险了。
en: When those stressors reach extremely high levels, stress becomes dangerous.

zh: 这是由于紧张激素皮质醇在此发挥作用。
en: That‘s because of the effect of the stress hormone called cortisol.

zh: 当机体处于不断的紧张之中时，皮质醇的含量就会升至极高水平。
en: When you've constantly under stress, your cortisol is elevated too high.

zh: 当分泌激素的腺体枯竭时，皮质醇的含量就会变低。
en: When your glands become exhausted, you end up with low levels.

zh: 此时，紧张会对人体造成最大伤害——它耗尽了人体分泌皮质酵的能力。
en: That's when stress is most damaging—when it exhausts your ability to increase your cortisol.

zh: 研究族群(study population )应能适切回答研究问题。
en: The study population should be appropriate to answer the research questions asked in the study.

zh: 作者应该描述研究的样本大小，说明招募了多少参与者进入此研究，多少人完成了研究所要求的工作，以及多少人被纳入资料分析中。
en: Writers should describe their sample size to include how many subjects were enrolled in the study, completed the tasks as assigned, and were included in the data analysis.

zh: 作者也应该对从研究开始到结束的过程中有关样本大小改变的原因，提出解释。
en: The writers also should provide an explanation of differences in the sample sizes from the start to the end of the study.

zh: 这是避免产生偏误研究的一个重要议题。
en: This is an important issue for avoiding biased studies.

zh: 招募样本的方法以及收录标准与排除标准，均应在此段落中予以说明。
en: The methods used to recruit the subjects and inclusion or exclusion criteria should be listed.

zh: 为了把自己推起来，必须稳住篮球。如果不能以静力控制篮球，篮球就会向外滚动，这需要有力量极大的手臂与肩部，还有冠军级的肩袖。
en: In order to press yourself up, the basketball must be stabilized—it will tend to shoot outwards if not isometrically controlled.This will require huge arm and shoulder power, as well as Olympian rotator cuff muscles.

zh: 征服偏重倒立撑，你就会拥有超级强悍的关节和山地大猩猩般的肩膀。
en: The master of the uneven handstand pushup will earn shoulders like a gorilla and super-tough joints.

zh: 偏重俯卧撑是第一个高级俯卧撑动作，它能够帮助健身者适应由双手俯卧撑向单臂俯卧撑的过渡。
en: The uneven pushup is the first of the advanced pushup exercises that will take the athlete from double arm pushups to the single arm variety.

zh: 你也可以选用一个固定的物体（如砖块），而不用篮球，不过篮球是最好的选择。
en: You can use stable objects—like bricks or a cinderblock—instead of a basketball, but the basketball is best.

zh: 控制篮球的同时可以锻炼你的肩袖，这有助于你完成难度更高的动作。
en: The act of stabilizing the ball brings the seldom-used rotator cuff muscles into play, strengthening them for the more intense exercises to come.

zh: 偏重深蹲是到挑战单腿深蹲的第一步。
en: Uneven squats are the first big step towards mastering unilateral squats.

zh: 到现在为止，深蹲系列中各式的动作都是对称的——都能够均衡地锻炼双腿。
en: Up until now, the effect of the steps in the squat series has been symmetrical; they have developed both legs equally.

zh: 练习该动作时，放在篮球上的那条腿位置相对较高，而且又必须控制篮球，所以无法完全发力。
en: In this exercise, the leg on the ball cannot supply much power due to its raised position and the fact that it has to control the ball.

zh: 踩在地上的那条腿需要承担大部分工作，要有足够的力量在另一条腿的辅助下把身体从最低点推起。
en: The non-ball leg does most of the work, and acquires superior strength while still having enough help to push the athlete out of the difficult bottom position.

zh: 这个动作还可以很好地改善你的平衡能力与协调能力。
en: The balance and coordination are also greatly improved as a result of this exercise.

zh: 偏重引体向上的历史可以追溯到几百年前，但此动作再度流行则是因为电影《洛奇2》——史泰龙用该动作进行训练。
en: Uneven pullups go back centuries, but they were made instantly popular again when Sylvester Stallone performed them during the famous training montage of Rocky II.

zh: 由于手臂的位置不同，抓握横杆的那只手臂不得不承担大部分的工作，这将为做单臂引体向上打下基础。
en: Due to the altered arm position, the arm gripping the bar has to do the majority of the work, preparing the athlete for the true unilateral pullup movements which follow in the series.

zh: 该动作能够增强背阔肌、肱二头肌以及背部肌肉的力量，同时也会极大地锻炼抓握能力。
en: The lats, biceps and back gain in strength as a result.The grip in particular gets a great workout.

zh: 掌握坐姿屈膝之后，接着练习平卧抬膝可以进一步强化训练者的腰部。
en: This exercise continues where  knee tucks leaves off, further strengthening the waist.

zh: 平卧抬膝训练脊椎肌肉、腹部肌肉、腹斜肌和腹横肌，使之协调工作，同时也能够锻炼大腿前侧肌肉。
en: Flat knee raises train the spinal muscles, abdominal muscles, obliques and transversus to function in a coordinated way.The muscles of the frontal thigh are also toned.

zh: 由于该动作要求训练者平躺在地上，所以髋部屈肌也必须更多地参与其中，这会使训练者适应之后强度更大的平卧动作和悬垂动作。
en: The position on the floor requires increased hip flexor involvement, which will condition the athlete for the more intense floor and hanging exercises which come later in the leg raise series.

zh: 评价量表有很多不同型态。
en: There are different kinds of rating scales.

zh: 有些使用数字评分，有些使用检核表，有些使用语文线索结合数字评分，也有使用强迫选项，或是使用排序的方式。
en: Some use numerical ratings, some use checklists, some have verbal cues associated with numerical ratings, some require forced choices, and still others use rankings.

zh: 有些量表很简易，但有些则很复杂。
en: Some scales are simple, whereas others are complex.

zh: 儿童总吸氧量比较高的原因可能有几个。
en: There are several possible mechanisms for the higher total O2 costs in children.

zh: 底物利用本身就可以改变VO2的与工作速率之间的关系。因为脂肪P:0比率 (高能磷酸盐与O2的比率）是2.82,葡萄糖是3(McGilvery，1983)。
en: Substrate utilization itself can modify the relationship between VO2 and work rate because the P : O (high-energy phosphate to O2) ratio is 2.82 for fats and 3 for glucose (McGilvery, 1983).

zh: 如果运动时儿童代谢的主要是脂肪，而成年人仅仅是葡萄糖，则吸氧量的差异不应超过6%。
en: If children metabolized solely fat and adults only glucose (which is highly unlikely), then the difference in O2 cost could be no more than 6%.

zh: 但研究发现，儿童吸氧量几乎平均比成年人高40%,因此，儿童与成年人吸氧量的差异与儿童和成年人底物代谢水平差异不一致。
en: But the difference we observed was, on average, almost 40% greater in children, and, therefore, inconsistent with a growth-related difference in substrate utilization.

zh: 七鳃鳗通过肌肉活动产生波动，从头到尾依次收缩来游动。
en: The lamprey swims by producing waves of muscle activity, contracting sequentially from head to tail.

zh: 脊髓的神经细胞引起每个节段肌肉的收缩。
en: Contraction of each of the segmental  muscles is triggered by nerve cells located in the spinal cord.

zh: 虽然每一段都与下一段完全地协调，但必须有个时间差以创造波动。
en: While  each segment has to be coordinated with the next one down the line,  there must be a time lag to create a wave.

zh: 因此，图像在视网膜的运动速率似乎对于速度估计没有多大作用。
en: So, rate of image movement in the retina of the eye would not seem to be helpful in estimating velocity.

zh: 反而，为获得恰当的时机掌控而估算飞过来的物体 的速度时，很可能是通过计算物体大小的变化来实现。
en: Instead, estimating the speed of the incoming object to permit coincidental timing is probably achieved by figuring out relative changes in the size of the object as it nears.

zh: 也就是说，当投出的球接近于击球手时，球在他的视野内变得更大。
en: That is, as the pitched ball approaches the batter, it gets larger in his field of vision.

zh: 球来的越快，它变大的速度也越快。
相对而言，青少年运动员很少发生骨盆与髋部的应力性骨折。
en: Stress fractures about the pelvis and hip in young athletes are relatively unusual.

zh: 在跑步或跳跃项目的年轻女子运动员中较多见。
en: These have been much more commonly reported in young female runners or athletes involved in jumping sports.

zh: 有报道认为，年轻运动员发生髂嵴应力性损伤是因反复训练所致。
en: Iliac crest stress injuries have been reported in young athletes as a result of repetitive training.

zh: 图13.3显示，对此年龄段而言，骨盆应力会导致明显的骨突撕脱 (Micheli，1990)。
en: Much more commonly in this age group, stresses about the pelvis will result in frank apophyseal avulsions (Micheli, 1990) (Fig. 13.3).

zh: 其中之一就是体操垫的柔软性，若垫子太软则会因为腕关节过度背伸而容易损伤。
en: One such factor is the compliance of the landing mats.Mats that are too soft or compliant can contribute to injuries due to excessive dorsiflexion of the wrist.

zh: 另一个因素是跳跃转体时腕关节过伸和尺偏。
en: Another contributing factor is the hyperextension and ulnar deviation of the wrist which result from twisting motions as observed during vaulting activities.

zh: 当进行支撑和翻转动作时，手部固定，而前臂反复承受扭转应力易导致骨的最薄弱部位骨骺的损伤。
en: In beam and tumbling workouts, the hands are fixed as the forearms undergo repetitive torsional stress possibly predisposing the epiphysis, the weakest part of the bone, to excessive stress.

zh: 最后，前列腺肥大的患者会整夜频繁起床，排尿困难。
en: People with BPH end up getting up frequently throughout the night to urinate, and they have difficulty initiating a stream of urine.

zh: 病情如果进一步恶化，排尿会变得更加痛苦，患者永远没办法排净膀胱里的尿。（尿液还可能回流至肾脏，慢慢地损害肾脏功能，因此患者必须坚持起床，站着排尿。）
en: As the disease progresses, the difficulty worsens—and you can never get all of the urine out of your bladder (The fear is that the urine can get backed up in the kidneys and slowly kill them over time—to keep getting up to urinate.)

zh: 热身之后，在技巧训练中选择3个技巧训练项目，每个技巧训练项目间跑步20米。
en: After warming up, perform three drills from the drill section, with 20 meters of running between each drill repeat.

zh: （例如，以前倾跳跃开始，然后跑步20米，再做提腿练习，然后跑步20米，最后以交替提腿练习结束。
en: (For example, start with hop with forward lean, run 20 meters, do the pulling wall drill, run another 20 meters, and finish with the alternating foot drill.)

zh: ）接下来，进行以节奏为重点的30秒跑步训练。
en: Next, perform four 30-second runs with an emphasis on cadence.

zh: 用一个便携的节拍器，设定节奏为每分钟94下，记录每一次左脚踏中节奏的次数。
en: Using a portable metronome set at 94 beeps per minute, time each pull of your left foot with the beep.

zh: 每次跑步练习后休息1分钟。
en: Rest 1 minute after each run.

zh: 之后再次重复整组练习。
en: Then do the whole set a second time.

zh: 接下来，用稍慢的节奏跑一组更长的距离。
en: Next, run a longer distance at a slightly slower cadence.

zh: 节拍器设定每分钟91下，跑步时间为2 分钟，让左脚跟上这个节奏。
en: Set the metronome for 91 beeps per minute and run for 2 minutes, pulling your left foot in sync with the beat.

zh: 休息2分钟，然后重复4次30秒跑步和2分钟跑步。做2组。
en: Rest 2 minutes; then repeat the four 30-second runs and the 2-minute run.

zh: 最后进行赤足力量练习。
en: Finally, it’s time for barefoot strength work.

zh: 在沙地或草地上以舒适的配速跑50米，注意保证正确的动作和快速的节奏。之后步行回到起跑线。
en: Run 50 meters in sand or grass at a comfortable pace while focusing on maintaining good mechanics and a fast cadence.Walk back to the starting line after each repetition.

zh: 重复这项练习10次。
en: Perform this routine 10 times.

zh: 体育运动员受伤，大多会成为媒体报道的头条新闻。女性运动员前十字韧带撕裂的几率是男性运动员的8倍。
en: Athletes get all the headlines when they get injured, but women are up to eight times more likely than men to tear their ACL.

zh: 女性膝部的生理结构较男性松散，女性的骨骼也从整体上比男性脆弱，这就对稳定性造成了负面影响，致使女性的韧带更易于撕裂。
en: The looser construction of the female knee—and overall weaker skeleton—can compromise stability ond predispose women to ligament tears.

zh: 我们可以把丘脑（见图3.1)想象成大城市里的火车站，它是总站，从这里出 发，可以到达许多小城镇。人脸的许多不 同部位都经过丘脑。
en: Think of the thalamus（pictured in Figure 3.1）as a train station in a major city that acts as a hub for many other smaller locations.

zh: 丘脑从脊柱获取感 觉信息，然后在人体还没开始运动前，就 对要做的动作进行微凋，让人活动更自 如（丘脑出现问题，会引起四肢颤抖或运 动不自然）。
en: That's because many different parts of the brain run through it; the thalamus takes sensory information from the spine and then fine-tunes what movements you make before they even start.It s really responsible for making actions smooth (problems with the thalamus can result in tremors, or nonsmooth motor movements).

zh: 尽管一些业余联赛中强制规定使用无拇指拳击手套，但此举并不足以保护眼睛。
en: While thumbless boxing gloves have been mandated in some amateur leagues, this regulation is inadequate for eye protection.

zh: 高危险性项目及推荐使用的保护措施详见表15.1。
en: Examples of high risk sports and recommendations for protective eyewear are shown in Table 15.

zh: 美国儿科协会和美国眼科协会正着手制定更明 确的体育项目分类方法以及使用保护性眼罩的建议。
en: 1. The American Academy of Pediatrics and the American Ophthalmology Association are developing a more definitive sports classification schema and recommendations for use of protective eyewear.

zh: 图37.4是多元纵向设计的一个例子， 采用的是3个出生组别（1980，1981和1982）,在连续4年期间（1993 — 1996) 测试。
en: In Fig. 37.4 an example is given of a multiple longitudinal design using three birth cohorts (1980, 1981 and 1982) that will be measured during four consecutive years (1993—1996).

zh: 由于存在年龄的重叠，各组别可以在不同年龄进行相互比较（图37.4的横向比较）。
en: Because there is an overlap in age, the cohorts can be compared with each other at different ages (horizontal comparisons in Fig. 37.4).

zh: 在该年龄的组间的系统差异称为“群体效应” （cohort effect)。
en: A systematic difference between the cohorts at these ages is called a 'cohort effect'.

zh: 同时， 在纵向研究中，可以将其他混合因素（即测试时间因素）区别开来（Veling& Van't Hof，1980)。
en: At the same time, it is possible to distinguish another confounding factor in a longitudinal study, namely the factor of time of measurement (Veling & Van 't Hof, 1980).

zh: 计时赛本身也是一项很好的训练。
en: A TT is also effective training on its own.

zh: 把每次计时赛训练当作一次正式比赛——准备热身，进行动作训练，开始轻松慢跑，然后进行冲剌跑，在整个过程中保证身体处于活跃状态。
en: Treat one as you would a race—take time to warm up, starting with drills and working your way up to striders and sprints to ensure that your engine is hot.

zh: 训练结束后进行等量的冷身，认真进行放松慢跑和拉伸。
en: Cool down with the same level of focus, giving attention to slow running and stretching.

zh: 最后的放松阶段有助于防止受伤，并帮助循环和淋巴系统及时排出废物。
en: This helps prevent injury and gives your circulatory and lymphatic systems time to clear out waste products.

zh: 在下个段落里，当你针对一个困难的规范性问题进行反思时，你将需要决定你在认识论上的立场。
en: When you begin your reflections on a difficult normative problem in the next section, you will have to decide where you stand on this matter of epistemology.

zh: 图13.2在一个连续体上标示了三个约略的位置：信心从最少到最大。
en: Figure 13.2 shows three broad positions along a continuum: from minimal to maximal confidence.

zh: 我们从那些对哲学推论的力量抱持最少信念的人为开端，也就是相信客观是不可得的与寻找真理不是哲学的目的的那些人。
en: We begin with those who place minimal faith in the power of philosophical reasoning, those who believe that objectivity is not available and that truth finding is not philosophy's purpose.

zh: 媒体不断地把某些行为、能力以及习性与某些群体联系在一起，由此形成了认知框架。
en: Cognitive frames can be shaped by media reports that repeatedly link certain behaviors, abilities, and propensities with certain groups.

zh: 举个例子来说，体育社会学的研究表明，黑人男性运动员往往被描述为，或由传媒塑造”为性欲过剩以及具有暴力潜质的个体 (Davis & Harris, 1998, pp. 157-165)。拉丁裔男性运动员往往被认为是脾气火爆、意气用事和不可预知的(Hoose, 1989) 。
en: Research in the sociology of sports, for example, has found that Black male athletes tend to be characterized, or "mediated," as oversexed and potentiallyviolent individuals (see Davis & Harris, 1998, pp. 157-165), with Latino athletes considered hot- tempered and, by extension, emotional and unpredictable (Hoose, 1989).

zh: 如果你能达到悬垂屈举腿的升级标准，那做5次悬垂蛙举腿应该不在话下。
en: If you can meet the progression standard for  hanging bent leg raises, five reps of hanging frog raises should be well within your capabilities.

zh: 训练者难以从悬垂屈举腿升级到悬垂蛙举腿，通常是因为身体柔韧性较差，而非力量不足。
en: When students have difficulty moving from bent leg raises to frog-type movements, the issue is usually lack of flexibility rather than strength.

zh: 其实这很容易解决：练习之前先做几分钟体前屈动作，拉伸下背部和腘绳肌。
en: This can be easily cured by bending forwards and stretching out the lower back and hamstrings for a few minutes before attempting this exercise.

zh: 乳酸阈是以 Úo2max 函数的百分率来表示，这个百分率因人而异，即使在参加耐力训练的运动员中也是如此。
en: Often lactate threshold is expressed as the percentage of the V o2 max at which it is observed, and this percentage varies m arkedly across individuals, even among endurance-trained athletes.

zh: 运动员参加长时间运动项目比赛，一般都是在乳酸阈的强度下进行的。
en: Athletes typically perform long duration sport events at intensities approximating the lactatethreshold.

zh: 所以，维持高速率消耗有氧代谢能量的能力可以通过增强 Úo2max 函数或乳酸阈或同时增强二者来取得。
en: Therefore, ability to sustain a high rate of aerobic energy expenditure can be enhanced by increasing either or both of V o2 max and lactate threshold.

zh: 近年来，相对选择性β2-激动剂(β2-agonists)的发展，具有使支气管平滑肌松弛的作用，而对心脏的作用较小。
en: Recent years have seen the development of relatively selective β2-agonists, that have potent bronchial smooth muscle relaxant effect, with little cardiac stimulation.

zh: 这些药物，包括（美国）阿布特罗或（世界其他地方）沙丁胺醇,奥西那林，特布他林，比托特罗,非诺特罗和沙米特罗是治疗哮喘中支气管痉挛的主要药物。不论是对慢性的或急性的支气管痉挛，也包括运动性哮喘有效。
en: These agents, including albuterol (USA) or salbutamol (rest of the world), metaproterenol, terbutaline, bitolterol, fenoterol and salmeterol, are the mainstay in the treatment of the bronchospastic component of asthma, be it chronic or acute, including EIA.

zh: 如果你曾经从滑板上摔下来，或者撕掉过倒刺皮，你就肯定了解自然界的急救措施。
en: If you've ever crashed a skateboard or peeled a hangnail, you're sure to know about nature's Band-Aids.

zh: 措施的一种就是伤痂，伤痂会很快覆盖伤口。
en: One is the scab, which covers the wound almost immediately.

zh: 如果帮助凝血的蛋白从血液中出来保护伤口，就会形成伤痂，这实际也是加速痊愈的过程。
en: A scab is formed when proteins that help coagulate blood come out of the bloodstream to protect the wound—and actually accelerate the healing process.

zh: 文化名流的概念开始与我们相伴是从1 2世纪欧洲作家和画家的第一幅肖像开始的。肖像后来被销售给他们潜在的赞助商— 这就是前资本主义社会中作者的商品化。
en: The idea of cultural celebrity has been with us since the first portraits of writers and painters in 12th century Europe, which marketed their subjects to potential sponsors—a precapitalist commodification of authorship.

zh: 到了 17世纪，肖像成为教学方法。
en: In the 17t h century, portraits became methods of instruction.

zh: 一旦你的手臂已经完全伸直，就落下来并重复以上动作。
en: Drop back down and repeat the exercise once your arms are straight.

zh: 刚开始练习的时候，你主要是靠跳起来的惯性完成动作转换，但随着你不断变强，对跳跃的依赖就会越来越少。
en: In the early days, you’ll find yourself jumping hard to achieve the transition, but you’ll do this less and less as you get stronger.

zh: 我是在圣昆汀学到这个动作的，那儿的囚徒们将其称之为“哨兵引体向上”，但我在其他地方从没听过这样的称呼。
en: In San Quentin, where I first learned this technique, the convicts called them “sentry pullups,” although I’ve never heard the name anywhere else.

zh: 我不知道为什么叫这个名字，但我想可能是因为该动作就像一个家伙爬上高处，窥探远方一样。
en: I don’t know for sure, but if I had to guess, I’d say that they were called this because it looks like the guy doing them is pulling himself up on something, to spy out into the distance.

zh: 如果我没有猜对，并且有人知道其真正原因的话，烦请相告。
en: If I’m wrong and someone else knows the real source of the name, please write in and tell me.

zh: 资料分析必须要说明个人层次与社区层次在行为上的变化。
en: Data analysis must account for community-level and individual-level variations in behaviors.

zh: 社区介入的优点在允许研究者看著群体因介入方案而有所改变。
en: An advantage of community trials is that they allow researchers to see the population changes in behaviors as a result of interventions.

zh: 但这项优点也许会被难以改变个人行为，以及需花费更多时间(有时需要很多年)才能看到社区行为的改变等情况而抵销。
en: But this benefit is tempered by the difficulty of changing individual behaviors and the amount of time that may be required (sometimes many years) to see changes in community behaviors.

zh: 这些能量因素之间的关系是互相协调的。
en: There is a synergistic relationship between these energy factors.

zh: 在保存骨质方面，缺乏负重性活动时补充钙剂是无效的（Kanis，1991),而一生中足够的钙的摄入量有助于运动增强骨骼的作用（Kanders et al.，1988; Halioua & Anderson, 1989)。
en: Calcium supplementation in the absence of weight-bearing is ineffective in terms of bone maintenance (Kanis, 1991) while adequate lifetime calcium intake augments the bone-building effects of exercise (Kanders et al., 1988; Halioua & Anderson, 1989).

zh: 香戈尔德等（Shangold et al.，1990)证明，如果膳食中钙的摄入量不足，运动对骨骼的作用是无法实现的。
en: Shangold et al. (1990) have stated that the beneficial effects of exercise on bone cannot be realized if dietary calcium is inadequate.

zh: Alexander Leaf博士这样描述他的观察：“像祷告文一样枯燥乏味的生活方式。
en: Dr. Leaf describes his observations as “a monotonous litany of similar lifestyles.”

zh: ”他在三个地点目睹了以下状况：•贫穷的农耕文化和每日繁重的体力劳动是常态。•每日剧烈的身体活动开始于童年时代，然后持续一生。•素食。•对上了年纪的人的帮助和尊重。
en: He witnessed the following in all three locations: Poor, agrarian culture in which daily hard labor was the norm ⦁Vigorous daily physical activity beginning in childhood and persisting throughout life ⦁A vegetarian diet ⦁Strong support for the elderly

zh: 很多新的证据说明，身体脂肪含量及其分布，特别是在腹部的分布与雌性激素水平增高和雄性激素水平降低有关：血浆雌激素比值（de Ridder et al., 1990)。
en: Considerable recent evidence suggests that body fat content and its regional distribution, especially to the abdominal area, are related to increased oestrogen levels and lower androgen: oestrogen ratios in plasma (de Ridder et al., 1990).

zh: 提早成熟女孩的腹部有脂肪堆积 (Frisancho & Flegel，1982)。
en: The earlier maturing girl has an abdominal accumulation of fat (Frisancho & Flegel, 1982).

zh: 青春期发育 速度是否与身体成分和脂肪分布的方式有 关的问题尚未得到充分的研究。
en: Whether the tempo of puberty contributes to body composition and fat patterning has not been adequately studied.

zh: 神话有助于文化的发展，帮助人们理解他们身处的世界。
en: Myths contribute to the development of culture and help humans make sense of their world.

zh: 运动员个人所取得的成就可以被视为当代美国神话的基础。
en: The individual achievements of athletes can operate as the foundation for American contemporary myths.

zh: 体育神话能让运动员通过竞争、男性化以及种族认同来展现更大范围的文化神话。
en: Sports myths allow athletes to embody the larger cultural myths of competition, masculinity, and racial identity.

zh: 这些文化不同于传统的、基于文献的神话，只作用为社会日常生活的一部分。
en: Unlike traditional, literature-based myths, these myths function uniquely as part of everyday society.

zh: 我们处理外界信息，一般是将信息从感觉器官直接送至脑皮层，我们可以在这里处理感知到的信息。
en: We usually process outside information by passing it directly from the sensory organ to the cortex, where we process what we have learned.

zh: 人眼将图像信息送至丘脑，人耳将声音和平衡信息送至顶骨叶。
en: The eyes send images to the occipital lobe; and the ears send sound and balance information to the parietal lobe.

zh: 但是，嗅觉的情况比较特殊。
en: But smell is unique.

zh: 气味通过位于鼻梁顶端的檇状软骨，刺激嗅球神经。
en: An odor passes through the cribiform plate at the top of the nose and stimulates the olfactory nerve.

zh: 这种神经绕过能过滤信息的脑皮质，将信息送至人脑最初始的部分（杏仁核），在这里，情感反应几乎都是由潜意识产生的。
en: This nerve bypasses the cortex, which filters information, and sends the information to the most ancient part of our brain (amygdala), where emotional responses occur almost subconsciously.

zh: 也有一些其他的暗示，如核心体温的昼夜节律可能是驱动其他相同表现的生物节律的力量，因为体温对他们中的大多数有直接影响。
en: Some have suggested, too, that circadian rhythms of core temperature may be the driving force behind other physiological rhythms that peak at the same time of day, since body temperature has a direct influence on a number of these.

zh: 此外，在多数的例子中，这种联系似乎可以提髙运动表现。
en: Moreover, in a number of cases, such a link might be expected to improve motor performance.

zh: 例如神经传导速度，当体温每升高1℃，神经传导速度可提髙2.4m/s。酶的催化活动在新陈代谢过程中是随着体温的升髙而加速的。
en: Velocity of nerve conduction, for example, increases by 2.4 meters per second for each rise in body temperature of 1 degree C. Enzymatic activity in metabolic processes is accelerated as temperature increases.

zh: 体温的高低会明显影响肌肉和肌腱的柔韧性和收缩性。
en: Elevations in body temperature may positively influence flexibility and contractile function of muscles and tendons.

zh: 神经性厌食症特征如下：1.拒绝保持按年龄和身高计算的最低体重标准。
en: Anorexia nervosa is a disorder characterized by: 1 A refusal to maintain body weight over a minimal level considered normal for age and height.

zh: 2.身体形象变形。
en: 2 A distorted body image.

zh: 3.虽然体重不足，但是仍然强烈惧怕肥胖和增加体重。
en: 3 An intense fear of fatness or gaining weight while, in fact, remaining underweight.

zh: 4.闭经。
en: 4 Amenorrhoea.

zh: （好了，如果你喝无糖汽水，那么就至少不会吸收到无用的热量了，不过茌本书里我们说的饮水，还是指喝普通水。低糖饮料的甜味可能导致摄入糖分的其他行为——那些饮用低糖饮料的人比饮用黑咖啡、茶和水的人更容易得糖尿病。
en: (Okay, if you like diet sodas, at least you won't consume the empty calories in the cola but we mean water here. And maybe the sweet taste of diet drinks encourages other sweet consumption—those who consume “diet drinks” are more likely to develop diabetes than those who consume black coffee, tea, or water)

zh: ）另外，由于引发肾结石的主要原因是失水，所以每天身体需要补充2000毫升的水。
en: Also, since the main cause of kidney stones is dehydration, it's essential to keep your body hydrated with sixty-four ounces (eight glasses of eight ounces) of water a day.

zh: 当脑垂体腺分泌过量时，肾上腺也会反映出分泌过量的皮质醇。
en: When excess pituitary secretion happens, the adrenal glands respond by secreting excess cortisol.

zh: （这个过程就像一个激素的多米诺骨牌游戏，一种分泌诱发一连串的反应。
en: (The process is like a game of hormonal dominoes; one secretion triggers a chain of others.)

zh: ）皮质醇控制着身体处理碳水化合物、脂肪、蛋白质的过程，还帮助身体减少发炎症状。
en: Cortisol also controls the way the body processes carbohydrates, fats, and proteins, and helps the body reduce inflammation.

zh: 当然，肾脏一天的工作就是把含水的代谢废物从身体中漓除出去，但是它们更是主要的分泌激素的器官。
en: Sure, the kidneys' day job is removing water waste from your body, but they double as key hormone-producing organs as well.

zh: 你的肾脏能分泌一种激素，这种激素通过防止红色血细胞过早死亡，从而刺激它们的生成。
en: Your kidneys are responsible for producing a hormone that stimulates the production of red blood cells by preventing their premature death.

zh: 这种激素还能帮助保存其他细胞，像由于缺乏血液流动而受到伤害的心脏和脑细胞。
en: This hormone also helps preserve other cells like heart and brain cells that have been injured by lack of blood flow.

zh: 人休肠道与下列哪种器官相似？
en: Your intestines are most similar to what other organ?

zh: A.心脏，因为两者都是将营养输送到全身各处。
en: a.Your heart, because it pumps nutrients through the body.

zh: B.大脑，因为两者释放相似的化学物质。
en: b. Your brain, because it releases the same chemicals.

zh: C.声带，因为人饥饿的时候两者都会叫。
en: c. Your vocal cords, because they growl when you're hungry.

zh: D.教堂的大风琴，因为两者都能发出各种奇妙的声音。
en: d. The big one at the back of the church, because it makes all kinds of majestic sounds.

zh: 你的视力会因为几个原因而改变，比如说，你可能注意到，早上的视力会较差，这也许是因为角膜缺水造成的，而不是因为屈光问题引起的。
en: Now, your vision can change for several reasons.For instance, you may notice worse vision in the morning—but that could stem from dehydration of the cornea, not from true refractive problems.

zh: 你的眼睛需要有较好的润滑从而准确聚焦。眼球通过泪腺及副泪腺和眨眼保持润滑。
en: Your eyes need to be well lubricated to focus; they stay lubricated through your three-layer tear supply and by blinking.

zh: 这些仅仅是运动员关于时差轶事的一小部分。
在上述例子中，时差真的是肇事者吗？
en: In the preceding  examples, was jet lag really to blame?

zh: 或者仅仅是运动员的一个随意的借口？
en: Or was it just a handy excuse?

zh: 当要跨越多个时区去参加比赛，非本地运动员就会打乱他们有规律的生物节律。
en: When traveling across multiple time zones to compete, international  athletes can disturb their regular biological rhythms.

zh: 这种生理失调可能会导致他们在世界竞技舞台上灾难性的后果。
en: This physiological offset might lead to disastrous impairment in their performance on the world athletic stage.

zh: 在这方面，他们都会经历一些由时差引起的不太美好的片断：呕吐，昏厥，由时差导致的判断力下降。
en: (In this regard, they would share  infamous episodes of vomiting, fainting, and questionable judgment  induced by jet lag that have also embarrassed political leaders during  international voyages.)

zh: 你可以很容易地用关于时间的本质的书填满整个图书馆。
en: You could easily fill an entire library with what’s been written about the nature of time.

zh: 如果谁想要简洁易读的资源，可以阅读英国作家G.J.惠特罗的书《时间是什么》（What is Time），这本书是1972年牛津大学出版社出版的。
en: (Those who wish a concise, easily readable source can try the 1972 book What is Time? by the British author G.J. Whitrow from Oxford Press.)

zh: 其中有许多有趣的主题。
en: Among these discourses are many intriguing themes.

zh: 例如，爱因斯坦相对论就反对时间的绝对性，他阐述了时间的推移取决于正在看时钟的人的位置和速度。
en: For instance, Einstein’s ideas on relativity spoke against time as an absolute, stating that the passage of time depends on the location and speed of the person looking at the clock.

zh: 我们似乎忘记了时间，在不知不觉中度过了周末。
en: We were, it seemed, about to spend the weekend unaware of time.

zh: 他的想法并不是原创的。
en: (His idea was not original.)

zh: 18世纪哲学家卢梭，他扔掉手表挣脱时间的束缚，比电影《逍遥骑士》（开场中的PeterFonda(彼得•方达）)还早了几个世纪。
en: The 18th-century philosopher Jean-Jacques Rousseau, in a gesture of disdain for the constraints of time, is said to have tossed away his watch, predating Peter Fonda in the opening scene of Easy Rider by a couple of centuries.

zh: 追纵研究(follow-upstudies)、前瞻性研究 (prospective studies)与纵贯性研究(longitudinal studies) 等名词，均是用于描述世代研究设计 ( cohort study design ) 。
en: The terms follow-up studies, prospective studies, and longitudinal studies have all been used to describe the cohort study design.

zh: 在 此种研究设计中，先界定出一个大型且未罹病的群体(称为世代)，并将相关的暴露因子加以测量。
en: In this design, a large disease-free population is defined and assessment of relevant exposures is obtained.

zh: 基线资料(baseline data)主要在依据暴露因子的类别将群体进行分组 (如 :低、中、高 )。
en: Baseline data are used to categorize the cohort into levels of exposure (i.e., low, medium, high).

zh: 在基线测量完成后，追踪期间即开始计算。
en: After this baseline assessment has been made, the follow-up period begins.

zh: 因慢性病如：大肠癌与乳癌等，病例都相当少。所以 ，追踪期间所持续 的时间少至2年，多可长达至20年。
en: Because chronic diseases such as colon and breast cancer are relatively rare, the follow-up period can last from as little as 2 years to more than 20 years.

zh: 在追踪期间结束时，在此期间死亡且被诊断患有所欲探究疾病的人数，将予以统计制表。
en: At the end of the follow-up period, the number of people within the cohort who died during follow-up and were diagnosed with the disease outcome of interest is tabulated.

zh: 青光眼会使你眼睛的排水系统堵塞。（就像一个浴缸排水□被头发堵起来的情况。
en: GLAUCOMA With glaucoma, the draining system of your eye clogs up (think of a bathtub drain being covered by hair).

zh: ）眼睛内的液体无法排出，就会对视神经造成很大压力，这将会导致失明。
en: The fluid can't drain out, which creates a lot of pressure on the optic nerve, which leads to blindness.

zh: 大多数人都认为我们的眼球只是用来向外看的。
en: Most of us assume that our eyes are just for looking out.

zh: 但是就像窗户一样，眼睛一样可以用来向内看。
en: But just like windows, they can just as easily be used for looking in.

zh: 你的眼睛实际上是与大脑相连的。医生可以通过看你的眼睛看到视神经中的代表性脑神经，这也就使眼腈成为通向你大脑的一扇窗户。
en: Your eyes are actually a link to your brain —doctors can see representative brain cells in the optic nerve when they look into your eyes—making them a window into your brain.

zh: 蜘蛛看世界的方式与我们人类相同，但是它们的视觉系统的工作方式却稍有区别。
en: Spiders see like we do, but their systems work a little differently.

zh: 它们移动视网膜以便聚焦，如果它们想要看得更远些，它们就把视网膜靠得更近些，而它们的晶状体却是固定的。
en: They move their retinas to focus; if they want to see father away, they push their retina closer, while the lens stays fixed.

zh: 动物之间视力的最主要的区别就在于——捕食者拥有望远镜式的视线，以便聚焦于猎物，而被捕食者则拥有广阔视野，以便更好地找到潜在的捕食者所处的位置。
en: One of the key differences in animals is that hunters have binocular vision to focus on prey, while the hunted have peripheral vision to better locate potential predators.

zh: 男孩从儿童期早期到大约13岁时，肌肉等长收缩力量随年龄增长呈线性增加，在这期间，出现一个青春期髙峰，即力量增长的加速。
en: In boys, isometric strength increases linearly with age from early childhood to approximately the age of 13 years, when there is a clear adolescent spurt, i.e.an acceleration in strength development.

zh: 有些对女孩的研究发现，女孩力量随着年龄增加，一直到15岁，却未发现在青春期有明显的快速增长现象（Jones, 1949；Asumssen，1962；Malina & Bouchard, 1991)。
en: In girls, strength increases linearly until 15 years in several studies though there is less evidence of a clear adolescent spurt (Jones, 1949; Asmussen, 1962; Malina & Bouchard, 1991).

zh: 然而，在一项大规模横向的对佛兰德CFlemish) 女孩的研究中发现，在12〜14.5岁阶段，她们的手臂肌肉拉力的增长加速了（图1.1）。
en: However, in a large cross- sectional population study of Flemish girls an acceleration was observed in arm pull strength between 12 and 14.5 years (Fig. 1.1).

zh: 首先，让我们看看入们的平均寿命吧。在1900年美国人的平均寿命是47岁，而2000年则达到接近80岁。
en: For starters, look at the average life expectancy: forty-seven in 1900, and nearly eighty in 2000.

zh: 这增加的33岁寿命大部分要归功于公共卫生设施和医药的有效发展。
en: A lot of credit for these extra thirty-three years goes to public health and organized medicine.

zh: 所以数字显示我们活得越来越长了。
en: So statistics show that we are going to live long.

zh: 现在人们普遍认为，从事体力劳动的人，比长期伏案工作的人平均寿命要长。
en: It is now well recognized that those who are physically active, on the average, survive longer than those living sedentary lives.

zh: 研究数据清楚地显示，习惯性的能量消耗可以延缓继发性衰老，规律的运动减少健康的风险因素（血脂异常、髙血压、肥胖、骨密度下降）。
en: The research  data clearly indicate that this is specifically an expression of the favorable effect of habitual energy expenditure on secondary aging.Regular exercise reduces health risk factors (dyslipidemia, hypertension, obesity, reduced bone density).

zh: 另外，它还可能在对抗动脉硬化的过程中产生直接积极的影响。
en: In addition, it may have direct protective effects against the atherosclerotic vascular process.

zh: 那些在整个成人期都保持髙水平运动的运动员，其继发性衰老可能被延缓。
en: Athletes who maintain high levels of sport activity through their adult years can expect to benefit from limited secondary aging.

zh: 许多家伙都害怕深蹲，因为他们认为深蹲将加重膝盖旧伤。
en: Many guys are afraid of the squat, because they think it will aggravate old knee injuries.

zh: 其实事实恰恰相反。
en: In fact, the opposite is usually true.

zh: 做全福的深蹲时，增加的血液流动可以移除累积的废物，恢复旧伤组织，缓解疼痛。
en: The increased blood flow and range of motion in full squats removes waste build-up and stretches old scar tissue, alleviating pain.

zh: 膝盖及其周围的矶肉与肌腱将变得更强、更柔韧，再受伤的可能性也大大减小了。
en: The knees and surrounding muscles and tendons become stronger and more flexible, and the likelihood of future injuries is lessened.

zh: 美国是一个狂热的国度：摇呼啦圈、穿灯笼裤、养美洲豹当宠物。
en: America is a country of crazes: hula hoops, parachute pants, Chia pets.

zh: 有的流行来了又走，有的潮流经久不衰。
en: They come, they go, some stick around.

zh: 有一种 潮流似乎在国内已待了有一段时间了，这就是高蛋白饮食。
en: One that appears to be around for a while is the high-protein diet craze.

zh: 尽管高蛋白饮食像其他饮食结构一样对瘦身有效，但饮食蛋白质含量过高，会加速骨质流失。
en: Although as effective for pure weight loss as other diets, the ultra-high-protein diets can accelerate bone loss.

zh: 职业摔角从20世纪50年代开始赢得声誉，参赛选手们开始为他们的粉丝扮演英雄或是恶棍的角色。
en: Since professional wrestling first gained prominence in the 1950s, its competitors have played the roles of heroes and villains for their fans.

zh: 一些摔角选手的职业轨迹包括了在角色上从“坏人”到救赎再到崇拜的转变。
en: The trajectories of some wrestler personae have included a journey from "bad guy" to redemption and adoration.

zh: 其他的故事情节也包括，一个看起来是“好人”的家伙，经常莫名其妙地变得“邪恶”，并且伤害那些偶尔进入他地盘的人。
en: Other storylines have told the tale of a seemingly "good guy" who, often inexplicably, turns "evil" and hurts those who were once in his corner.

zh: 而关于摔角手克里斯•贝诺伊特的成名和陨落的真实故事，就像是后一个故事更令人毛骨悚然当然也更悲伤的版本。
en: The real-life story of the rise and fall of wrestler, Chris Benoit, plays like a more gruesome, and certainly sadder, version of the latter.

zh: 想要保持这个姿势，你的背部和双腿必须像铁板一样坚挺。
en: To maintain this position, your back and legs have to be stiff as a board—hence the name “plank.”

zh: 若没有图片，你很难想象该动作是怎样的——下图能够帮助你了解这一点。
en: This is an extremely difficult exercise to visualize without a picture, so I’ve included a photo below to help.

zh: 水平俯卧撑是块难啃的硬骨头，攻克它的关键就是坚持练习十式，增强身体的力量。
en: The exercise is a tough one to pull off; the key is persistence along with the development of basic strength through practicing the ten steps.

zh: 脂肪在咽喉后部积累，引起打鼾，在人入睡时，周边肌肉放松，还会引发睡眠呼吸暂停综合征。
en: Fat accumulates in the back of the throat and causes snoring and sleep apnea when the surrounding muscles relax during sleep.

zh: 在舌后部的会厌不让食物进人气管（主通风管），避免呛噎。
en: At the back of the tongue, the epiglottis protects the trachea (windpipe) from food and prevents choking.

zh: 甲状腺就位于脖子上气管前部。有些人的甲状腺清楚可见。
en: The thyroid gland, which is nestled just in front of the trachea in your neckr can be seen in some folks.

zh: 这个松果体能够同你的眼睛一样感受光线。有些动物在感受到不同的光的时候能够改变皮肤的颜色，即使在它们眼睛闭着的时候，因为松果体实际上是能够“看见”光线的。
en: That pineal gland actually senses light the way your eyes would.Some animals can change their skin color when they sense different light—even if their eyes are closed—because the pineal gland actually "sees" the light.

zh: 在人类身上，松果体起着同样的作用，但利用其他原理来感光。
en: In humans, the pineal gland may work the same way but through other mechanisms that sense light.

zh: 通过研究发现，运动员不同的跑步速度，确定了比赛这部分的步频和步长对速度的贡献比例。
en: Studies of the athletes running at various speeds have been performed to determine the relative contributions of stride frequency and length to velocity during this portion of the race.

zh: 在相对低的速度（低于7m/s）时，步频和步长随着速度的增加呈线性上升。
en: At relatively slow speeds (below 7 meters per second, or m/s), both stride rate and stride length increase in a linear fashion with rise in velocity.

zh: 当然，步长的增加一定伴有肌肉力量产生的增加。
en: Increases in stride length are, as expected, accompanied by parallel rise in production of muscle force.

zh: 然而，一旦超过这个速度，步频的增加会超过既定速度的增加。
en: Above this speed, however, stride rate increases more for a given increase in velocity.

zh: 儿童和青少年的磷酸果糖激酶(PFK)活性低于成年人这一事实也支持 上面的研究结果（Eriksson et al.，1973; Eriksson, 1980)。PFK是调节糖酵解的一个主要的酶。
en: Consistent with these observations is the fact that the activity of the enzyme PFK, a major regulator of glycolysis, is lower in children and adolescents than in adults (Eriksson etal., 1973; Eriksson, 1980).

zh: 除此之外，儿童和青少年根本无法产生或承受文献所报道的成年人那样高的酸中毒（acidosis)水平（血 液pH值增高或械基减少）（Kindermann et al., 1975; Metejkova et al., 1980; Bar-Or, 1985) 。
en: In addition, children and adolescents are not able to generate or sustain levels of acidosis (as indicated by blood pH or base excess) as high as those reported in adults (Kindermann et al., 1975; Metejkova et al., 1980; Bar-Or, 1985).

zh: 许多肥胖症患者已经通过胃绕道手术成功瘦身。
en: Many obese people have received attention for losing weight from gastric bypass surgery.

zh: 病人术后食量无法与从前一样，是因为很大一部分胃不再参与消化作用。
en: After the surgery, people simply can't eat as much food because a major portion of their stomach has been excluded.

zh: 但是近日研究者发现病人不会觉得饥饿的原因并非胃部变小，而是胃部能分泌促进食欲的饥饿激素的部分被切除了。
en: But researchers recently found out that part of the reason why they're not hungry isn't necessarily because their stomachs are smaller but because the segment of the stomach producing the appetite-inducing ghrelin hormone was removed.

zh: 当脑垂体腺分泌过量时，肾上腺也会反映出分泌过量的皮质醇。
en: When excess pituitary secretion happens, the adrenal glands respond by secreting excess cortisol.

zh: （这个过程就像一个激素的多米诺骨牌游戏，一种分泌诱发一连串的反应。
en: (The process is like a game of hormonal dominoes; one secretion triggers a chain of others.)

zh: ）皮质醇控制着身体处理碳水化合物、脂肪、蛋白质的过程，还帮助身体减少发炎症状。
en: Cortisol also controls the way the body processes carbohydrates, fats, and proteins, and helps the body reduce inflammation.

zh: 该研究没有设立对照组来排除生长本身的作用。
en: This study did not include a control group to tease out the effects of growth per se.

zh: 在另外一项没有对照的介入研究中，对西班牙15-17岁女孩和男孩在一年短跑、爆发力和力量训练前后进行测试。
en: In another, uncontrolled intervention study, Spanish 15—17-year-old girls and boys were tested before and after a year of intense sprint, power and strength training.

zh: 股外侧肌活检发现I型和II型纤维的直径，I型纤维的比例, 糖原的含量增加了。糖原分解酶（磷酸果糖激酶和丙酮酸激酶）和氧化酶（琥珀酸脱氢酶和氨基酸转化酶）的活性加强了。
en: Biopsies of the vastus lateralis muscle revealed an increase in the diameter of both type I and II fibres, the proportion of type I fibres, the contents of glycogen, as well as the activity of glycolytic (phosphofructokinase and primarily pyruvate kinase) and oxidative (succinate dehydrogenase and amino acid transferases) enzymes.

zh: 同样，由于缺乏对照，无法确定上述变化在多大程度上来自生长本身以及多大程度来自训练的结果。
en: Again, the lack of controls does not allow to determine the extent to which the above changes resulted from growth per se and from training.

zh: 不过，从留存至今的文字与图像中我们所能了解的是，那些极富传奇色彩的战士和运动员使用的自身体重训练法与今天广为人们熟知的“体操”几乎没有一点儿相似之处，远不是一种软绵绵的有氧训练。而更像是力量训练。
en: What we do know from the surviving descriptions and images was that the bodyweight training performed by these legendary warriors and athletes bore little resemblance to what is known as “calisthenics” today.

zh: 事实上，他们的锻炼方法的确更适用于增强力量和爆发力。
en: Rather than being a relatively soft form of aerobic training, their systems would have looked more like gymnastics, and would definitely have been geared more solidly to the progressive development or power and strength.

zh: 用这些测定的数据来扩大现有的数据库，将为我们详细说明不同年龄和人种儿童的身体成分提供参照标准。
en: Expanding the current database with this in mind will provide the opportunity to define more appropriately the reference body composition of children at various ages within gender and racial groups.

zh: 理论上，这一参照标准有助于更好地确定最低体重和肥胖的标准。
en: Conceptually, the reference body can assist in the better definition of standards for minimal body weight and obesity.

zh: 以FFB和实际的脂肪含量确定的最低体重的概念和标准，对于评定营养状态以及在诸如摔跤运动（采用体重分级的项目）中的应用均具有十分重大的意义。
en: The concept and measurement of minimal body weight, which is defined by FFB and essential fat, is important for the evaluation of nutritional status and for application in sports such as wrestling in which weight classification systems are used.

zh: 带有微机的简单的线性体重计功能稳定，可以进行校正，计算机能够进行系统的称重数值的校正。
en: With access to microcomputers, simple non­linear scales that behave consistently can be calibrated and a computer algorithm used to make systematic corrections of scale values.

zh: 每一名研究人员和临床医生的责任是对体重计进行校正。
en: The onus on every investigator and clinician is to calibrate weighing machines.

zh: 一种简单的方法就是用杠铃片来精确称重并进行校正。
en: A simple way to do this is to have a set of barbell weights accurately weighed and stamped.
Sometimes this is possible at a governmental agency or private company.

zh: 使用标准重量包（从小重量到2kg）就可以对体重计进行即时的评估。
en: Intermediate values can be assessed using a kit of known of weight standards of up to 2 kg.

zh: 如果你已明白了要补充奶制品这个道理，就要确保摄入的奶制品是低脂或无脂的，因为摄入多余的脂肪通常会导致每天吸收过多的饱和脂肪（每日超过20克会使人衰老）。
en: If you do hit the mark, make sure that you choose low-fat or fat-free versions of dairy foods, because the extra fat often leads to too much saturated fat a day (more than 20 grams a fay ages you).

zh: 饱和脂肪会引发动脉发炎，提高免疫系统系乱和癌症的发生率，并造成体重增加。之前已经说过，体重增加对骨骼和关节会产生负面影响。
en: That saturated fat causes inflammation in your arteries, increases your chance of immune fysfunctions and cancer, and causes weight gain—which, as you know, can have a negative effect on  your bones and joints.

zh: 虽然在技术上体重指数（body mass index, BMI)不能归类为身体成分测量，但是它在临床和流行病学方面在成年人中得到了广泛的应用。体重指数只需要测量身髙和体重。
en: While BMI （body mass index) cannot be technically classified as a body composition measurement, it has received widespread use with adults in clinical and epidemiological assessments.BMI only requires measurement of height and body weight.

zh: 它的定义就是体重/身髙的平方，以kg / m2表示。
en: It is defined as body weight/height2 and expressed as kg/m2.

zh: 加强腹部肌肉力量以支撑背部的最简单的方法之一就是保持良好的姿势。
en: One of the easiest ways to strengthen your abdominal muscles and support your back一is through good posture.

zh: 你自己可能觉得已经站得很直了，但实际上，我们大多数人的站姿都像比萨斜塔。
en: You may feel like you're standing straight, but in reality, most of us stand like the Leaning Tower of Pisa.

zh: 要训练良好的体姿，就要让头和脖子向后靠。
en: Practice good posture by bringing your head and neck back.

zh: 如果你只是刚刚开始训练,并且有空间或者预算限制,那么请记住:军队部署的训练场地只有沙袋和其他现成的设备,士兵们也一样可以进行有效的CrossFit训练。
en: If you’re just getting started and have space or budget restrictions, keep in mind that military units deployed to the field have designed effectiveCrossFit workouts using nothing more than a sandbag and other available equipment.

zh: 在美国俄亥俄州马里恩,在监狱里士兵进行 CrossFit训练[美国全国有色人种协进会(NAACP)项目的一部分], 他们的器械无非是跳绳和一间训练室。
en: And there is a group called the Fit for Life Crew in Marion, Ohio, doing CrossFit in prison (part of an NAACP program) with nothing more than a jump rope and a room to train in.

zh: 换句话说,训练不需要借口。
en: In other words, no excuses.

zh: 选择效标对同时效度而言是极为重要的。
en: Choosing the criterion is critical in the concurrent validity method.

zh: 同时效度能告诉你的仅仅是测量值与效标的相关程度。
en: All the correlation can tell you is the degree of relationship between a measure and the criterion.

zh: 如果你选的效标不适当，那么同时效度的相关系数就失去意义了。
en: If the criterion is inadequate, then the concurrent validity coefficient is of little consequence.

zh: 自Glass从1976年引入统合分析以来，数以千计的统合分析文章陆续被发表，特别是在社会科学、行为科学，以及医学科学领域。
en: Since Glass introduced meta-analysis in 1976, thousands of meta-analyses have been published, especially in the social, behavioral, and medical sciences.

zh: 在1986年由美国国家卫生研究院所赞助的随机控制试验概述方法学议题工作坊（Workshop on Methodological Issues in Overviews of Randomized Clinical Trials )，与会者在以统合分析进行健康相关与医学研究之应用，皆投入可观的注意力。
en: At a national conference in 1986 sponsored by the U.S. National Institutes of Health, Workshop on Methodological Issues in Overviews of Randomized Clinical Trials, participants focused considerable attention on meta-analysis for health-related and medical research.

zh: 由Cooper与Hedges在1994年编着的《研究整合手册（The Handbook of ResearchSynthesis)》，仍然是规划与实施统合分析综评( meta-analytical review) 中最有用的信息来源之一。
en: The Handbook o f Research Synthesis, edited by Cooper and Hedges (1994), is still one of the most useful sources of information for planning and conducting meta-analytical reviews.

zh: 在本章的开头，我们就提到一些能用来描述资料特性、检验关联性、考验差异性的统计技术。
en: At the beginning of this chapter, we stated that statistical techniques allow the description of data characteristics, the testing of relationships, and the testing of differences.

zh: 然而，当我们讨论描述和推论（inference)时，我们并不是在讨论统计技术，即便这两个词有时候会与统计技术混淆了9这样的混淆是由于我们用相关来描述关联性，以及用群组间的差异考验技术来推论因果关系和影响效果。
en: When we discuss description and inference, though, we are not discussing statistical techniques, although those two words are sometimes confused with statistical techniques.This confusion is the result of saying that correlations describe relationships and that cause and effect are inferred by techniques for testing differences between groups.

zh: 这些陈述未必完全真实。
en: These statements are not necessarily true.

zh: 肌营养不良时，体力活动受限主要是由肌肉耐力因素引起的，而不是由氧运输系统的缺陷引起（Bar- Or, 1986)。
en: In MD, limitations on physical capacities are due to muscle endurance factors rather than due to deficiencies in the oxygen transport system (Bar-Or, 1986).

zh: 患杜兴型肌营养不良儿童的平均无氧功率减低，低于平均值2-4个标 准差以上（Bar-Or，1983)，“代谢指数” (最大无氧功率与最大有氧功率之比）下降（Bar-Or 1983)。霍斯金等（1976) 也报告，肌营养不良患儿在抬头和举腿 45°测定时，肌肉耐力下降。
en: Mean anaerobic power is reduced by as much as 2 —4 SD below the mean (Bar-Or, 1983) and there is a reduced ‘metabolic index' (ratio of peak anaerobic to peak aerobic power) (Bar-Or, 1983) in children with D uchenne's M D. Hosking et al. (1976) also reported reduced muscle endurance as measured by 450 head and leg lift in children with MD.

zh: 考虑到这些青年退出运动问题的貌似合理的解释，研究人员意识到，单纯地去探讨退出原因不再重要。
en: Given these plausible explanations for youth sport withdrawal, researchers have realized that simply identifying reasons for sport withdrawal may no longer be appropriate.

zh: 相反，更好地理解影响儿童退出运动的因素应该成为研究的重点。
en: Rather, a better understanding of the factors influencing a child's decision to drop out of sport should be the primary focus of youth sport withdrawal research.

zh: 本章采用过程分析法重点分析可能导致儿童退出运动的因素。
en: This chapter is structured to examine youth sport withdrawal from a process-oriented approach focusing on factors that may contribute to the child's withdrawal from sport.

zh: 泰纳（Theiner,2003)解释伤病是造成尼卡宁失败赛季的原因，也是导致他退役的终极原因。
en: Theiner (2003) explained that injuries caused Nykanen's unsuccessful season and were the ultimate reason for Nykanen's retirement.

zh: 在1991年世界锦标赛之前，尼卡宁接受了一次膝盖手术，导致他一整年不能参加训练。
en: Nykanen had a knee operation and could not practice during the year preceding the World Championships in 1991.

zh: 在他的运动生涯中，尼卡宁一共接受了四次膝盖手术，在从跳台滑雪界退役之后他还接受了两次背部手术。
en: During his career, Nykanen had four knee operations; he later underwent two back operations after retiring from ski jumping.

zh: 在讨论昼夜节律、时差反应和运动表现时，不可能不提到褪黑素，它可能充当着视交叉上核内生物钟与明-暗循环之间的介质。
en: No discussion of circadian rhythms, jet lag, and sports performance would be complete without a mention of melatonin, which may serve as the mediator by which the biological clock in the suprachiasmatic  nucleus (SCN) is linked to light-dark cycles.

zh: 褪黑素是由松果体在由天模式下分泌的，它受光的影响非常强烈。
en: Melatonin is secreted by the pineal gland in a diurnal fashion that is very strongly influenced by light.

zh: 在晚上黑暗时，褪黑素的分泌水平是白天的30倍。
en: Levels during the dark of night can be 30 times greater than  in the daytime.

zh: 视交叉上核上遍布褪黑素受体，据推测，是为了与明-暗循环保持一致。
en: And the SCN is equipped with melatonin receptors, presumably to stay in tune with light-dark cycles.

zh: 学习调动核心肌肉发力。
en: Learn to engage your core muscles.

zh: 麦肯齐建议，在日常生活中分配25%的时间使用核心肌肉支撑躯干活动。
en: MacKenzie recommends turning on the muscles supporting your trunk to about a constant 25 percent level of engagement.

zh: 收紧臀部肌肉和腹部肌肉，就像你准备着在胃部挨一拳的感觉，保持该姿势15分钟后放松。
en: Do this by squeezing the glute muscles and locking the ab muscles, as if you were bracing for a punch to the stomach, then dial it down to about a quarter effort.

zh: 这套简单的动作可以帮助你纠正骨盆至一个健康的位置。
en: This simple sequence will brace the pelvis into healthy position.

zh: 在你站立、走路或者跑步时，都可以做这个动作，在坐下之前注意保持下脊椎正直。
en: Do this when you’re standing, when you are walking or running, and before you sit down with a well-braced lower spine.

zh: 布里尔等（Brill et al.，1989)研究了参加高中或大学竞技运动队的345名25~60岁的男子。
en: Brill et al. (1989) studied 345 men aged 25-60 years who had participated in competitive sports teams in high school or college.

zh: 当与75名非运动员对照组比较时，原运动员在成年期的经常体力活动的水平是没有差别的。
en: Level of regular physical activity during adult years was not different in the former athletes when compared to 75 non-athlete control subjects.

zh: 两组之间的大多数冠心病的危险因素（体重指数，血清脂质状况和血压）是类似的。
en: Most coronary risk factors (body mass index, serum lipid profile and blood pressure) were similar in the two groups.

zh: 我们所知道关于预防癌症的显而易见的方法来自食物和营养。
en: Some of the clearest evidence we have about preventing cancer comes in the form of food and nutrients.

zh: 也就是说，避免并不是第一种防御措施（像皮肤癌和肺癌），而是要通过营养。
en: That is, in cases where avoidence isn't the first defense (like skin and lung cancer), nutrition is.

zh: 除虫专家自有他们的药物、药剂和毒药来把害虫清除出你的房子，但是你的灭癌药剂却来自不同类型的营养和维生素。
en: Exterminators have their own set of chemicals, potions, and poisons they use to keep citters out of your house, but your cancer-fighting potions come in the form of a variety of nutrients and vitamins.

zh: 研究表明维生素的确降低了癌症的发生率，流行病学研究和试管实验都证明了这一点。
en: Research has shown that vitamin D does decrease the risk of cancer—in both epidemiological and test-tube stuides.

zh: 有一种理论说某种形式的维生素D能够杀死基因突变细胞，也就是说维生素D也许对于潜在的癌细胞是致命杀手。第二个理论是说维生素D能够帮助纠错基因找到癌细胞，并置之于死地，这就像给纠错基因准备的放大镜。
en: Onr theory is that a form of the vitamin actually kills cell mutations—meaning that D might be toxic to potentially cancerous cells and cause them to die—sort of acting like a magnifying glass for the proofreader gene.

zh: 复合维生素剂（同时摄取含有少含脂肪的食物），包含至少400亳克的叶酸；1000国际单位的维生素D；1200毫克的钙；400毫克的镁和日均值的其他维生素。一日分两次，每次服食总摄入量的一半。
en: Multivitamin (taken with a little fat) that contains at least 400 micrograms of folate, 1,000 IU of vitamin D, 1200 milligrams of calcium, 400 milligrams of megnesium, and a daily value (DV) of all others; it's actually best for optimal body levels and absorption to take half of the total twice a day.

zh: 如果你正在服用斯达汀（降E固醇药）就要减少维生素C和维生素E的量。
en: (Reduce doses of vitamins C and E if you are takig a statin.)

zh: 如果人体补充维生素超过这一剂量，维生素A就不能起到抗氧化效果，而是会起相反作用，造成细胞氧化、基因受损。
en: When you get more than that amount from supplements of vitamins, it doesn't serve its purpose as an antioxidant.In fact, it does the opposite and oxidizes tissue, which causes DNA damage.

zh: 芬兰的一项研究表明，补充维生素A的人患肺癌、动脉粥样硬化的可能性升高，而补充维生素A的吸烟者则更易得中风。
en: One study from Finland showed that people taking vitamin A had a higher risk of lung cancer, atherosclerosis, and, for smokers, stroke.

zh: 因此，应将维生素A摄入量控制在每天1500到2500国际单位之间。
en: So keep your vitamin supplement dose to 1,500 to 2,500 IU a day.

zh: 进食后很快就躺下，会让胃酸向上流回食道，令你产生灼热感，强化胃食道反流的症状。
en: Lying down so soon after eating encourages the flow of acid back up your esophagus so you get that burning taste, which will intensify the symptoms of GERD.

zh: 进食时要避开那些促进胃食道反流发展的因素，例如辣味饮食、咖啡因和酒精。
en: While you're at it, avoid GERD-promoting items like foods or beverages containing pepper or peppers, caffeine, and alcohol.

zh: 有些药 片如果不伴水服下，也会引发胃食道反流（这些情况是因人而异的)。
en: Some pills can also cause GERD if you don’t take them with water (these are individual to the person).

zh: 温盖特无氧试验结果显示，肌营养不良儿童的最大输出功率和平均输出功率均在正常值以下。
en: Both peak and mean power output as assessed by the Wingate anaerobic test are subnormal in children with MD.

zh: 温盖特无氧试验结果并体重校正后显示，6-14岁儿童的无氧能力和耐力均明显减低。
en: Anaerobic power and endurance in children 6-14 years of age was significantly reduced on the Wingate anaerobic test when corrected for body wreight.

zh: 中度和严重脑瘫患者最大功率输出和平均功率输出低于正常值3-4个标准差。
en: Peak and mean power output was 3-4 SD below normal in moderate to severe CP.

zh: 沃尔夫氏定律的另一个人体例子是由休斯敦发现的，他研究了一名先天性胫骨缺失的男孩。
en: Another example of Wolff's law, this time with a human model, has been documented by Houston in a case study of a boy born with only one instead of two bones in the lower leg (congenital absence of the tibia).

zh: 在2岁时，骨科医生为他移植了一根腓骨（腓骨通常是细小的支撑长骨），位于股骨之下以便负重。
en: Orthopaedic surgeons operated on this handicapped infant when he was 2 years old and moved the fibula, which is normally a thin strut bone, centrally beneath the femur so that it could bear weight.

zh: 男孩3.5岁时，经过18个月负重后，那个承担胫骨工作的腓骨在大小、形态和力量方面基本上与缺损的胫骨一样。
en: When this boy was 3.5 years old, after 18 months of weight-bearing, the fibula which was doing the work of the tibia assumed essentially the size, shape and strength of the missing tibia.

zh: 信度系数（coefficient of reliability）是真实分数的变异量与观察分数变异量的比率。
en: The coefficient of reliability is the ratio of true score variance to observed score variance.

zh: 由于真实分数的变异量无法得知，因此要以观察分数变异量减去误差分数变异量来估计。
en: Because true score variance is never known, it is estimated by subtracting error variance from observed score variance.

zh: 因而信度系数反映的是测量值不受误差变异量影响的程度。
en: Thus, the reliability coefficient reflects the degree to which the measurement is free of error variance.

zh: 女士们经常会做膝盖俯卧撑，因为她们的上肢力量相对较弱，不易完成标准俯卧撑，不过这个动作对男士也大有好处。
en: Women often do kneeling pushups because they lack the relative upper body strength to perform the full pushup, but this exercise offers great benefits to guys as well.

zh: 对那些超重或身材走形的人来说，膝盖俯卧撑是不错的起点。因为采用这样的姿势推起上半身相对容易，所以在开始做更难的俯卧撑之前，膝盖俯卧撑是绝佳的热身练习。
en: It’s a good starting exercise for somebody who’s maybe overweight or out of shape, and because you can pump up the upper body with relative ease in this position, kneeling pushups make an excellent warm up exercise you can do before attempting harder forms of pushup.

zh: 最后，战斗消灭了细菌，但也牺牲了T细胞和B细胞，留下一摊垃圾（这被称作细胞自杀机制，是T细胞和B细胞的自我摧毀，为避免它们伤害健康的细胞）。
en: Finally, that battle leaves the bacteria dead, but it also kills the T and B cells, leaving a pool of waste behind (its called apoptosis—the T and B cells self-destruct so they don't destroy healthy cells).

zh: 这一摊废物使皮下造成压力，从而形成了为这场战斗提供新血液的红色供给线和为此做出反应的白细胞所产生的白色脓液。
en: This pool of waste builds up pressure under the skin, creating redness from new blood supply lines coming to battle and pus from the white blood cells responding to the scene.

zh: 战斗剩下的废物就像火山一样升至皮肤表面形成丘疹。
en: Like a volcano, the waste material rises to the surface to form the pimple.

zh: 当然，要完成呼吸过程，肺的其他组成部分也是必不可少的。
en: Of course, your lungs also have other parts that are integral to the breathing process.

zh: 支气管负责清理肺部环境。
en: Your bronchial tubes are responsible for cleaning out your lungs.

zh: 肺就像小块的生日蛋糕，表面包裹着黏液，黏附着灰尘和微生物。
en: Typically, they’re like a four-year-old’s birthday cake covered with mucus, which dirt and germs stick to.

zh: 肺部还有上百万根被称为纤毛的细小绒毛。
en: Your lungs also have millions of tiny hairs called cilia.

zh: 纤毛的作用像小扫帚，将所有黏在黏液上的杂物统统扫走。
en: Cilia act like little brooms that sweep away all the stuff that s caught in your mucus.

zh: 但是，完全性房室传导阻滞的患者在剧烈运动时，心率很少能够达到每分钟 90~110次。
en: People with complete congenital heart block, however, rarely attain a heart rate of greater than 90—100 beats-m in ' 1 during vigorous exercise.

zh: 一般需要进行运动试验来确定这些患者的运动限度。
en: Often an exercise test is required to establish the limits of their physical activity.

zh: 具有心率反应特性的起搏器对于这些病人参加剧烈运动是非常有帮助的。
en: A rate responsive pacemaker is very helpful in allowing these individuals to participate in vigorous physical activity.

zh: 在允许参加运动之前，他们必须得到医生的检查和治疗。
en: They should be under the care of a physician before being allowed to participate.

zh: 变项彼此相互影响的方式并非总是清楚的。例如,X—Y—Z或者X—Y—Z 。在第一个 情况,X 影响著Y ,Y接着影响Z ;但是在第二个情况下,Y 影响著X和Z。这是个简单的实例。
en: The way variables influence one another is not always clear; for example, X -» / - » Z, or X -» T Z. In the first case, X influences Y, which in turn influences Z, but in the second case, Y influences both X and Z. This is a simple example.

zh: 路径分析和线性结构关系使得变项相互影响的模型方式可以变得更加复杂
en: Path analysis and LISREL allow a more complex modeling of the way variables influence one another.

zh: 这其实就是内分泌系统所负责的工作。这个全身性腺体系统能释放基本的激素以保持身体调整到筋佳状态并工作正常，使你感到舒适。
en: That's really the job of your endocrine system: a system of glands throughout your body that releases essential hormones to keep your body fine-tuned to function well and comfortably.

zh: 大多数激素的工作都类似祖母做的事：她们做了好事却不让任何人注意到，你的生活幸福全是因为她们。
en: Most of these hormones do Grandma's work; they perform good deeds without anyone ever noticing, and you live a good life because of all they do.

zh: 胜算比的解释如同在世代研究中所估算的相对风险。
en: The odds ratio is interpreted as an estimate of the relative risk that would have been calculated in the study group if a cohort study had been conducted.

zh: 胜算比的虚无值是1.0。
en: Like the relative risk, the null value of the odds ratio is 1.

zh: 当值高于1.0代表风险增加;小于1.0表示风险下降。
en: 0. Values above 1.0 typically indicate increased risk, and values less than 1.0 indicate reduced risk.

zh: 相关系数(coefficient of correlation)是两个以上变项之间的关系定量值，其范围可包含正或负的.00 到1.
en: The coefficient of correlation is a quantitative value of the relationship between two or more variables.The correlation coefficient can range from .00 to 1.00 in either a positive or negative direction.

zh: 0 0 。因此，完美相关是1.0 0 ( +1.00 或 -1.00)，而完全不相关是.00。欲了解完美相关性和无相关性的例子，请参考充电站:「相关性：完美和没那麽完美」。
en: Thus, perfect correlation is 1.00 (either +1.00 or -1.00), and no relationship at all is .00 (see the sidebar Correlation: Perfect and Not So Perfect for examples of perfect correlations and examples of no correlation).

zh: 知识测量很明显是体育、运动科学教育中的基础部分。
en: Obviously, the measurement of knowledge is a fundamental part of the educational aspects of physical education, exercise science, and sport science.

zh: 同时,建构知识测验也与研究目的有关。
en: But the construction of knowledge tests is relevant for research purposes as well.

zh: 对多数在研究中使用的纸笔测量工具建立信效度的程序,与之前讨论的程序相似。
en: The procedures for establishing the validity and reliability of most pencil-and-paper measuring instmments used in research are similar to the procedures previously discussed.That is, we must perform item analysis.

zh: 也就是说我们必须进行项目分析 (关于知识测验方法论更详尽的讨论,请参阅 Mood, 1989) °
en: (For a more thorough discussion of measurement methodology for knowledge tests, see Mood, 1989.)

zh: 项目难度(item difficulty)的分析通常不难完成。
en: The analysis of item difficulty is usually accomplished easily.

zh: 只要简单的以答对题目的人数除以回答题目的总人数便可得到。
en: You simply divide the number of people who correctly answered the item by the number of people who responded to the item.

zh: 例如,如果80个人回答题目,60个人答对,则此项目的难度指标为.75 (60/80)。一个题目越难,其难度指标越低。
en: For example, if 80 people answered an item and 60 answered it correctly, the item would have a difficulty index of .75 (60 / 80).

zh: 看看哮喘病人的肺部图片（见图5.1)，想象一下，如果在你深呼吸后，支气管夹上一把钳子，将肺部的气体全部抽空，这时的感觉如何？
en: Take a look at the picture of lungs affected by asthma (see Figure 5.1) and imagine what happens if you take a deep breath and then clamp a vise on the bronchus that drains air from the lung.

zh: 空气挤在阻塞点处，想向下活动却毫无办法，如同一只倒置的装着水的瓶子。
en: The air stays bottled up at the point of obstruction.

zh: 你会听到一声哨音，当气流穿过通风系统受阻时，这种声音还会变大。
en: You hear a whistling sound and the noise intensifies when the airflow has trouble making it through the ventilation system.

zh: 这就是哮喘。
en: That's asthma.

zh: 有些作者报告，有的哮喘患者不是即刻，而是在4-10小时后发生呼气气流迟发的下降，同时伴有胸闷、哮鸣或两者并存。
en: It has been reported by some investigators that some patients with asthma will suffer not just an immediate but also a late reduction in expiratory airflow, 4-10 h later, associated with chest tightness, wheezing or both.

zh: 有迟发反应的患者出现血中NCF水平增高，但即刻反应的患者只出现即刻NCF升高。出现这种迟发反应患者的循环NCF水平很低，而出现即刻反应的那些患者的NCF水平只在早期上升。
en: Patients who experience these late responses have been shown to have increased circulating levels of NCF, while those patients who have only the immediate response have only an initial rise in NCF.

zh: 像台阶冲刺跑和推汽车一样，消防员冲刺跑对我们的心肺功能、心血管耐力、腿部的新陈代谢及全身的能量生成都极有好处。
en: Like stair sprints and car pushing, fireman sprint is great for heart and lung capacity, cardiovascular stamina, leg metabolism and total body energy generation.

zh: 这是一项很有趣又很有难度的运动，像任何一种涉及外在负重的练习一样，它本身也有危险。
en: It’s an interesting and demanding technique, but—like any exercise involving external loads—there are inherent risks.

zh: 你要好好热身，而且要穿着结实的靴子，以保护脚踝。此外，在整个练习过程中都要保持精神集中。
en: Warm up well, wear solid boots to protect your ankles and retain mental focus throughout the exercise.

zh: 该方法不仅在消防员中很流行，在保镖中也广泛使用，因为他们可能需要背着保护对象迅速脱离险境。
en: This method isn’t only popular with firefighters; it’s also used extensively by bodyguards and close protection specialists, who might have to carry a client out of a dangerous area quickly.

zh: 耳蜗旁边就是前庭迷宫——三条位于不同轴上的系列导管。
en: Next to the cochlea resides a vestibular labyrinth—three serial canals all on different axes from one another.

zh: 它们负责控制人的旋转运动，特别是在提供有关你所处的空间位置的信息方面。
en: They are responsible for rotational movement—specifically in terms of giving you the information about where you are in space.

zh: 这是构成你的平衡系统的四种器官之一。（另外三个是你的视觉，它能帮你纠正平衡问题；你的本体感受，它负责告诉你身体器官相对的空间位置；还有你的小脑，它统合其他几部分为你提供平衡。）
en: Its one of the four things that make up your balancing system (the other three are your vision, which helps correct balance problems; proprioception, which is responsible for telling you where your body parts are relative to space; and your cerebellum, which integrates all the other parts to give you balance).

zh: 小腿围（calf girth)。
en: Calf girth.

zh: 当受试者站立，体重平均分布在双脚时，小腿的最大围度。
en: Maximum perimeter of the calf when the subject stands with weight equally distributed on both feet.

zh: 进行测量时，要确保测到的数值是最大的，这就要用拇指和食指松紧卷尺并用中指确保测量时卷尺是与腿的长轴呈直角。
en: Make this measurement by manipulation of the tape taking a series of girth measurements to assure the largest value, loosening and snubbing of the tape with your thumbs and index finger grips and levelling with your third digit to ensure the measurement is obtained when the tape is perpendicular to the long axis of the leg.

zh: 通过小众媒体，滑板运动开创并推崇一种倡导年轻独立和放荡不羁的生活方式，主要吸引十几岁的白人男性。
en: Through its niche media, skateboarding created and sold a lifestyle that embraced youthful independence and an outlaw masculinity which attracted primarily teenaged White males.

zh: 20世纪90年代，这种“打包”的生活方式使得这一很抢手的群体很容易被滑板之外的东西所吸引。
en: In the 1990s this "packaged" lifestyle made this highly sought-after demographic easily targeted by those outside of skateboarding.

zh: 极限运动比赛的故事体现了这一趋势。
en: The story of the X Games exemplifies this trend.

zh: 史密斯（1986)将基于竞赛应激造成的退出运动和心理耗竭的退出加以区别。
en: Smith (1986) differentiates between the sport burnout and sport drop-out based on cognitive-affective issues resulting from competitive stress.

zh: 史密斯特另将心理耗竭的退出定义为因慢性应激引起的心理、情感和身体减退的一种退出。
en: Specifically, Smith defines bum-out as the psychological, emotional and physical withdrawal from sport resulting from chronic stress.

zh: 另一方面，单纯退出是兴趣改变和（或）价值观念转换所致，是本章探讨的重点。
en: Drop-out, on the other hand, results from a change of interests and/or value reorientation and is the focus of this chapter.

zh: 进行上述检查的大多数儿童都会被诊断为肌肉骨骼系统引起的胸痛（Duster, 1990)。
en: The majority of children who undergo such an evaluation are diagnosed with musculoskeletal chest pain (Duster, 1990).

zh: 心前区暂停吸气综合征（precordial catch syndrome)也是经过检查的儿童胸痛的常见的一个原因。
en: Precordial catch syndrome is also a frequent cause of chest pain in children who have been evaluated.

zh: 儿童真正由心血管系统引起的胸痛是很少见的。
en: True cardiovascular origin of chest pain in children is rare.

zh: 常见的瓣膜问题是二尖脱垂。
en: The most common valve problem is matral valve prolapse (the name "mitral", by the way, comes from miter, the two-leaved hat worn by popes), in which the valve between the left atrium and left ventricle doesn't slam closed fully, just like in Figure

zh: 补充一句，“二尖瓣”这个词源自“主教冠”,它是主教戴的帽子，有两个尖。
如图2.3所示，位于左心房和左心室之间的瓣膜不能正常闭合。
在51例死亡病例中，23例发生在胸部被球击中后继发死亡。
en: Of the 51 deaths 23 occurring during this period were secondary to being struck in the chest by the ball.

zh: 外力通过胸壁作用于心肌而导致的心脏破裂是棒球中最常见的创伤致死因素 (Abrunzo, 1991)。
en: Commotio cordis, which occurs secondary to forces generated through the chest wall to the myocardium, has been recognized as the most common cause of traumatic death in baseball (Abrunzo, 1991).

zh: 与成年人相比，青少年被球击中时，其相对薄的胸壁就会将更大的能量传递到心肌，导致致命的心律失常或心律不齐发生。
en: When struck with a baseball, the relatively thin, compliant chest wall of a child is thought to transmit greater energy to the myocardium than that of the adult, resulting in fatal dysrhythmias or arrythmia.

zh: 第二类最常见的致死性损伤原因为头部被球击中而继发闭合性颅脑损伤。
en: The next most common category of injury resulting in death involves the head being struck by the ball and consequent closed head injury.

zh: 头胸部被击中最常见于击球和投球时（Rutherford, 1981)。
en: The greatest risk of being struck in the chest or head is incurred while batting or pitching (Rutherford 1981).

zh: 用汤罐或书做些简单的举重运动，可以对肌肉起到刺激作用，进而促进新陈代谢，身体便开始消耗脂肪。
en: Doing simple exercises with soup cans or books will stimulate your muscles in new ways—and will begin the process of kick- starting your metabolism so your body can burn off.

zh: 若是想长寿，今天就幵始锻炼吧。
en: If you want to live longer, start today.

zh: 你的家人，还有你变得年轻的身体，会感谢你的。
en: Your family —and your younger body—will thank you.

zh: 本能的动作，如吮吸动作就可以在未满月婴儿（新生儿）睡眠状态下看到。
en: Spontaneous movement patterns, such as mouthing, can be observed in neonates in a drowsy state.

zh: 这种动作常常是有节奏性的，被称为节奏定型动作。
en: They are often rhythmical, in which case they are called rhythmical stereotypies.

zh: 婴儿在1岁期间表现出大量的节奏定型动作，诸如踢腿、身体波浪运动、身体弯曲、身体摇摆、跳跃等等。
en: During their first year, infants perform a great variety of stereotypies, such as kicking, waving, banging, rocking, bouncing, and so on.

zh: 在不同年龄时出现不同的节奏定型动作，并且在不同年龄时某些节奏定型动作突出。
en: The different stereotypies appear and peak at different ages.

zh: 相较那些缺失的或是隐匿的，新同性恋恐惧症也体现在包括两个女人在内的叙事中。
en: Neo-homophobia was also manifest in narratives in what was included about the two women, compared to what was missing or concealed.

zh: 在波特兰的兴衰过程中，她的故事，包括她的家人和孩子在内是丰满的；在查特曼的故事中，家庭和私人关系几乎不存在。
