en: During the rise and fall of Portland stories including her family and children were ample, while for Chatman family and personal relationships were virtually nonexistent.

zh: 那些被包含的和被排斥的部分允许同时建构和否定异性恋主义及同性恋恐惧症。
en: What was included and excluded permitted the simultaneous construction and denial of heterosexism and homophobia.

zh: 自然界里是没有真空的。
en: Nature abhors a vacuum.

zh: 任何信息的空洞都会被一些人以某种方式填补。
en: Any information void will be filled somehow by someone.

zh: 媒体是有截稿日期的，这驱使它们很快地填补信息空洞 … … 如果危机团队不向媒体提供最初的危机信息，其他的一些可能不了解情况的或是被误导的、被激发积极性的团体就会伤害到这个组织（2007, p. 129)。
en: The media have deadlines, so they are driven to fill the information void quickly.. . .If the crisis team does not supply the initial crisis information to the media, some other groups will, and they may be ill informed, misinformed, or motivated to harm the organization.(2007, p. 129)

zh: 本章探求大众传媒是如何描绘那些坠落的体育英雄的，同时也为同类人提供恢复各自形象的曝光机会。
en: This chapter examines how the mass media portray fallen sports heroes yet also provide the exposure for those same individuals to restore their respective images.

zh: 这一章从定位基本的新闻价值开始。
en: The chapter begins by addressing basic news values.

zh: 接下来，本章回顾了议程设置理论框架（McCombs，2004)、框架及归因(Heider,1958；Iyengar, 1991)以及例证理论( Zillmann,1999),而后梳理了危机传播及形象恢复的研究成果(Allen & Caillouet, 1994；Benoit,1997；Coombs, 2007)。
en: It then reviews theoretical frameworks in agenda setting (McCombs, 2004), framing and attribution (Heider, 1958; Iyengar, 1991), and exemplification (Zillmann, 1999), before covering work in crisis communication and image restoration (Allen & Caillouet, 1994; Benoit, 1997; Coombs, 2007).

zh: 我们处理外界信息，一般是将信息从感觉器官直接送至脑皮层，我们可以在这里处理感知到的信息。
en: We usually process outside information by passing it directly from the sensory organ to the cortex, where we process what we have learned.

zh: 人眼将图像信息送至丘脑，人耳将声音和平衡信息送至顶骨叶。
en: The eyes send images to the occipital lobe; and the ears send sound and balance information to the parietal lobe.

zh: 但是，嗅觉的情况比较特殊。
en: But smell is unique.

zh: 气味通过位于鼻梁顶端的槽状软骨，刺激嗅球神经。
en: An odor passes through the cribiform plate at the top of the nose and stimulates the olfactory nerve.

zh: 这种神经绕过能过滤信息的脑皮质，将信息送至人脑最初始的部分（杏仁核），在这里，情感反应几乎都是由潜意识产生的。
en: This nerve bypasses the cortex, which filters information, and sends the information to the most ancient part of our brain (amygdala), where emotional responses occur almost subconsciously.

zh: 该年龄组女孩大腿最大无氧功率（PP)和平均无氧功率（MP)大约相当于同龄男孩的75%。
en: For these older age groups, leg PP and MP of girls represent about 75% those of boys.

zh: 当以每公斤体重表示时，女孩大腿PP值从11岁开始就已经明显低于男孩。
en: When expressed per kilogram of body mass, leg PP of girls is significantly lower than in boys, already from the age of 11 .

zh: 对于该年龄组而言，女孩大腿PP·kg-1大约是12岁男孩的85%，18岁男孩的70%。
en: For these age groups, leg PP· kg-1 represents about 85% that of boys at age 12 and about 70% at the age of 18 years.

zh: 采用其他测试方（Wirth et al., 1978; Gregor et al., 1979; Berger, 1982; Bar -Or, 1983; Simoneau et al., 1983; Sargent et al., 1984; Verschuur, 1987; Matsudo, 1988; Barabas & Eiben, 1991; Buchard, 1991; Beunen et al., 1992)或者使用其他有关参照测量指标(净体重或大腿肌肉横截面积）（Berger, 1982; Murphy et al., 1984; Verschuur, 1987; Weijiang & Juxiang, 1988; Serresse et al., 1989; Simoneau & Bouchard., 1989; Barabas & Eiben, 1991; Malina & Bouchard, 1991, Beunen et al.，1992)的研究也有相似的性别差异存在。
en: Similar gender-related differences have been reported using other test protocols (Wirth et al., 1978; Gregor et al., 1979; Berger, 1982; Bar-Or, 1983; Simoneau et al., 1983; Sargent et al., 1984; Verschuur, 1987; Matsudo, 1988; Barabas & Eiben, 1991; Bouchard, 1991; Beunen et al., 1992) and/or other relevant reference measures (FFM or thigh cross-sectional area) (Berger, 1982; Murphy et al., 1984; Verschuur, 1987; Weijiang & Ju xiang, 1988; Serresse et al., 1989; Simoneau & Bouchard, 1989; Barabas & Eiben, 1991; Malina & Bouchard, 1991; Beunen et al., 1992).

zh: 胸廓前后径（ anteroposterior chest depth)。
en: Anteroposterior chest depth.

zh: 使用大范围伸展的夹子或者用双臂弯曲度大的人体测量计作为滑动夹子测量胸骨中点水平的胸廓的前后径。
en: Depth of the chest at mesosternale level obtained with spreading caliper or anthropometer with recurved branches used as a sliding caliper.

zh: 在受试者取笔直坐位时，从其右侧进行测量比较容易。
en: This measure is easiest to obtain from the right side of a subject seated in an erect posture.

zh: 采用夹子向下跨过右肩，用右手中指放在胸骨中点略下方，像握铅笔一样将夹子臂的顶点对准部位。
en: Apply the caliper over the right shoulder in a downward direction.Anchor slightly below the mesosternale with the third digit of your right hand and manipulate the tip of the branch to the site as if you were grasping a pencil.

zh: 称它们为天生的杀手细胞也十分恰当。
en: Some directly destroy the intruders and are aptly named natural killer cells.

zh: 当你还是个孩子的时候，你的胸腺位于心脏的前面，大小与心尺寸相当。
en: When you were a child, your thymus, which is located in front of your heart, was actually the size of your heart.

zh: （事实上，胸腺的尺寸很大，医生们在给儿童做心脏外科手术时，他们必须得艰难地透过胸腺才能找到心脏。）
en: (In fact, it was so big that when doctors do heart surgery on children, they have to fight through the thymus just to find the heart.)

zh: 回到叙事理论，关于《开放》很有趣的一点是，阿加西明确地承认了这本书代表他人生故事的一个“版本”。
en: To return to narrative theory, one of the interesting aspects of Open is Agassi's explicit acknowledgment that the book represents a version of his life story.

zh: 人类发展学学者提倡“老化的诗学”, “当我们解读自己的生活时，强调我们行动中的创造性主体” 。
en: Human development scholars advocate for a "poetics of aging" that "emphasizes the creative agency in what we do as we interpret our lives".

zh: 从这个角度来看，每个生活都能被视为一个文本或是小说，“ 在这之中，自己同时是作者、叙述者、主角和读者”。
en: From this perspective, every life can be seen as a text or a novel, "of which one is simultaneously author, narrative, character, and reader".

zh: 膝盖锁定、不使用惯性做直举腿相当难，500个认真的训练者里可能就有一个人能完成——没准更少。
en: Straight leg raises, performed with locked knees and without momentum are an incredibly hard exercise—only perhaps one in five hundred serious trainees (maybe less) can execute them.

zh: 该动作如此困难的原因之一是动作幅度大（身体从完全伸展到完全直角的姿势）。
en: One of the things that makes them so hard is the full range of motion—from the body straight all the way up to the jackknife right angle position.

zh: 训练者一旦获得在最高点将腿伸直（即悬垂蛙举腿的结果）所需的力量和柔韧性，就可以练习悬垂半举腿。该动作使上半幅度的动作更难一些，并去除了下半幅度的动作。
en: Once the athlete has developed the strength and flexibility required to perform the legs extended top position (as a result of hanging frog raises), hanging partial straight leg raises capitalize on this, by making the top position a little harder, and eliminating the rest.

zh: 悬垂屈举腿是悬垂屈膝的延伸，难度更大。
en: Hanging bent leg raises are a harder extension of hanging knee raises.

zh: 悬垂屈膝时膝盖要弯曲成90°，而悬垂屈举腿时膝盖则要成45°。
en: In hanging knee raises, the knees are bent at ninety degrees, in hanging bent leg raises they are at forty-five.

zh: 增长的力臂使得悬垂屈举腿成为到目前为止最难的中段练习。
en: The increased leverage this provides makes the exercise the hardest in the series yet, and it develops the midsection accordingly.

zh: 你的腹肌、腰部肌肉、前锯肌、髋部屈肌都会变得更强壮。
en: The abdomen, waist, serratus and hip flexors all get stronger.

zh: 从悬垂屈膝开始，训练者将开始举腿系列中更难的悬垂动作。
en: With the hanging knee raise, the athlete begins the harder hanging movements of the midsection series.

zh: 在地板上练习时，训练者只需部分地克服重力，而现在必须完全克服重力。
en: While on the floor, the athlete was only partially fighting the forces of gravity; now he has to overcome gravity fully.

zh: 这种变化会在短时间内急剧增强髋部与身体中段的力量。
en: The increased intensity amplifies hip and midsection strength radically, in a short space of time.

zh: 此外，在横杆上悬垂，也增加了胸腔肌肉（如前锯肌与肋间肌，它们在手臂和腹部之间起连接作用）的活动性。
en: In addition the bar hang element increases the activity of the important ribcage muscles (the serratus and intercostals) which function as intermediaries between the arms and abdomen.

zh: 因此，在横杆上进行悬垂举腿练习比在双杠或类似设备上练习效果更好。
en: For this reason hanging ab work is vastly superior to ab work on parallel bars or similar devices.

zh: 若根据上述规定严格练习，那么悬垂直举腿将是世界上最伟大的中段练习动作，卷腹、器械练习和负重仰卧起坐都相形见绌。
en: Hanging straight leg raises—performed strictly, according to the protocols given above—are the greatest all-round midsection exercise in existence.They blow crunches, machine work, and weighted sit-ups out of the water.

zh: 如果你能完美无缺地做上20次悬垂直举腿，那你的腰部将无比强大和灵活，腹外斜肌、前锯肌、腹横肌和肋间肌将犹如岩石般坚硬突出，腹肌也会像钢板般结实。
en: By the time you can execute even twenty perfect reps of this exercise, your waist will be powerful and flexible, your obliques, serratus, transversus and intercostals will be carved out of solid rock and your abdominal muscles will be like plate steel.

zh: 你将拥有魔鬼六块！
en: You will have a six-pack from hell!

zh: 你的大脑实际上是同时患有几种认知疾病的集合，如神经细胞丧失或纠结，还有血管问题，这都会造成记忆功能的丧失。
en: Your brain is really a pot of several cognitive ailments at once —— some neuron loss, some neuron tangling, some vascular problems——that all contribute to losing some ability to recall information.

zh: 随着年龄增大，我们所有人的身体实际上都会或多或少地出现这些问题。
en: In fact, almost all of us have some of these characteristics as we age.

zh: 不论医师的正规沴断如何，我们都需要注意以下几点。
en: Whatever the official diagnosis, there are several points to remember.

zh: 你的肾脏还在调节血压方面起着关键的作用，并且这种作用有踪迹可寻，因为它们处于理想的位置来测量流入肾脏的血压。
en: Your kidneys also play a very traceable and key role in regulating blood pressure because they are ideally positioned to measure the pressure of blood pushing into them.

zh: 如果压力差很低，就像我的祖先在被剑齿虎咬伤后，肾脏就会维持体液以保持身体的血压；但是当它们过分行动或是开小差时，就需要一种高血压，肾脏就会很快做出调整。
en: If the pressure head is low, like after our ancestors were bitten by a saber-tiger, they hold on to fluid to maintain our blood pressure.But when they overreact or are misled into thinking we need a higher blood pressure, the kidneys can readjust quickly.

zh: 肾脏这种器官是你的血管系统的终极调节器。
en: These organs are the ultimate fine tuners of your vascular system.

zh: 血管性昏厥(vascular syncope)也是已知的血管失张力性昏厥和站立性昏厥。
en: Vascular syncope is also known as vaso­depressor syncope or orthostatic syncope.

zh: 该昏厥的机制是站立时从身体下部回流到左心室的血液突然减少引起的。
en: The mechanism for this reaction begins with reduced left ventricular filling secondary to pooling of blood in the lower parts of the body during standing.

zh: 左心室容量下降的结果是位于左心室的特殊感受器受到刺激，引起反射性心率减缓和血管扩张（特别是大脑血管的扩张）。
en: This reduction in left ventricular volume results in the stimulation of the special receptors that are located in the left ventricle that cause a reflex slowing of the heart rate and vasodilation of the blood vessels (especially in the brain).

zh: 高血压、高血糖、吸烟等因素都有可能令动脉血管的光滑内壁出现破裂口。
en: High blood pressure, high blood sugar, the effects of cigarettes, and other factors can nick the smooth inner layer of your arteries.

zh: 为修复这种破裂口，人体会用胆固醇作为填充物。
en: Your body tries to repair that nick using cholesterol as a plaster.

zh: 但是，如果携带胆固醇的蛋白质是“有害”蛋内质（低密度脂蛋白，LDL)，就会引起发炎，即向白细胞发出信号，要它们迅速保护该部位，结果形成的血小板会促进血栓生成。
en: But if the proteins carrying the cholesterol are bad (LDL), an inflammatory reaction is triggered that signals for white cells to invade the area.The resulting plaque becomes irritated and ruptures, which encourages a blood dot to form.

zh: 这种血栓会突发性地堵住整条动脉，导致心脏病、中风、性功能障碍和失忆。
en: That clot can suddenly block the entire artery—and lead to heart attack, stroke, impotence, and memory loss.

zh: 如前所述，将反式饱和脂肪（一种诱发衰老的人工脂肪）和饱和脂肪的摄入限制在20克以下。
en: As mentioned above, limit your saturated and trans fats (a mostly artificial form of aging fat) to less than 20 grams a day.

zh: 与其他食物构成要素相比，这类脂肪与动脉老化的关系更大，它们多含于肉类、全脂乳制品、烘烤食品、油炸快餐食品、棕榈油和椰油。
en: No food element has been more closely linked to arterial aging than these kinds of fats, found mostly in meats, luncheon meats, full-fat dairy products, baked goods, fried fast foods, and palm and coconut oils.

zh: 它们会增加动脉发炎的可能，促使血小板淤积，还会后动提高血液中LDL含量的机制一一这种情况也会让血小板涌入动脉。
en: They increase arterial inflammation, which promotes plaque buildup, and they also turn on the mechanism that increases LDL cholesterol in the bloodstream, yet another way to slap more plaque onto your arteries.

zh: 这个方案 的周跑量并没有达到160千米，塞巴斯蒂安的周跑量仅仅为80千米。
en: There were no 100-mile training weeks; rather, Seb’s training rarely exceeded 50 miles per week.

zh: 这一方案重点针对速度耐力训练—— 快速跑和快速间歇训练。
en: It focused on speed-endurance training—fast runs and fast interval training.

zh: 还包括了健身房中的循环训练，内容有立卧撑跳、肌肉增强训练和负重训练。
en: It also included circuit training in the gym, including burpees, plyometrics, and weight training.

zh: 使用利迪亚训练计划的跑者至少要花费8周的时间——通常是比这更多的时间——来建立自己的有氧代谢基地。
en: Lydiard’s runners spent at least 8 weeks—often more—building an aerobic base.

zh: 建立这一基地的关键手段是进行标准跑步训练。
en: The essential tool for building this base was the standardtraining run.

zh: 虽然很多训练计划简称这种训练为长距离慢跑，但利迪亚德指出这并不是简单的慢跑训练，而是快节奏力量跑步训练。
en: Although many training plans refer to this workout by the acronym “LSD” (for long, slow distance), Lydiard did not intend these to be easy jogs; he intended them to be up-tempo strength runs.

zh: 无论你是一名800米跑步者或者长距离跑运动员，在这个8周训练计划中，你的周跑量至少要达到160千米，期间每周进行一次32千米或以上的长距离慢跑训练。
en: But whether you were an 800-meter runner or a long-distance athlete, you ran at least 100 miles per week during this 8-week period, punctuated by a weekly long run of 20 miles or more.

zh: 可惜，现代人根本不理解这些，刚开始练，他们就想挑战极限。
en: Unfortunately, modern athletes don’t understand this approach at all.When people start training, they normally throw themselves in at the deep end.

zh: 这部分地是当今文化的问题：我们生活在“现在就要”的社会里，今天的孩子并不把耐心当作美德——大人也一样。
en: This is partly for cultural reasons.We live in “want it now” society; kids today don’t see patience as a virtue.Nor do adults.

zh: 类固醇是现代人想要迅速见到效果的另一个例证。
en: Steroids are another reason why modern people expect to see results tomorrow.

zh: 类固醇的确带来了“速效”（哪怕是暂时的、不健康的），而逐渐培养训练势头的古老技艺几近失传。
en: Steroids bring such fast—albeit temporary and unhealthy—results, that the older art of gradually building training momentum has largely been lost or forgotten.

zh: 为什么要如此缓慢、保守呢？
en: There is a damn good reason why you should proceed slowly and methodically through any training program.

zh: 这有个极好的理由，就是“训练势头”。
en: The reason has to do with generating training momentum.

zh: 简单地说，这意味着如果你在训练中更慢地向前推进，你实际上会比急于求成者更快达到目标。
en: Basically put, this means that if you build a head of steam by moving forwards more slowly, you’ll actually reach your goals much faster than if you proceeded with haste.

zh: 听着像悖论，但这就是事实。
en: This sounds like a paradox, but it’s true.

zh: 每天都应使用牙线，它能消除牙齿缝隙间500种以上的细菌滋生，有助于减少与牙龈问题有关的炎症发生。
en: FLOSS Do it every day.It breaks up the more than five hundred kinds of bacteria that live in plaque between your teeth and helps reduce the inflammation associated with gum disease.

zh: （请注意，隔了较长时间后再次使用牙线，牙龈流血是正常现象，但如果一周后每次剔牙后仍然流血，就很可能说明患有某种程度的牙龈炎。）
en: (One note: It's normal to bleed when you floss after a long layoff, but if you still bleed following each floss after a week, it's probably a sign you have some level of gingivitis.)

zh: 牙龈疾病与许多健康问题相关，引起牙周疾病的病菌同样也会引发人体免疫系统的反应，造成动脉血管发炎硬化。
en: Gum disease (gingivitis) has been linked to many other health problems, presumably because the same bacteria that cause periodontal disease can also trigger an immune response that causes inflammation and hardening of the arteries.

zh: 牙齿上的病菌、唾液以及在口腔里待了三天的花椰菜残渣都有可能导致牙齿病。
en: That same plaque that causes tooth decay that sticky coating of bacteria, saliva, and three-day-old cauliflower—can also contribute to the plaque in your arteries.

zh: 细菌也会让动脉感染,还可能带来各种心血管问题，从心脏病到勃起功能障碍。
en: And that has a profound effect on all kinds of vascular problems, from heart attacks to erectile dysfunction.

zh: 一个好的研究整合会导出几个确切的结论，且应该会激发对未来研究方向的兴趣。
en: A good research synthesis results in several tangible conclusions and should spark interest in future directions for research.

zh: 有时候，一个研究整合会引导出一个理论的修正或形成。
en: Sometimes, a research synthesis leads to a revision to or the proposal of a theory.

zh: 重点是，研究整合并不只是个相关文献的摘要，而是个逻辑形式的研究且能引导出有效的结论、假设的评估，以及理论的修正与提出。
en: The point is that a research synthesis is not simply a summary of the related literature; it is a logical type of research that leads to valid conclusions, hypothesis evaluations, and the revision and proposal of theory.

zh: 从健康长寿的观点看，性对人类生活无比重要。因此我们不应该羞于谈论情欲亢进、射精和性无能这些事情。
en: Since sex is such an important part of our lives from a health and longevity standpoint, we shouldn't be embarrassed to talk about things like orgasm, ejaculation, and impotence.

zh: 曰前，我们有了一些进步。
en: Recently, we have made some strides.

zh: 例如，几位伟哥形象代言人说他们不是为了钱才代言，而是得有人敢于讨论勃起功能障碍的问题。
en: For example，several spokesmen for Viagra said that they did it not for the money but because somebody had to come forward to talk about the problem of erectile dysfunction.

zh: 关注一下氧化过程是如何发生也是十分重要的。
en: It's also important to note how the oxidation process occurs.

zh: 在许多方面，氧化是你体内一种良性的、自然发生的过程。你的身体需要氧化使你的免疫系统工作起来，共让你的身体能保护自身。
en: In many ways, ox-idation is a good, naturally occurring process in your body* Your body needs oxidation for your immune system to work, for your body to protect itself.

zh: 参与者样本可能是从较大的群体或母群体中随机选择出来的。
en: The sample of participants might be randomly selected from some larger group, or a population.

zh: 举例来说，如果你所在的学院或大学有10000位学生，你可以随机地选取200位来进行研究。
en: For example, if your college or university has 10,000 students, you could randomly select 200 for a study.

zh: 你指派给这10000位学生每个人一个数字编号，第一个数字编号是0000，第二位是0001、第三位是0002，直到最后一位（第10000位）的编号是9999。接着使用随机表来选择样本。
en: You would assign each of the 10,000 students a numeric ID.The first numeric ID would be 0000, the second 0001, the third 0002, up through the last (the 10,000th), who would be 9999.Then a random numbers table would be used to select the sample.

zh: 有许多研究者认为金丝桃（又名“贯叶连翘”）能够治疗抑郁症，但是它会对其他药物产生影响，比如，它加速了避孕药物中相关成分的代谢。
en: While many studies have focused on St. John's wort as an antidepressant, it has interactions with many other medications.

zh: 同时服用麦芽计和避孕药的人，有25%会遇到避孕药失效的情况。SAMe治疗轻度抑郁，与麦芽计一样有效，而且还不会干优其他药物。
en: For example, it increases the metabolism of substances in birth control pills, essentially making them useless for 25 percent of the people who take both birth control pills and St. John's wort, SAMe is just as effective for mild depression, without the interactions with other medications.

zh: 有许多食物像菠菜、番茄和橙汁都含有叶酸，还有许多食品像面包和谷类食品都补充有叶酸。
en: Lots of foods—like spinach, tomatoes, and orange juice—contain folate, and many foods—like bread and cereal—are supplemented with it.

zh: 但是从食物中吸收叶酸不如从补充剂中吸收的好。
en: But folate from food is absorbed less well than folic acid from supplements.

zh: 如果你想想，一杯225克的橙汁只有43微克叶酸，那么就得喝大约25杯橙汁才能获取推荐量的叶酸。
en: When you consider that an eight-ounce glass of orange juice has only 43 micrograms of folate, that would mean you'd have to drink about twenty-five eight-ounce glasses of OJ a day to get the recommended amount.

zh: 但好处何在？除了在地铁上惹人注目外，深呼吸会带给我们什么益处呢？
en: What will deep breathing get you, besides stares on the subway?

zh: 事实上益处 有很多。
en: A lot, actually.

zh: 首先，它有利于将一氧化氮输送到肺部。一氧化氮存留在鼻腔，是一种非常重要的肺部和血管扩张剂，因此它保证了肺和血管更好地运作。
en: For one, it helps transport nitric oxide—a very potent lung and blood vessel dilator that resides in your nasal passages—to your lungs.So it makes your lungs and blood vessels function better.

zh: 胰腺，肝脏的后邻居，主要是因为它在生产胰岛素中的作用而受到关注。
en: The pancreas, the liver's backyard neighbor, gets attention primarily for its role in producing insulin.

zh: 但事实并非如此。
en: But thats not all it does.

zh: 看起来像一条带鱼头的牛排，胰腺大约有六英寸长。
en: Looking like a strip steak with a fish head, the pancreas is about six inches long.

zh: 就女性而言，最重要的内部结构是子宮颈——向下开口，与阴道相通的子宫的颈部。
en: On the female side, one of the most important internal structures to think about is the cervix——the neck of the uterus that opens downward to the vagina.

zh: 宫颈在怀孕中发挥着重要作用。人体伸长宮颈让胚胎留在子宮里，然后宫颈缩短扩张，便于分娩生产。
en: The cervix plays an important role in pregnancy; it lenghtens to hold the fetus in the uterus and then shortens and dilates to allow labor and delivery.

zh: 人类一直喜欢把引体向上当作强壮的特征，这不是什么新鲜事。
en: Human beings have always been attracted to pullups as a feat of strength.It’s nothing new.

zh: 其实，引体向上是现存最古老的肌肉练习动作。
en: In fact, the pullup is the oldest muscle-building exercise in existence.

zh: 我们很容易就能找到前人练习引体向上的证据。有几位古典作家曾描述过这个动作，它在战士、运动员以及想获得上好体力的平民中很流行。
en: Evidence of pullups in ancient history are easy to find; several classical writers described the technique, which was popular with warriors, athletes, and even civilians who wanted to retain excellent levels of strength.

zh: 尽管如此，我们也无法确定引体向上的起源，因为从某种意义上说，引体向上可能比我们人类出现的时间还要早。
en: Despite this, it’s impossible to date the origin of the exercise, because in a sense it undoubtedly predates the human species.

zh: 印度深蹲有缺点也有优点。
en: There are good and bad pints about Hindu squats.

zh: 缺点是，它不能取代普通深蹲系列，因为它只能通过增加次数来增加难度，这样做可以增强耐力，但不能增强力量。
en: On the down side, Hindu squats are no replacement for the regular squat series, because the only way you can make them progressive is by adding reps. This develops stamina, but not strength.

zh: 此外，动作过程中的惯性也可能导致健身者膝盖发炎。
en: In addition, the momentum used during the natural rhythm may irritate the knees of some athletes.

zh: 优点是，它的节奏感和高次数很适合想增强下半身的耐力但又找不到地方跑步的人。
en: On the plus side, the rhythmic nature of Hindu squats make them an excellent choice for a high rep alternative to running for those who wish to develop lower body endurance but with little floor space.

zh: 另外，印度深蹲对心肺能力也大有裨益。
en: They also provide great cardio benefits.

zh: 如果你准备练习印度深蹲，那么就要将其逐渐纳入你的训练计划，给膝关节时间来适应这项练习。
en: If you chose to use them, work them into your program gradually, to allow your knee tendons to get used to the exercise.

zh: 复杂技能的起源时间可以追溯到儿童 早期基本技能出现之时，如握、走、抓、投，等等。
en: The origin of complex skills can be traced back to early childhood as fundamental skills develop, such as grasping, walking, catching, throwing, and so on.

zh: 本章主要介绍出生时的运动技能和婴儿期运动技能的发展，然后分析儿童期运动技能是如何随着实践和训练而发展的。
en: This chapter briefly describes the state of the motor repertoire at birth and its development during infancy, then analyses how skills develop with practiceor training during childhood.

zh: 最后，简要回顾解释技能获取过程的不同理论观点。
en: Finally, a brief review is given of the different theoretical points of view accounting for processes underlying skill acquisition.

zh: 运动员，特别是优秀运动员仅仅是普通人群中的一小部分。
en: Athletes, and especially elite athletes, represent a very small percentage of the general population.

zh: 他们在相当小的年龄，通常已经表现出明显的形态学方面和运动能力方面的某些特征。
en: Quite often they show , already at a rather young age, distinct morphological and performance characteristics.

zh: 因而，应先对普通人群在成熟期运动能力的变化加以考察，而后再讨论与运动员的相关变化。
en: It is thus reasonable to review maturity-associated variation inperformance in the general population and then to discuss the associations in athletes.

zh: 在10个月 后，他们不仅已经能够完成需要两个步骤的动作而且能够完成需要更困难的双手协调的有目的的手段行为。
en: After 10 months of age, they can succeed at means—ends behaviour requiring not only successive two-step actions, but more difficult spatiotem poral coordination between the two hands.

zh: 例如，他们一边拿着盒盖一边取出盒内的玩具（Bruner et al., 1969; Ramsay & Weber, 1986; Fagard, 1994)，可以将物体拿住并找准方 向从中取出东西（Flament, 1975; Fagard & Jacquet, 1989;见 Fagard, 1994 的综述）。
en: For instance they can hold the lid of a box open while reaching inside for a toy (Bruneret al., 1969; R am say & Weber, 1986; Fagard, 1994), hold and orient an object to pick up something from inside (Flam ent, 1975; Fagard & Jacquet, 1989; see Fagard, 1994 for a review ).

zh: 由于他们在童年时学到很多技能，这类双手互补的协调能力成为多数技能的 基础，逐渐形成儿童的全部技能。
en: This kind of complementary bimanual coordination forms the basis of most skills which will gradually form the repertoire of the child, as he or she learns many new skills during childhood.

zh: 如果在没有训练的受试者中测试功率峰值，我们建议采用困难较低的力-速度试验。
en: If the aim is to measure peak power in untrained subjects, we recommended the less stressful force-velocity test.

zh: 此外，由于测试时间短，力-速度试验可以取得较高的功率峰值。
en: Moreover, the force-velocity test yields higher peak power output because of the shortness of the test.

zh: 温盖特试验反映腿（臂）肌肉耐力更为精确，可以用于疲劳的研究。
en: The Wingate test reflects leg (or arm) muscle endurance more accurately and is relevant for fatigue studies.

zh: 需要对儿童力-速度试验的有效性和可靠性进一步开展研究
en: In children, the force-velocity test needs further validity and reliability studies.

zh: 布莱恩•麦肯齐早就摆脱了跑者对饮食需求的老套观念。
en: Brian MacKenzie long ago shed the stereotypical runner’s view of food.

zh: 在一次早期的采访中，我们在他位于加州科斯塔梅萨的家中和他见面。
en: For an early interview with him, we met at his house in Costa Mesa, California.

zh: 他的厨房有一种实验室的气氛，冰箱里储存的是草饲牛肉和金属罐装的鱼油。
en: The kitchen had a laboratory vibe to it.He had a freezer stocked with grass-fed beef and metallic bottles of fish oil.

zh: 当效标是较晚发生的行为时，例如以入学测验来预测就学后的表现，那么预测效度(predictive validity) 才是应该重视的效度。
en: When the criterion is some later behavior, such as entrance examinations used to predict later success, predictive validity is the major concern.

zh: 假设有一个体育课老师想发展一份在初级体操课的测验，用来预测学生在进阶体操课的表现。
en: Suppose a physical education instructor wished to develop a test that could be given in beginning gymnastics classes to predict success in advanced classes.

zh: 学生在初级课程时接受这份测验，然后在进阶课程结束时计算此测验结果与进阶课程表现(成绩或是评等之类的分数)的相关。
en: Students would take this test while they were in the beginner course.At the end of the advanced course, those test results would be correlated with the criterion of success (grades, ratings, and so on).

zh: 如果想预测某个特定的行为，研究者必须确认此行为是否具有一个已知的基准率。
en: In trying to predict a certain behavior, a researcher should try to ascertain whether there is a known base rate for that behavior.

zh: 在月经初潮时，乳房的发育十分明显。
en: At menarche there is a considerable range of breast development.

zh: 大多数女孩的乳房处于发育阶段IV (乳头和乳晕高出整个乳房，表21.2)。
en: Most girls are in breast stage IV (projection of the nipple and areola above the level of the rest of the breast, see Table 2 1.2 ).

zh: 但是，约25%的女孩的乳房处于发育的阶段III，少部分处于阶段II。同样，在月经初或IV，但有些处于阶段V，极少数刚刚出现阴毛（阶段I)。
en: However, some 25% are in breast stage III, with a small percentage in stage II.Similarly, most girls at menarche are in pubic hair stages III or IV, but some are in stage V, and a very few have yet to have pubarche (stage I).

zh: 支配昼夜节律的时钟并没有特别注意运动员的比赛。
en: The clocks that dictate circadian rhythms have no particular regard for athletic competition.

zh: 但是它们确实改变了可影响运动表现的生理功能。
en: But they do govern phasic changes in physiological functions that have important bearing on motor performance.

zh: 肌肉力量、体温调节机制、心输出量，甚至是动机都自然地、可预测地在一天中发生改变。
en: Muscle strength, thermoregulatory mechanisms, cardiac output, even motivation all naturally and predictably change throughout the course of a day.

zh: 因此，一天中运动员训练或者比赛的时间点极其重要。
en: So, the time of day when athletes train or compete may be critically important.

zh: 青年运动员的训练安排主要将重点放在提高具体运动项目的运动技能上，如投掷、跳跃、踢球。
en: Youth athletic programs place a major emphasis on improving motor skills that are more specific to sports, such as throwing, jumping, and ball kicking.

zh: 但是，令人吃惊的是，儿童运动能力可塑性的研究数量非常有限。
en: Given this focus, it is rather surprising that a very limited amount of research exists on the trainability of such abilities in children.

zh: 同样，专项的训练技术是否会比其他更有效也缺乏数据支持。
en: Equally lacking are data to indicate whether particular instructional techniques are more effective than others.

zh: 此外，我们对环境的制约、同伴的影响以及家长的塑造等变量的影响知之甚少。
en: And we know little about the influence of variables such as environmental constraints, peer influence, and parent modeling.

zh: 但是，从有限的已经完成的调查中我们发现，似乎为获得早期运动技能而安排的指导和练习，对于提髙儿童早期（3〜7岁）的运动表现是有益的。
en: But from the few investigations that have been done, it does seem that instruction and practice on early acquisition of motor skills is beneficial in improving motor performances in early childhood years (ages 3 to 7).

zh: 但是，最后的发育成熟和超凡的运动能力并不依赖儿童多快进人青春期，在任何情况下，食品补剂都不能促进这个过程 (Smith & Worthington-Roberts, 1989) 。
en: However, eventual maturity and athletic prowess does not necessarily depend upon how early a child reaches adolescence, and in any event, the process will not be facilitated by dietary supplements (Smith & Worthington- Roberts, 1989).

zh: “好的东西，多多益善”的格言并不适用于食品补剂。

en: The adage of 'if some is good then more must be better' does not apply to supplements.

zh: 恰恰相反，如果摄取过多，某些维生素和矿物质还可能成为有毒物质。
en: On the contrary, if taken in large doses, certain vitamins and minerals can be toxic.

zh: 用日历年龄作为评价个体发育状态的指标有一定的局限性。
en: Chronological age (CA) has limited utility as an indicator of individual maturity status.

zh: 在同一日历年龄的个体中，特别是处于青春期间的个体，身体特征存在着很大的变异。
en: There is considerable variability in physical characteristics among individuals of the same CA, especially during the pubertal years.

zh: 生长过程和生物学上的成熟过 程是相互关联的，二者均会影响到身体的运动能力。
en: The processes of growth and biological matu­ ration are related, and both influence physical performance.

zh: 运动员，特别是优秀运动员仅仅是普通人群中的一小部分。
en: Athletes, and especially élite athletes, represent a very small percentage of the general population.

zh: 他们在相当小的年龄，通常已经表现出明显的形态学方面和运动能力方面的某些特征。
en: Quite often they show, already at a rather young age, distinct morphological and performance characteristics.

zh: 因而，应先对普通人群在成熟期运动能力的变化加以考察，而后再讨论与运动员的相关变化。
en: It is thus reasonable to review maturity-associated variation in performance in the general population and then to discuss the associations in athletes.

zh: 在所有的引体向上动作中，短板都是手臂上的屈肌，即肱二头肌与相关的前臂肌肉。
en: The weakest link in all pullup movements are the arm flexors—the biceps and related upper arm/forearm muscles.

zh: 如果训练者已经掌握了双臂引体向上，想升级到单臂引体向上，那就得花时间极大地强化肱二头肌——这就是窄距引体向上的用意所在。
en: If an athlete has mastered two-arm pullups and wishes to progress to the single arm version, he will have to spend time radically strengthening his biceps.

zh: 两手紧挨在一起时，更大、更强的背部肌肉不容易发力，这样就迫使手臂上的屈肌承担更大的负荷，从而让它们（尤其是肱二头肌）变得更大、更有力。
en: This is what close pullups do—bringing the hands nearer together puts the bigger, stronger back muscles at a disadvantage and forces more of the load on the arm flexors.Close pullups will force your biceps to grow larger and more powerful.

zh: 骨的生长是在内分泌系统的控制下按照遗传程序发生的整个骨架的变大过程。
en: Growth is the expression of the genetically programmed process of enlargement of the entireskeleton under the control of the endocrinesystem.

zh: 生长时，不会发生有选择性的某些骨骼的增大或某一个骨骼的特殊区域的增粗。
en: There is no selective enlargement ofindividual bones or specific regions within asingle bone.

zh: 生长涉及到了整个的骨架，随着长骨骨骺的愈合纵向的生长就终止了。
en: Growth involves the entire skeleton and longitudinal growth ceases with the closure of the epiphyses of the long bones.

zh: 因为在体育环境中倾向于过分强调一般参照标准，所以我们极力推荐根据掌握经验来定义每个儿童的最佳挑战。最佳挑战是指有 一定困难但经过努力可以达到的目标，这些目标是依据个人最近的技能水平制定的，并可以不断改进。
en: Because norm-referenced sources tend to be overemphasized in the sport environment, it is strongly recommended that mastery experiences be defined as optimal challenges for each child, which are difficult, but attainable, goals that are customized to the individual's current skill capabilities and opportunities for improvement.

zh: 用这种方法，可以激发儿童去取得个人化的成就，达到个人的成功标准。
en: In this way, children are motivated to achieve individualized and realistic personal standards of success.

zh: 东方医学把针灸的疗效归功于对气流的导引，而西医也在寻找针灸有效的原因。
en: While Eastern medicine attributes the success to the redirection of energy flow, Western medicine is also looking for reasons why acupuncture might be effective.

zh: 下面一些理论也许可以解释：针灸可以刺激身体，释放影响神经系统的化学物质内啡肽，而内啡肽能起到缓解疼痛作用。甚至还有研究总结出这样的结论：针灸能促进血液循环，有利于康复进展。
en: Some possible theories: Acupuncture releases neurochemicals—endorphins—that relieve pain, and researchers have even theorized that it increases circulation to help the healing process.

zh: 对人施测取得的测验分数称为观察分数。
en: A test score obtained by a person is the observed score.

zh: 此分数不确定是否为此人能力或表现的真实评价。
en: It is not known whether this is a true assessment of this person’s ability or performance.

zh: 测量误差可能会因测验指示、测量工具、评分、或是受测者情绪或生理状态而发生。
en: Measurement error may occur because of the test directions, the instrumentation, the scoring, or the person’s emotional or physical state.

zh: 因此，观察分数理论上是由受测者的真实分数以及误差分数组成。
en: Thus, an observed score theoretically consists of the person’s true score and error score.

zh: 以分数的变异量来表示时，观察分数的变异数等于真实分数的变异量加上误差分数的变异量。
en: Expressed in terms of score variance, the observed score variance consists of true score variance plus error variance.

zh: 本节讨论的设计称为真实验设计（true experimentaldesigns)，因为组别是随机形成的，接受研究起始时是相等的假设。
en: The designs discussed in this section are called true experimental designs because the groups are randomly formed, allowing the assumption that they were equivalent at the beginning of the research.

zh: 如此一来，控制了过去（不是现在）的历史、成熟（各组发生的情形均等)、测验，以及所有基于组间不等而来的无效度来源（统计回归、选择偏误及选择与成熟的交互作用）。
en: This controls for past (but not present) history, maturation (which should occur equally in the groups), testing, and all sources of invalidity that are based on nonequivalence of groups (statistical regression, selection biases, and selection-maturation interaction).

zh: 但只有实验者能确定没有在一组（除了实验处理之外）和另一组（目前资料）发生任何事情，依变项分数不会因为仪器问题而变动分数，组别之间也没有研究对象流失的差异（实验流失率）。
en: But only the experimenter can make sure that nothing happens to one group (besides the treatment) and not the other (present history), that scores on the dependent measure do not vary as a result of instrumentation problems, and that the loss of participants is not different between the groups (experimental mortality).

zh: CPG脊髓部分的发射频率，是由更高级的大脑中枢决定的（正如当你害怕时，交感神经系统会加快心脏窦房结的自动发射频率）。
en: In the portion of the CPG in the spinal cord, the rate of firing is dictated by higher brain centers (much as the sympathetic nervous system speeds up the spontaneously firing of the sinus node of the heart when you’re frightened).

zh: 究竟是什么决定了这些振荡器神经元的最大发射速度，我们不得而知。但可以确定的是，在电解质移动穿过细胞膜的速率（内在控制）以及影响振荡器发射频率的大脑控制器指令（外在控制）方面，均存在一个物理化学意义上的上限。
en: What determines the maximal firing speed of these pacemaker neurons is not known, but obviously there must exist upper physical-chemical limits to rates of electrolyte movement across membranes (intrinsic control) and the commands of brain governors that influence pacemaker firing rate (extrinsic control).

zh: 感觉运动系统的信息处理过程和集成过程中的变化在技能获取的各个阶段是特别有关系的。
en: Change in information processing and integration of the sensorimotor system are particularly relevant during stages of skill acquisition.

zh: 技能的熟练程度的识别标志就是参与动作的身体各部分之间以及各动作成分之间在时空上的顺畅平滑程度。
en: The signature of skillfulness is the smoothness in the spatiotemporal relationship between segments involved as well as between component actions.

zh: 在技能获取的后期，虽然对意外环境变化 的反应是很快的，但是少量的外周反馈对于动作还是必需的。
en: At a late stage of acquisition, little peripheral feedback is necessary for action, although unexpected changes in environment are quickly responded to.

zh: 测量两个变项之间关联程度的一种方法是皮尔森积差相关系数(Pearson product moment coefficient of correlation)(也称为 Pearson r,组间相关，或是简单相关)。
en: One measure of the degree of association between two variables is called the Pearson product moment coefficient of correlation (also known as Pearson r, interclass correlation, or simple correlation).

zh: 当两个变项之间没有关联存在时，它们的相关趋近于零。
en: When two variables are unrelated, their correlation is approximately zero.

zh: 在图6.1中,两个变项(身高和立定跳远成绩)具有中等程度的正相关(r值大约介于40到60之间)。
en: In figure 6.1 the two variables (height and standing-long-jump scores) have a moderately positive correlation (r is probably between 40 and 60).

zh: 支撑深蹲是半深蹲之前的最后一式。
en: Supported squats are the last exercise before the athlete progresses onto half squats.

zh: 它是折刀深蹲（双腿承受大部分身体重量）与半深蹲（双腿承受全部身体重量）之间理想的过渡动作。
en: This exercise forms an ideal link between the jackknife squat (where the legs move the majority of the body’s weight) and the half squat (where the legs move virtually all the weight of the body).

zh: 支撑深蹲能够进一步加强下肢的柔韧性和力量，锻炼膝盖的肌腿、韧带及软组织。
en: Supported squats continue adding flexibility and strength to the athlete’s lower limbs.They condition the tendons, ligaments and soft tissues of the knees.

zh: 它能让你的深蹲动作更标准，锻炼你仅仅使用肌肉力量而非惯性从最低点推起身体的能力。
en: They are a good way to continue perfecting form, most importantly the ability to push up from the bottom position using strength alone rather than momentum.

zh: 但是，近来汉德贝里等（Handberg et al.，1992)的研究表明，骨骼肌的GLUT4总量，在健康人接近生理胰岛素浓度水平时，不是一个好的指标。
en: However, recently, Handberg et al. (1992) showed that the total content of skeletal muscle GLUT 4 is a poor predictor for in vivo response to near physiological insulin concentrations in healthy human subjects.

zh: 此外，在1型糖尿病骨骼肌GLUT4的水平不变，并且与重要生理因子无关。
en: Additionally, in type I diabetics, GLUT 4 levels are unaltered in skeletal muscle and do not correlate with important physiological factors.

zh: 所以，在人类糖尿病中，存在着葡萄糖载体的组织特异性调节，并且载体表达的变化不能解释机体内的胰岛素抵抗糖摄取的问题（Kahn,1992)。
en: So, in human diabetes, there is tissue-specific regulation of glucose transporters and changes in transporter expression do not explain in vivo insulinresistant glucose uptake (Kahn, 1992).

zh: 目前尚无有关儿童和青少年糖尿病患者GLUT4的资料。
en: There are no data on GLUT 4 in diabetic children and adolescents.

zh: 莱文（1981)采用Meili测试量表，构建出田径儿童运动员的智力特征剖面图。
en: Using the Meili's intelligence test, Levin (1981) constructed intelligence profiles of children involved in track-and-field activity.

zh: 有145名年龄在11~12岁报名参加田径班的儿童参加了这次测试。
en: The test was administered to 145 children 11 —12 years old, candidates for sport classes specializing in track-and-field events.

zh: 研究对以下两组儿童的智力剖面图进行了比较：（1) 75名已经在该班一年并表现优秀的儿童； (2) 70名不能赶上课程进度的儿童。
en: Comparison was carried out between the intelligence profiles of the 75 children involved in these classes, and 1 year successfully participated in them and the 70 children who appeared as not able enough to get on with track-and-field events.

zh: 在大多数情况，你会感兴趣的是一组分数的平均数。
en: Most often, you are interested in the mean of a group of scores.

zh: 你可能偶尔也会注意到中位数，或者是另一种集中趋势的测量一众数（mode) ，它是指一个数列中最常出现的一个数字。
en: You may occasionally be interested in the median or perhaps in another measure of central tendency, the mode, which is defined as the most frequently occurring score.

zh: 在前面的例子中，众数也是5 ，因为它出现了 3 次。
en: In the previous example, the mode is also 5, because it occurs three times.

zh: 有些分数的群组可能有超过一个众数。
en: Some groups of scores may have more than one mode.

zh: 如果这是1890年，毫无疑问有一个人会站出来强烈支持中央控制器假说。
en: If this were 1890, one person, without doubt, would have stood up and vehemently supported the central governor hypothesis.

zh: 事实上，是Sigmund Freud (西格蒙德•弗洛伊德）本人让世人认识到，是众多的确定性心理活动搅乱了我们的大脑潜意识水平。
en: Indeed, it was Sigmund Freud himself who opened the world’s vision to the hubbub of deterministic mental activity that churned in our brains beneath the conscious level.

zh: 他的观点产生了一种全新的方式，即将意识行为看作是压抑的、潜意识过程的最终表达。
en: His ideas, of course, generated a whole new way of looking at conscious behavior as an expression of repressed, subconscious processes.

zh: 吸引人的部分在于，如果你只是要求受试者以他们擅长的速度跑步，这个速度通常也就是最经济的速度。
en: The fascinating part of this is that now, if you simply ask the subjects to run at a speed that they prefer, it almost always nearly coincides with that most economical velocity.

zh: 中央运动振荡器具有敏锐的洞察力。
en: That central motor oscillator has keen insight.

zh: 它知道什么样的速度将 花费跑步者最少的代谢工作，甚至没有与他们协商就能做出相应的指示。
en: It knows what speed will cost runners the least metabolic work, dictating this without even consulting them.

zh: 在大多数情况，你会感兴趣的是一组分数的平均数。
en: Most often, you are interested in the mean of a group of scores.

zh: 你可能偶尔也会注意到中位数，或者是另一种集中趋势的测量——众数（mode) ，它是指一个数列中最常出现的一个数字。
en: You may occasionally be interested in the median or perhaps in another measure of central tendency, the mode, which is defined as the most frequently occurring score.

zh: 在前面的例子中，众数也是5，因为它出现了3次。
en: In the previous example, the mode is also 5, because it occurs three times.

zh: 有些分数的群组可能有超过一个的众数。
en: Some groups of scores may have more than one mode.

zh: 在重测法（test-retestmethod)中，测验在当日施行后，隔天或是稍后几日会再施行一次。
en: In the test-retest method, the test is given one day and then repeated a day or so later.

zh: 这个间隔长短会因测验的激烈程度，以及是否需要超过一天的休息而调整。
en: The interval may be governed to some extent by how strenuous the test is and whether more than a day’s rest is needed.

zh: 当然，此间隔不能长到在两次测验中已经发生能力、成熟状态、或是学习效果有改变的程度。
en: Of course, the interval cannot be so long that actual changes in ability, maturation, or learning occur between the two test administrations.

zh: 第三种姿态——重建，包含了基于补偿和辩解的策略（Coombs, 2007)。
en: The third type of posture, rebuilding, contains strategies grounded in compensation and apologia (Coombs, 2007).

zh: 除了基本的现金支付之外，补偿通常会以慈善捐款的方式进行。
en: In addition to basic cash payments, compensation sometimes takes the form of donations to charity.

zh: 这种捐赠作为一种善意的姿态，不仅在个体中产生，也在组织中出现。
en: Such donations serve as gestures of goodwill, not just among individuals but also among organizations.

zh: 迪査理说，不好的姿势是一切跑步问题的根源。
en: But poor posture is responsible for all sorts of running problems, Dicharry says.

zh: 例如，不好的姿势会引起重心向后移动，也就造成了跨大步跑步和后脚跟落地的方式，同时也增加了受伤的风险。
en: For example, poor posture causes the center of gravity to shift backward, encouraging overstriding and the resulting heel strike and increase in injury risk.

zh: “不好的姿势至少削弱了你50% 调动肌肉的能力，这些肌肉正是稳定脊柱和小腿的来源。”
en: “It impairs your ability to activate the muscles that stabilize the spine and the lower legs,” says Dicharry, “by as much as 50 percent.”

zh: 但是，我们必须要考虑更大范畴的生物钟。
en: It turns out, though, that even bigger timekeepers must be considered.

zh: 事实上，每一个生物体都拥有一个 可控制细胞周期性功能，使之阶段性增加和减少的时钟。
en: In fact, every living being possesses clocks that govern phasic increases and decreases in cell function that cycle with chronological time.

zh: 由于这种模式通常大约为一 天的时间，因此被称为昼夜节律。circadian rhythms，源自拉丁文circa (大约）和dies (天）。
en: Since such patterns usually approximate a day’s duration, they are termed circadian rhythms, from the Latin circa (about) and dies (day).

zh: 在整个动植物王国里，这是很明显的，它表明这些节律是生物体的一个重要 特征。
en: They’re evident throughout both the plant and animal kingdoms, indicating that these rhythms are a central feature of living matter.

zh: 但是，为什么我们的身体组织工作要按照时钟进行呢（当然，这不像你我，身体从来不看表）？这仍然是一个未解之谜。
en: However, why our tissues do their work with an eye on the clock (unlike you or me, of course) remains an unsolved mystery.

zh: 循环系统疾病是胸痛最少见的原因。
en: The most unusual cause of chest pain is the circulatory system.

zh: 心血管系统引起的胸痛通常伴有昏厥或昏厥前期、心悸的历史和既往心脏手术史或者家庭成员过早意外死亡的历史（Duster，1990）。
en: Chest pain that is the result of the cardiovascular system often is ac­companied by a history of syncope or pre­syncope, palpitations, previous cardiac surgery or perhaps a positive family history of early sudden unexpected death (Duster, 1990).

zh: 如果患马凡氏综合征（Marfan’s syndrome)或特纳氏综合征（Turner’s syndrome)的人突然胸痛，必须怀疑是否是主动脉破裂引起的。
en: If chest pain occurs acutely in an individual with Marian's syndrome or Turner's syndrome, acute dissection of the aorta should be suspected.

zh: 由特殊细胞（称为起搏细胞）发出的电流，由心脏顶部开始向下流动，刺激心肌，将血液挤出，通过主动脉瓣膜。
en: Electricity from special cells (called pacemaker cells)—starting at the top of the heart and moving down—stimulates the heart muscle to wring the blood out through the aortic valve.

zh: 这就像拧湿毛巾—样，把水扔出来。
从心脏中流出的血液自动注入主动脉，主动脉是人体最大的动脉血管，将富含氧气的血液输送到人体其他部分。
en: The wave of blood that has been twisted out of the heart is ejected into the aorta itself, the body's largest artery, which carries oxygen-rich blood to the rest of the body.

zh: 这3项比赛是完全不同的比赛，应该具体情况具 体分析。
en: These are significantly different races and should be approached differently.

zh: 短距离的比赛应该跑得更快，而长距离的比赛应该跑得慢些， 以 防 “撞墙”。
en: The shorter races should be run faster, and the longer ones should be run slower to avoid bonking.

zh: 但是，你仍旧不应该忽略5千米和10千米的训练。
en: Still, you shouldn’t ignore your 5K and 10K training.

zh: 那么，我为什 么要提到比你备赛距离更短的比赛配速呢？
en: Why am I talking about your speed in race distances shorter than the race you want to train for?

zh: 原因在于，进行针对比赛 距离提高速度的训练后，如5干米和10千米比赛，你将能够在更长距 离的比赛中保持更快的配速，如半程马拉松或更长距离的比赛。
en: Because when you work in a way that improves your speed at race distances such as the 5K and 10K, you’re going to be able to sustain a faster pace in long-distance races such as the half-marathon and up.

zh: 人类很早就知道，正确利用自身体重训练既可以塑造完美的身材，也可以打造强悍的力量。
en: It has long been known that the correct practice of bodyweight training both perfects the physique and develops great strength.

zh: 在史前时期，当早期人类想增强并展示自己的身体能力时，他们会利用自己对身体的控制力。他们会将身体向上拉起、屈膝跳跃，还会借助手臂的力量把身体推离地面。
en: Ever since prehistory, when the first men wished to develop and display their power they did so by demonstrating their control over their body; lifting the body up, bending the knees and jumping, and pressing the body away from the surface of the earth using the strength of the limbs.

zh: 这些动作最终演化成了体操的基本动作。
en: These actions eventually evolved into what we would recognize today as the art of calisthenics.

zh: 与成年人相似，少年儿童非常喜欢目标明确的进步，目标台阶设置得越多，效果越好。
en: Like adults, children respond very well to goaloriented progressions.The more levels on the ladder of goals, the better.

zh: 青少年应参与康复目标的制定，并使其尽可能具体和专业（Danish, 1984; Murphy，1991)。
en: A dolescents should take some responsibility for setting the goals, making them as concrete and specific as possible (Danish, 1984; Murphy, 1991).

zh: 若有可能，受伤的青少年应该尽快在短期内达到制定的中期目标。
en: If possible, the injured youth should be able to reach intermediate goals at fairly short intervals.

zh: 通过变换弹力带的颜色，增加重复锻炼的次数，增加抗阻自由重量均可以表示康复的进步。
en: Progress may be indicated by changing colours of elastic bands or tubing, by increasing numbers of repetitions, or by increasing resistance of free weights.

zh: 因此，为了区分自尊和其他的自我概念，我们有必要确切地査明自尊的特征。
en: Therefore, it is necessary to identify the discerning features of self-esteem that in combination make self-esteem unlike any other self-conception.

zh: 自尊最重要的特征包括个体对自身价值的评价。

en: Most importantly, self-esteem involves an individual’s assessment of his or her own worth (Coopersmith, 1981; Elarter, 1986; Rosenberg, 1986).

zh: 高自尊的个体认为自己很棒，对自己很满意；而低自尊的个体一般缺乏自我尊重，对自己不满意。
en: High self-esteem individuals view themselves favourably and are satisfied with themselves, whereas low self-esteem individuals tend to lack self-respect and feel inadequate.

zh: 壁厚的子宮比举重运动员的二头肌还大，可以形象地说，子宫这时就会吸住阴茎，最终将精子拉进房间等待与卵子结合。
en: The thick-walled uterus, which is actually larger than a weight lifter's bicep, literally sucks on the penis and ultimately pulls the sperm into its chamber for fertilization.

zh: 此刻，只要精子一鼓作气冲到终点，就能最先与卵子结合。
如果结合成功，受精卵会嵌入一处子宫壁，着床生长。
en: If one does, the fertilzied egg reaches an area of the uterine wall(womb) where it gets implanted.

zh: 该试验被认为是测试跳跃功率的黄金标准，并用来验证其他无氧功率试验的有效性。
en: The test is considered as the gold standard in jump power testing and has been used for validation of other anaerobic power tests.

zh: 在测力台上进行纵跳时记录的功率输出峰值与在等动功率车上测得的峰值高度相关（r=0.95)。
en: Peak power output recorded during a vertical jump on a force platform is highly correlated with that measured on an isokinetic cycle ergometer (r=o.95).

zh: 但是，对不同方式活动之间的功率输出在机械上从来不会是精确无比的。
en: However, the comparison of power outputs between different forms of activities can never be mechanically exact.

zh: 如果研究对象是银发族群,有的可能甚至在研究期间就往生了。
en: In longitudinal studies of senior citizens, some may die over the course of the study.

zh: 因此 ,这个问题是出在当受试者流失的状况发生时,研究者无法知道替换样本是否与原来样本的特性一致。
en: The problem is not knowing whether the sample characteristics remain the same when participants are lost.

zh: 举例来说,当有些儿童因为父母亲的工作改变而必须随之搬迁,有无可能是因这些儿童的父母亲是属于较富裕家庭的社经地位而迁移至别处,而留下来的儿童样本是否渐渐地变成是由一群较低社经地位的家庭来组成呢?
en: For example, when children are lost from the sample because parents change jobs, is the sample then composed of children of lower socioeconomic levels because the more affluent parents moved?

zh: 因此，如果知道一位老师（如：布鲁克女士）每个月的薪水为1，750美金 ，便能够轻易地在图上标示出1，750美金在水平（X）轴（横坐标）的位置和 垂 直（y）轴（纵坐标）上 21,000美金的位置相交。
en: Thus, if we know that a teacher (e.g., Ms. Brooks) earns a monthly salary of $1,750, we can easily plot this on the graph where $1,750 on the，horizontal(x) axis (the  abscissa)  intercepts the vertical

zh: 预测方程式（Y ，年收入预测）为t 二12X。
en: (y) axis (the ordinate)  at $21,000.The equation for prediction (T, predicted annual income) is thus Y = 12X.

zh: 在此例子中，将老师的月薪（X）置入公式中：Y-12（1,750）= 21,000。
en: In this example, the teacher’s monthly salary (X) is inserted in the formula: Y = 12(1,750) = 21,000.

zh: 因为应力相对集中，解剖学异常的个体容易发生过度使用损伤。
en: Individuals with anatomical abnormalities may be predisposed to overuse injuries because stress may concentrate at certain anatomical locations.

zh: 例如，髌股应力综合症常见于股骨过度前倾的青少年跑步运动员。
en: For example, patellofemoral stress syndrome is frequently seen in young runners who have excessive femoral anteversion.

zh: 髋关节过度内旋会导致步态的支撑中期足过度旋前，出现膝关节Q角增大，加大了髌骨关节面的负荷。
en: Excessive internal rotation of the hip produces  foot overpronation at the midstance stage in the gait cycle.This results in an increase in the functional Q angle at the knee which is believed to produce an increase in the load placed on the patellofem oral joint.

zh: 股骨的前倾，膝关节内翻，外翻，胫骨外旋增加及前足过度旋前都是引起膝关节疼痛及损伤的原因。
en: Excessive femoral anteversion, genu varum or valgum, increased external tibial rotation, and excessive forefoot pronation can also be contributing factors to knee pain and injury.

zh: 当霍克的形象被描述并与细井作比较时，他的种族并没有被刻意提及。
en: When Hawk's body was described and compared to Hosoi's, his ethnicity was not explicitly marked.

zh: 相反地，纪录片对霍克的描述就是个子高挑，更多的是“机器人” 或是“比赛机器”；对细井则是通常描述其能够加强他优雅风格的紧凑身形：“娇小的个子，拥有强壮的大腿、胸部和上臂——克里斯蒂安能够成为一个很好的（棒球）游击手或是英式足球前卫队员，而他出色的平衡感可以让他拔下天线，令其他滑板选手望洋兴叹。”(Greenfeld, 2004, p.70)
en: Instead, Hawk was described throughout the documentary as tall and lanky, more "robotic" and a "contest machine."Whereas Hosoi was consistently described as having a more compact body that enhanced his graceful style: "Built low to the ground, with exceptionally strong thighs, chest and upper arms, Christian might have been a good shortstop or soccer midfielder, but it was his exceptional sense of balance that allowed him to pull off aerials that left other skaters shaking their heads" (Greenfeld, 2004, p.70).

zh: 皮尔森相关（Pearson r) 通常被称为组间相关 (interciass correlation) 。
en: Pearson r is often called interclass correlation.

zh: 此系数是双变数统计，是用来处理两个不同变量间的相关，比如处理评委打分与技能测试分数间的相关。
en: This coefficient is a bivariate statistic, meaning that it is used to correlate two variables, as when determining validity by correlating judges’ ratings with scores on a skill test.

zh: 但组间相关在建立信度时并不适当，因为信度是计算同一个变数的两个数值间的相关
en: But interclass correlation is not appropriate for establishing reliability because two values for the same variable are being correlated.

zh: 组内相关（R)的计算过程与第9章讨论的单因子重复量数变异数分析(ANOVA)相同，其组成来源为受试者、测试、以及残差的平方和。
en: The procedures leading to the calculation of intraclass correlation (R) are the same as those of simple ANOVA with repeated measures, discussed in chapter 9.The components are subjects, trials, and residual sums of squares.

zh: 表 11.2是一个ANOVA摘要表的范例。我们将使用表中的数据来计算R。
en: An example of a summary ANOVA is shown in table 11.2. We use these data to compute R.

zh: 6〜18岁男性大腿（□)和手臂（圏) 肌肉耐力（每公斤体重）增长的速率。
en: Rate increase (per kg) in leg (□) and arm ipt) muscle endurance in males aged 6—18 years old.

zh: 大腿 的数据引自Inbar (1985)以及 Inbar & Bar-Or (1986);手臂的数据引自Inbar (1985)和 Blimkie et al. (1988)。
en: Data from Inbar (1985) and Inbar and Bar-Or (1986) for legs; Inbar (1985) and Blimkie et al. (1988) for arms.

zh: 最大身高增长速度（PHV)是根据文献（Tanner, 1962) 确定的。
en: Peak height velocity (PHV) is assumed, based on the liturature (Tanner, 1962).

zh: PPV,最大功率增长速度。
en: PPV, peak power velocity.

zh: 最大骨骼重量是 一个简单的概念。

en: Peak bone mass is a simple concept that is still in need of clarification.

zh: 从理论上说，它是一个个体所获得的最大的骨骼重量。
en: Theoretically, it is the highest bone mass that an individual attains.

zh: 但是，现有的测试技术不是测试骨骼重量本身。
en: However, present measurement techniques do not measure bone mass per se.

zh: 对初学者来说，坐姿屈膝是理想的腹部练习动作，因为该动作可以培养良好的脊柱姿势，锻炼腹部肌肉，增强髋部屈肌。
en: Knee tucks are an ideal midsection exercise for beginners.They cultivate good spinal posture, condition the abdominal muscles and strengthen the hip flexors.

zh: 对大多数人来说，这个动作也相对容易，因此给他们提供了发展完美技巧的绝佳机会，为以后的中段练习做好准备。
en: They are also relatively easy for most people and for this reason they present a great opportunity to start developing perfect technique for all your midsection exercises.

zh: 切记，动作要平缓，呼吸节奏要正确，腹部始终要保持收紧状态。
en: Important elements to remember include smooth motion, correct breathing rhythm and keeping the stomach held in tightly.

zh: 只有达到悬垂直举腿的精英级别，才能尝试V字举腿。
en: You should only attempt V raises once you have attained the elite standard of the hanging straight leg raise.

zh: 如果你已经达到了，那就继续举腿系列的训练，到另外一天，即等到腹部与腰部肌肉得到充分恢复后再练习V字举腿。
en: If you have, and you wish to master V raises, continue your training in leg raises, but work into V raises on a different day, when your stomach and waist muscles are fresh.

zh: 先热身，再做一些腰部的柔韧性练习，然后在地上尝试V字举腿动作。
en: After performing a warm up and some forward flexibility exercises, learn the movement while sitting on the floor.

zh: 我们可以看到此人在两个测验中的表现完全相同。
en: We see that the person performed exactly the same on the two tests.

zh: 两者皆是比平均数高一个标准差。
en: Both performances were 1 standard deviation above the mean.

zh: 与此相似，不同学生的成绩在同样的测验中也可以用z分数相互比较。
en: Similarly, scores of different students on the same test can be compared by z scores.

zh: 一个垂直跳高37公分的学生z分数是-0.5，而44公分的学生z分数则为0.67，依此类推。
en: A student who jumps 37 cm has a z score of -0.5, a student who jumps 44 cm has a z score of 0.67, and so on.

zh: 所有的标准分数皆是以z分数为基础。
en: All standard scores are based on the z score.

zh: 但因为z分数有小数点又有正负值，因此不像其他分数一样容易使用。
en: But because z scores are expressed in decimals and can be positive or negative, they are not as easy to work with as some other scales.

zh: 为了对各种特殊活动包括体育活动的能量消耗进行分类，或者确定每天体力活动水平与总能量消耗的关系，人们引进了MET (代谢单位）的评价概念。
en: In order to classify the energy turnover of specific activities including sport activities, or to specify the level of daily physical activity in relation to the total energy turnover, the MET (metabolic units) rating has been introduced.

zh: MET值是活动的能耗除以安静能量消耗的比值。
en: The MET value is the ratio of the energy cost of an activity divided by Resting energy expenditure.

zh: MET值大约等于该活动的能耗，以kcal • h-1 • kg-1体重表示。成年人的安静能量消耗约为1 kcal • h-1• kg-1 或4.2 kJ • h-1 • kg-1。
en: This MET value is approximately equal to the energy cost of the activity expressed as kcal • h-1 • kg-1 body weight since REE for adults is roughly 1 kcal • h-1• kg-1 or 4.2 kJ • h-1 • kg-1.

zh: 这就是问题的核心所在。
en: And that is the crux of the proposition.

zh: 在过去的一个世纪里，奥运会远不仅仅是一项体育赛事，正是奥林匹克运动历经3000年风雨被细心呵护至今的那些独特的价值，提升了合作伙伴的价值。
en: The Olympic Games are far more than just another sporting event.The unique value proposition of the Olympic Movement, carefully nurtured over the past century but able to trace its roots back nearly 3,000 years, is what has driven the value of the partner association.

zh: 奥运会特许经营组织，正是在奥林匹克的价值观基础上建立起来的。
en: The Olympic franchise is built on the Olympic values.

zh: 只有通过精心的管理以及长远的合作关系，才能将此维系下去。
en: It can only be sustained through carefully managed and long-term relationships.

zh: 细井的家族传承是评论的主要部分。
en: His family heritage was a main part of the commentary.

zh: 两个叙述中都将克里斯蒂安的父亲 在艺术、自由精神、非法毒品的使用上对他产生的影响放在最重要的位置。
en: First, his father's influence on Christian as an artist, free spirit, and user of illicit drugs was foremost in both narratives.

zh: 其次，他的种族经常被强调，而霍克的白人身份从未被明确讨论。
en: Second, his ethnicity was frequently highlighted, unlike Hawk whose Whiteness is never explicitly discussed.

zh: 在人行走时，半月板吸收外界岁膝部的冲击，半月板撕裂会导致发炎，膝部疼痛不俱。
en: Your meniscus acts as a shock absorber when youVe walking, and when it tears, it leads to inflammation and a lot of pain.

zh: 医生可以利用核磁共振检测诊断半月板是否撕裂。治疗方法主要包括 服用消炎药、冰敷、康复治疗（如果这些方法都不见效，最后还可以进行关节镜手术）。
en: Doctors can detect a tear using an MRI; treatment involves anti-inflammatory medication, icing, aggressive rehabilitation (and, if all else fails, arthroscopic surgery).

zh: “在所有的运动中，为什么棒球运动的奖金相对更髙，那是因为击球的复杂性。”Stephen Kindel (史蒂芬•坎德尔）在福布斯杂志（Forbes)中的一篇文章中这样说，“一位NFL（美国职业橄榄球联盟）的四分卫传球成功率不低于50%，一位美 职篮中锋，投篮得分成功率不低于50%，这些人很快会被训练为股票经纪人或者是卖啤酒的。但是棒球运动数额巨大的合约奖励比例只有0.300，因为击球手的失败率是70%。
en: “The complexity of hitting,” noted Stephen Kindel in an article in Forbes magazine, “is why baseball, of all sports, rewards relative failure so well. An NFL quarterback who hits his receiver less than 50% of the time or an NBA center who sinks fewer than half his baskets would soon be training as a stockbroker or selling beer. But baseball rewards 0.300 hitters—failure rates of 70%—with enormous contracts.”

zh: 当从饮食中删除一组食物时，你的感觉会有不同。
en: When you eliminate a group from your diet, you’ll notice different things about the way you feel.

zh: 例如，你从食谱中删去促使老化的脂肪（饱和脂肪和反式脂肪），会觉得更有精力。这会让你继续坚持吃饱和脂肪含量低的饮食，因为你发现了而且喜欢这些变化。
en: For instance, you may have more energy when you eliminate the aging fats (saturated and trans) from your diet, and that'll help you stick to a diet low in saturated fat because you'll notice—and like—the changes.

zh: 在这个问题上，自行车运动有另一个学派的思想。
在中距离项目中，你应该在一开始就全力以赴，以尽快达到次最大比赛节奏。
en: In a middle-distance event, you ought to blast off at the start with an all-out effort to bring yourself to the desired, submaximal race pace as quickly as possible.

zh: 这个证据是这样的：稳定的骑行节奏是最好的，而且任何的偏差都要消耗宝贵的体能。
en: The argument goes like this: Yes, a steady cycling pace is best, and any deviation is energy expensive.

zh: 由于比值标准存在不足，坦纳（1964）建议组间比较采用协方差分析（analysis of covariance）( ANCOVA) ( Snedecor & Cochran, 1980)。在协方差分析中，要将协变量（covariate）的影响分割开来，并计算校正过的均值。
en: As a result of the imperfections of ratio standards, Tanner (1964) suggested that comparisons between groups should be based on analysis of covariance (ANCOVA) (Snedecor & Cochran, 1980).In ANCOVA, the effect o f a covariate is partitioned out and an adjusted mean is calculated.

zh: 该技术的效用得到了证明。
en: The utility of this technique has been demonstrated.

zh: 这些变式并不能代替十式。
en: These variants are not substitutes for the ten steps.

zh: 不过，知道一些变式还是很有必要的。如果你想在自己健身计划中加点儿变化或想在受伤时继续锻炼，就会用到这些动作。
en: All the same, it’s handy to know some of the variants in case you fancy adding some variety into your routine or if you’re working around injuries.

zh: 最简单的差异比较是只有两个组别之间的比较：t考验。
en: The simplest comparison of differences is between two groups: the t test.

zh: 接着介绍变异数分析，这是检验两组或更多组别之间差异性的方法。
en: Next, we describe analysis of variance as a means of testing the significance of the differences among two or more groups.

zh: 我们也讨论了多因子变异数分析，也就是同时比较两个或更多个自变项。
en: We also discuss the use of factorial analysis of variance, by which two or more independent variables can be compared.

zh: 许多家伙都害怕深蹲，因为他们认为深蹲将加重膝盖旧伤。
en: Many guys are afraid of the squat, because they think it will aggravate old knee injuries.

zh: 其实事实恰恰相反。
en: In fact, the opposite is usually true.

zh: 做标准深蹲时，增加的血液流动可以移除累积的废物，恢复旧伤组织，缓解疼痛。
en: The increased blood flow and range of motion in full squats removes waste build-up and stretches old scar tissue, alleviating pain.

zh: 膝盖及其周围的矶肉与肌腱将变得更强、更柔韧，再受伤的可能性也大大减小了。
en: The knees and surrounding muscles and tendons become stronger and more flexible, and the likelihood of future injuries is lessened.

zh: 有些感染会大大影响你的生活，比如爱泼斯坦-巴尔病毒，能攻击你的肝并造成传染性单核细胞增多症，使脾脏肿胀。
en: Other infections change the way you live.The Epstein-Barr virus, for example, attacks your liver and causes infections mononucleosis with a spleen swollen with immune cells ready for battle.

zh: 病毒的一个弱点是为了能入侵细胞,它需要某种运输方式，也就是它需要一种化学的运输体把它运送到那里。
en: One of the weaknesses of viruses is that in order for a virus to invade a cell, it needs some mode of of transportation—it needs a chemical transporter to take it there.

zh: 最新的病毒治疗方法集中致力于阻断运输体以便病毒到达不了细胞。
en: The latest therapies for virus can't get into the cells.

zh: 如果把疼痛分为1到10级，背痛的级别是6.92。
en: If you've ever strained your back, you know that on the scale of 1 to 10, the pain ranks at a 6.92.

zh: 疼痛会给人带来麻痹的感觉——行走、坐下、睡觉，行动都很困难。
en: It can be paralyzing—making if difficult to walk, to sit, to get up, to sleep, to do anything.

zh: 这时你就只想躺下，把脑袋埋在枕头里。
en: All you want to do is to lie down, prop your head on some pillows.

zh: 此刻最美的事莫过于生活伴侣给你递来冰袋和布洛芬，并奉上最新一期Tattoo Today杂志。
en: And you can think of nothing better than having your spouse deliver ice packs, ibuprofen, and the latest issue of Tattoo Today directly to your bed（4）.

zh: 任何一种常模调查的实施，都必须透过严谨及标准化的测量程序。
en: In any normative survey, the test must be administered in a rigidly standardized manner.

zh: 测量方式如果出现差异 ，所得到的结果就不具参考价值。
en: Deviations in the way measurements are taken give meaningless results.

zh: 研究者使用百分位数、 T 分数或标准九等标准化分数来分析所收集到的数据，同时分别依据年龄、性别等类别来建立常模。
en: The researcher collects and analyzes the data from the survey by some norming method, such as percentiles, T scores, or stanines, and then constructs norms for the categories of age, sex, and so on.

zh: 常态科学随着爱因斯坦相对论和量子论的发明而受到极大的冲击。因为这二种理论皆指出自然的法则会受到人类的影响（也就是说，事物的真实性有很大的一部分要看当事者的知觉）。
en: Normal science received a terrific jolt with Einstein’s theory of relativity and the quantum theory, which indicated that nature’s laws could be influenced by humans (that is, that reality depends to a great extent on how one perceives it).

zh: 再者，有些事情的发生，像是放射性核子的 衰退，全无理由可言。
en: Moreover, some things, such as the decay of a radioactive nucleus, happen for no reason at all.

zh: 体重超重或患有其他疾病的人在开始任何体育锻炼前， 都要先咨询医生。
en: If you're overweight or have other medical conditions, you should consult your doctor before starling any exercise program.

zh: 开始时先是小运动。每天散步五分钟，然后每隔几天就延长一到两分钟。
en: Start small: Walk five minutes a day, and increase by one or two minutes every few days.

zh: 当我们按出生年龄来分析运动上的成功时，就会明了。
en: This comes to light when sport success is analyzed by birth date.

zh: 由于大多数青年赛事中，竞赛都是按年龄来分组的，按照比赛认证的年份，一个生于年初的孩子体格可能更大——可能在力量运动上更有优势——相比于那些生于年尾的孩子。
en: Since competition is grouped by age category in most youth sports, a child who is born at the first part of the qualifying year can be expected to be bigger—and perhaps more skillful in strength and power activities—than one whose birth date is in the later part of the year.

zh: 但是这两个孩子都将在同一组中里进行比赛。
en: Yet both will be playing at the same level of team competition.

zh: 青春期早期以前的数据与以往使用敏感性较低的方法的很多研究结果是一致的（虽然不是定量的研究）。
en: From early puberty onw ard the data are consistent (although not quantitatively) w ith those from m any previous studies using less sensitive assays.

zh: 这些研究结果显示，增强的促黄体生成激素脉（LH）冲性释放——最早只在夜间—— 紧接着有一个不平衡的分泌期，大部分是在夜间，最后到成年的释放方式，即间歇性的脉冲释放，在月经的卵泡期的频率大约是每90秒钟释放一次。
en: They showaugm ented, pulsatile release of luteinizing hormone (LH) — at first, only at night — followed by a period of unbalanced secretion w ith the great m ajority at night, and finally to the adult pattern o f intermittent pulsatile release with a frequency of one pulse approxim ately every 90 mm in the early follicular phase of the m enstrual cycle.

zh: 卵巢接受逐渐增加的生物学上有活性的促性腺激素刺激后，会产生越来越多的雌二醇。
en: The ovary is stim ulated to produce increasing quantities of oestradiol by the increasing concentrations of biologically active gonadotrophins.

zh: 运动是非常重要的。
en: There are a couple of reasons why exercise is so important.

zh: 不论运动量大小，既能降低收缩压（心脏收缩时承受的压力），又能降低舒张压（心脏放松时的动脉压力）。这两者都是动脉老化最重要的指标，尤其是舒张压。
en: For one, any amount of physical activity lowers both systolic (the pressure being exerted when the heart contracts; the first or top number) and diastolic (the pressure in the arteries when the heart is at rest; the bottom or second number) blood pressure, which are the most important factors in arterial aging.

zh: 即使每天散步几分钟，也能降低体内有害胆固醇LDL)含量，提高健康胆固醇（HDL含量，减少发炎，还有其他益处。
en: Even walking just a few extra minutes a day lowers your lousy (LDL) cholesterol, raises your healthy (HDL) cholesterol, and decreases inflammation, among other benefits.

zh: 高脂饮食会导致胆囊收缩，更增加了结石带来的痛苦。
en: Fatty meals, which cause your gallbladder to contract, can increase the pain from your existing stones.

zh: 这里有一个方法可以检验自己的腹痛是否是由胆结石引起的。
en: So there's a way that you can actually test yourself to see if your belly pain is caused by gallstones.

zh: 去快餐店吃少量高脂饮食，比如一两块肯德基原味炸鸡（不错，这是惟一一次医生向你推荐这种食品）。
en: Go out and eat a small amount of a highly fatty fast-food meal, like a piece or two of original Kentucky Fried Chicken (yes, this is the only time you'll hear us recommend that).

zh: 高脂饮食会导致胆囊收缩，更增加了结石带来的痛苦。
en: Fatty meals, which cause your gallbladder to contract, can increase the pain from your existing stones.

zh: 这里有一个方法可以检验自己的腹痛是否是由胆结石引起的。
en: So there's a way that you can actually test yourself to see if your belly pain is caused by gallstones.

zh: 去快餐店吃少量高脂饮食，比如一两块肯德基原味炸鸡（不错，这是惟一一次医生向你推荐这种食品）。
en: Go out and eat a small amount of a highly fatty fast-food meal, like a piece or two of original Kentucky Fried Chicken (yes, this is the only time you'll hear us recommend that).

zh: 等你做引体向上的能力变强了，比如，到了无需作弊就可以做第五式的水平，这时就可以通过蹬腿来增加动作次数了。
en: Once you become stronger at pullups—when you can do Step 5 without cheating—then you can begin to productively use kipping in your workouts.

zh: 先做严格规范的动作，尽量多做，至少要3-4次，然后再借助蹬腿产生的力多做一次、二次，甚至三次。这样可以让你突破正常的界限，全展更强的肌肉耐力。
en: Do as many reps as you can strictly—at least three or four—then use kipping to generate the power to do another one, two or even three reps. This will allow you to push past your normal barriers and develop more muscular stamina than you otherwise could.

zh: CrossFit是一套进行力量和代谢调节训练的课程计划，由美国的 格雷格•格拉斯曼教练创立。
en: CrossFit is a strength and conditioning program created by Greg Glassman.

zh: 格拉斯曼教练在《CrossFit期刊》中是 这样定义CrossFit的:CrossFit由 “高强度不断变化的功能性动作组成，要求训练者在指定的时间和场地范围内完成训练任务”。
en: As defined by Glassman in the CrossFit Journal, CrossFit consists of “constantly varied functional movements executed at high intensity across broad time and modal domains.”

zh: 每周去3次传统健身房的人，通常每次会进行同样的25 分钟一轮的器械训练。他们单独训练不同部位的肌群，每个肌群的训练完成两组，每组重复10次。
en: Consider the person who goes to a gym three times a week and performs the same 25-minute circuit of machines that isolate specific muscle groups, completing 2 sets of 10 reps for each exercise.

zh: 体内血糖含量应低于lOOmg/dl。
en: Keep it lower than 100 mg/dl.

zh: 糖尿病患者的血液中含糖量过高，会降低一种特殊的磷激酶的活性，从而对动脉造成伤害。磷激酶能够让动脉自如地扩张收缩。
en: The excess sugar in the blood that's caused by diabetes damages the arteries by inactivating a specific phosphokinase, a substance that makes it possible for your arteries to dilate smoothly and contract.

zh: 没有这种酶，不同部位动脉的血管壁连接处出现裂缝坑洞的可能性就会大大增加。
en: Without that phosphokinasc, the risk of holes or cracks appearing at junctions in the arterial walls increases dramatically.

zh: 因此我们所有人，不只是糖尿病患者，都应尽量避免食用含有较多单糖类和饱和反式脂肪的食品，例如果冻甜面圈。
en: So all of us, not just diabetics, really want to avoid foods that are high in simple sugars and saturated and trans fats, like jelly doughnuts.

zh: 极简跑鞋同样对灵活性有帮助。
en: Minimalist shoes can also make a contribution to mobility.

zh: 传统跑鞋为脚部动作提供了相当多的支撑，而极简跑鞋提供的多方面灵活性在于让双脚尽量自然活动。
en: While traditional shoes provide considerable control over foot movement, minimalist shoes have multidirectional flexibility that is designed to let the foot move as naturally as possible.

zh: 跑者最终将因此获得更大的灵活性。
en: Ultimately, this leads to greater mobility.

zh: 进行预测研究时，样本的参与者人数应该要够多。
en: In prediction studies the number of participants in the sample should be sufficiently large.

zh: 通常，样本数越大，越有可能代表样本取样的母群体。
en: Usually, the larger the sample, the more likely it will be to represent the population from which it is drawn.

zh: 使用小样本数的多元回归研究的另一问题在于相关性可能高得不符逻辑。
en: Another problem with small samples in multiple-regression studies is that the correlation may be spuriously high.

zh: 从参与者人数到变项数目，其相关性与比例属直接关系。
en: A direct relationship exists between the correlation and the ratio of the number of participants to the number of variables.

zh: 15%的女性被诊断出患有二尖瓣脱垂。
en: Fifteen percent of women are diagnosed with mitral valve prolapse.

zh: 尽管男性瓣膜也会有异常问题发生，但是与瓣膜松软有关的心悸、出虛汗和心慌综合征通常出现在年轻女性身上。
en: Although men also have abnormal valves, the syndrome of palpitations, sweating, and panic attacks that is associated with these floppy valves is usually found in young women.

zh: 这种瓣膜问题应该用β-受体阻滞剂治疗，但是大多数人会放任情况进一步发展。
en: It can be treated with drugs called beta-blockers, but most folks end up outgrowing the condition.

zh: 二手文献则为由那些并非直接与事件或主题相关的人所写的书籍或文章。
en: Secondary sources are sources such as books and articles written by people who were not directly associated with the event or topic.

zh: 在许多情况下，二手文献是由那些已经完成他们第一手数据及基本调查的人，所写出来的。
en: In many cases, they are written by researchers who have done their own primary source-based research.

zh: 然而，由于资料过滤的程度是由他人去检验的，对于历史学家而言，相关二手文献显得较没价值。
en: However, the degree of filtering resulting from having been examined by others makes secondary sources less valuable to historians.

zh: 现在对于研究生长发育的生物学家和儿童运动生理学家来说是一个激动的时刻。
en: This is an exciting time for developmental biologists and paediatric exercise physiologists.

zh: 在研究儿童发育过程心肺系统对运动反应时，现在已经有了新的方法可供选用。
en: New methodologies are now available to focus on mechanisms of maturation of the cardiorespiratory response to exercise in children.

zh: 例如，MRI和 P MRS方法可以对生长发育阶段结构和机能的变化进行无创性测定。
en: For example, MRI and P M RS allow noninvasive assessments of growth and development of both anatomic and functional importance.

zh: 研究还显示，那些经常吃同一类食品的女性得临床乳腺癌的几率会降低30%—50%。
en: And studies have also shown that the risk of developing clinical breast cancer is 30 to 50 percent lower among women who frequently eat similar kinds of foods.

zh: 许多人认为其中的有效成分即造成这一惊人数字的成分是番茄红素。这是一种类胡萝卜素，因其抗氧化机能而著名。
en: Many believe that the active ingredient-the ingredient responsible for such astounding numbers—is lycopene, a carotenoid known for its antioxidant properties.

zh: 少儿运动科学家在阐明青年退出运动的原因时碰到的最大阻碍之一在于定义上的障碍。
en: One of the major barriers paediatric sport scientists have encountered in an effort to explain the drop-out dilemma in youth sports focuses on definitional hurdles.

zh: 大多数早期研究者把青少年分成以下3类。
en: Most of the early research classifies children and adolescents into one of the following categories.1

zh: 1.参与者：目前正在参加一项特定 运动项目。
en: Participant: an athlete who is currently participating in a specific sport programme.

zh: 2.中途退出者：不再参加任何一项 特定运动项目。
en: 2 Drop-out: an individual who is no longer involved in that particular programme.

zh: 3.非参与者：从未参加过任何特定 运动项目。
en: 3 Non-participant: an individual who has never been involved in that particular programme.

zh: 确切地说，这些类别是根据对个人是否参加运动的现状进行研究与评估后得出的。
en: Typically, these classifications were made after the fact and assessed the individual's current status of sport involvement or non-involvement.

zh: 这些描述意味着，少年儿童要么参与运动要么退出运动，不存在第三种情况。
en: These definitions infer an all-or-nothing meaning to sport participation or withdrawal.

zh: 然而更小的微粒，肉眼通常无法看见，能溜过防御系统，就像出色的足球前锋带球突破后卫防守，直闯对手禁区。
en: But even smaller particles, particles we cant actually see—can slip through the defense system much like a great running back breaks tackles.

zh: 如果没被察觉，这些微粒就会引发炎症，损坏部分肺部组织，进而还会带来更大的危害。
en: Undetected, these particles actually cause an inflammatory reaction that destroys part of your lung tissue—and puts you at greater risk for various lung disorders.

zh: （正因为此，钠米技术制造业可能就很危险了，因为它报废的产品都是小分子。）
en: (Thats why nanotechnology manufacturing may be dangerous: the waste product is all small particles.)

zh: 在风湿热发生初期如果没有心肌炎的发生，疾病的预后是良好的。
en: The prognosis is excellent for subjects to escape carditis during an initial attack of rheumatic fever.

zh: 初期的心肌炎及其后果的严重程度越大，预后就越坏。
en: The prognosis worsens with increasing severity of the initial carditis and its sequelae.

zh: 从风湿热急性期恢复并且没有合并心肌炎的人可以参加所有的体育运动。
en: Individuals who have recovered from the acute phase of rheumatic fever and do not have carditis, may participate in all athletic activities.

zh: 我们并不是说一个变项无法造成另一变项的产生；事实上，根据我们所提出的负相关例子，可说明将球打得越远，开球准确率便会越低（因为开球准确率是依据球员开球上球道率而定）。但是，这项关系并不代表着因果关系。
en: We are not saying that one variable cannot be the cause of another; in fact, using our example of a negative correlation, it is likely that driving the golf ball farther does cause a decrease in driving accuracy (as determined by the percentage of fairways that the player hits), but establishing that relationship does not establish cause and effect.

zh: 要产生因果关系，两个变项必须具有相关性。
en: For cause and effect to occur, the two variables must be correlated.

zh: 增强肌腱和韧带力量。
en: Building tendon and ligament strength.

zh: LSD跑步确实可以帮助增强这些结构，但是就像生物学家图多尔•博帕指出的，6周的负重训练同样可以大大增强结缔组织的力量。
en: LSD running may help strengthen these structures, but as exercise physiologist Tudor Bompa has pointed out, 6 weeks of weight training can also generate substantial connective tissue gains.

zh: 由于负重训练和增强式训练可以有针对性地增强肌腱和韧带力量，所以比起单纯进行大量的跑步训练，CFE模式的训练计划可以更有效地改善这些组织结构。
en: Further, because a weight training and plyometrics progression can target and improve specific tendons and ligaments, a CFE-type program may be more efficient and effective at improving these structures than just pounding the sidewalk for as many miles as you can.

zh: 2009年4月12日，在英式橄榄球联盟喜力杯哈勒奎因队（英国伦敦）与伦斯特队（爱尔兰）的1/4决赛中，哈勒奎因队的队员汤姆•威廉姆斯(Tom Williams)在比赛只有最后几分钟时口吐鲜血，似乎是受了伤。
en: On April 12, 2009, at rugby union's Heineken Cup quarter-final involving Harlequins (of London, England) and Leinster (of Ireland), Harlequins' player, Tom Williams, appeared to sustain an injury as blood gushed from his mouth with just minutes remaining in the game.

zh: 这起突发事件让哈勒奎因队可以“流血换人”，尼克•埃文斯（Nick Evans)上场。
en: The incident permitted Harlequins to make a "blood substitution," allowing Nick Evans to come on to the field.

zh: 比赛到了这个时候，正常来说哈勒奎因队已经不允许替换队员，“流血换人”是唯一能让埃文斯（久经沙场的攻击手，潜在的获胜武器）出场的一种方式。
en: At this point of the game, Harlequins would normally not be allowed to make a player replacement; a "blood substitution" was the only possible means of getting Evans (a recognized kicker and potential game-winner) onto the field.

zh: 如同世代研究，个案对照研究 (case control studies)的目的也在于找出与疾病结果有因果关系的因子。
en: The case-control study, like the cohort study, aims to identify factors that are causally related to disease outcome.In this design, people with disease (i.e.

zh: 这项设计将有疾病者(即个案组) 与无病者(即对照组)在同一时期招募至一个研究中。
en: , cases) and without disease (i.e., controls) are recruited into the study over the same period.

zh: 无病对照样本的选择通常系透过潜在 的重要干扰因子如：年龄与族裔，与有病个案进行配对 (matching)。
en: Frequently, the disease-free control subjects are selected to match cases with respect to potentially important confounding factors, such as age or ethnicity.

zh: 其次 ，两组都将经由面访或自填问卷的方式，询问他们在致病因子的暴露情形。
en: Both cases and controls are then asked about their exposures to potential causal factors using in-person interviews or self-administered questionnaires.

zh: 因此，个案对照研究的目的在于透过回溯性 (retrospective)的暴露评估，以找出在疾病自然史之诱导期中(即在发病之前)产生致病影响的因子 。
en: Thus, the objective of this retrospective exposure assessment in case-control studies is to identify factors that influenced the natural history of the disease during its induction period (i.e., before disease onset).

zh: 如果干细胞已经被损坏，接受适当的干细胞治疗会启动功能恢复机制。
en: When damage has already occurred, receiving appropriate stem cell therapies could prime the pump of recovery of funefion.

zh: 有关于此的道德困境在于从哪里获取干细胞，因为目前最好的来源是晶状受精卵，这些受精卵是其父母贡献者无法再用的。
en: The moral dilemma is where to get the stem cells from, since the best sources today are from unused in vifro fertilized eggs that the biologic parents can no longer use.

zh: 判断生命是从什么时候开始的是一个非常敏感的问题，但是许多科学家却看好在此领域的继续发现所带来的益处。
en: Deciding when life begins is a very personal issue, but many scientists appreciate the potential benefits of continued exploration in this field.

zh: 叶酸是维生素B的一种。专家已经证实，叶酸在很多方面对人类健康有重要作用，不过对于人体心脏来说，它的意义更不寻常。每日补充400微克叶酸，能将高半胱氨酸含量降到健康水平，让高半胱氨酸含量原来为26mg/dl(健康水平应低于9mg/dl)的人年轻6岁。
en: Folic acid is a B vitamin, which has proven to be essential to human health in various ways, but for your heart, it has a crucial role: a daily dose of 400 micrograms (half from food is normal) lowers homocysteine to healthy levels, and makes the person whose homocysteine level is 26 mg/dl (the level you should shoot for is less than 9 mg/dl) about six years younger.

zh: 黄斑包括许多视锥细胞，也有一些杆状细咆。黄斑会随着我们年老而变性，导致最常见的老年视觉问题。
en: The macula, which contains many cones but also some rods, can deteriorate as we age—making it the most common cause of age-related vision problems.

zh: 这种变性有两种形式。
en: This degeneration comes in two forms.

zh: 第一种是较常见的干式病变。
en: One is the more common dryform.

zh: 虽然我们并不知道其中确切的原因，但是我们知道那些抽烟的人和有高血压的人易受到这种因素的影响。
en: Although the exact cause is unknown, we know that those who smoke, and have high blood pressure are most affected.

zh: 如果你自己随意服用合成代谢类固醇、减肥药或治疗其他疾病的速效药，你就是在跟你的激素瞎胡闹，就会让身体出现故障。
en: Anytime you try fiddling with your hormones on your own with anabolic steroids or fixes for weight loss or other ailments, you're causing your body to go haywire.

zh: 比如我们经常会了解到一些运动员通过服用代谢类固醇药或补充剂，使其代谢产生睾丸酮。
en: For example, we often read about athletes who take androgenic steroids or supplements that get metabolized through to testosterone.

zh: 这些多余的睾丸酮会导致非常具有侵略性的行为，所以千万不要给服用者手枪，或者什么辩题，更别提这些药产生所有的副作用，像心血管病和肾脏类病。
en: This excess tesfosterone can lead to very aggressive behavior—as in, don't give that man a gun or even an argument—not to mention all the side effects like cardiovascular and kidney problems.

zh: 纵跳的高度(H)是依据以下的公式计算的：H = vt2-2g-1这里的vt=起跳速度，g=重力加速度。
en: The height of the jump (H) is measured according to the formula:H = vt2-2g-1where vt = take-off velocity and g = acceleration due to gravity.

zh: 力的峰值是在起跳前与测力台接触时的最大的力。
en: Peak force is the recording of maximal force during the time of contact on the platform before take-off.

zh: 该试验被认为是测试跳跃功率的黄金标准，并用来验证其他无氧功率试验的有效性。
en: The test is considered as the gold standard in jump power testing and has been used for validation of other anaerobic power tests.

zh: 巩固训练是处理这种状况的好办法。
en: Consolidation training is an excellent way of coping with this situation.

zh: 不是一周锻炼一两次，每次都努力增加次数，而是尝试每天都练习这个新动作，有时甚至是一天 练习两三回。
en: Instead of working the new exercise once or twice a week and struggling to improve your reps every time, try working the new exercise every day—sometimes even twice or three times a day.

zh: 放松，然后每回不是尽可能做更多次，而是最多只做一两次。
en: Loosen up, then instead of doing as many reps as possible, only do one—two at the very most.

zh: 很可能是早晨醒来做一次单臂引体向上，午饭后再做一次，熄灯前再做一次，诸如此类。
en: Maybe do one rep of a half one-arm pullup when you wake up; another one after lunch; another before lights out, and so on.

zh: 我不知道为什么巩固训练会起作用，但它的的确确有用。
en: I don’t know why consolidation training works, but it definitely does work.

zh: 有人告诉我说这是因为相比一次长时锻炼，多次的短时锻炼可以更有效地“教”神经系统处理相应的动作技巧。
en: I’ve been told that it works because the multiple mini-sessions “teach” the nervous system how to manage the technique in a more efficient way than just one prolonged session can.

zh: 不要在那些你已经能做多次反复的动作上使用巩固训练，只有在升级到新的、让你真正遇到挑战的高级技巧时才使用它。
en: Don’t use it for exercises where you can already get multiple reps—keep it for those occasions when you move up to a new, advanced technique which you find a real struggle.

zh: 在本章中，我们讨论了测量的效度与信度的概念，以及在研究中的应用。
en: In this chapter, we discussed the concepts of validity and reliability of measurements and their application to research.

zh: 效标效度(包含同时效度与预测效度)及构念效度是研究中用来证实测量效度最常用的两种方法。
en: Criterion validity (which includes both concurrent and predictive validity) and construct validity are two of the most popular methods of validating measures used in research studies.

zh: 有一个常被提出与预测测量有关的问题是普遍性或情境专属。
en: One problem often identified regarding predictive measures is population or situation specificity.

zh: 另外也讨论了使用预期表的价值。
en: The value of using expectancy tables was discussed.

zh: 由罗伯特·坎贝尔（Robert Campbell) 在美国申请专利的一种新型的骨骼宽度测量夹子带有两只滑动的测量臂，将骨骼宽度测量的精度提高了一步。
en: A new small bone caliper based on a US patent for a double-sliding branch principle by Robert Campbell provides for a new level of precision in measuring bone breadths.

zh: 测量臂末端的压力稳定，不紧也不松。
en: The design permits firm pressure on the ends of the branches without binding.

zh: Campbell 10夹子以发明人的名字命名，是按照独家专利协议由Rosscraft公司生产的。
en: The Campbell Caliper 10, named after the inventor, is manufactured by Rosscraft under exclusive patent agreement.

zh: 这种夹子有两个游标尺，可以从上下两个方向进行读数。
en: It has double vernier scales to permit reading in an up and down orientation.

zh: Siber-Hegner式人体测量器无关节的终端部分是用大范围的滑动夹子来测量躯干的宽度的；而Mitutoyo式小的夹子是用 于骨骼宽度测量的。
en: The disarticulated end piece of the Siber-Hegner anthropometer is used as a large wide sliding caliper for torso breadths; and small Mitutoyo adapted caliper for bone breadths.

zh: 测量器必须组装合适。
en: The anthropometer must be assembled properly.

zh: 滑动臂必须在操作者的右手侧。
en: The sliding branch should be on your right-hand side.

zh: 在测量器闭合时，显示器上的读数应该是0.7 mm (夹子两个臂在闭合时分开的距离）。
en: When closed, the anthropometer indicator should read 0.7m m (the small distance the branches are apart when fully closed).

zh: 滑动夹子和骨骼夹子的控制方法是相同的。
en: Both the sliding and the bone calipers are held in the same manner.

zh: 女性只是普遍在患病时间上比男性提前，因为女性的骨密度和骨质量都比男性小。
